ERF::ERF ( )
92 {
93  if (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
94  const char* erf_hash = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(1);
95  const char* amrex_hash = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(2);
96  const char* buildgithash = amrex::buildInfoGetBuildGitHash();
97  const char* buildgitname = amrex::buildInfoGetBuildGitName();
98 
99  if (strlen(erf_hash) > 0) {
100  amrex::Print() << "\n"
101  << "ERF git hash: " << erf_hash << "\n";
102  }
103  if (strlen(amrex_hash) > 0) {
104  amrex::Print() << "AMReX git hash: " << amrex_hash << "\n";
105  }
106  if (strlen(buildgithash) > 0) {
107  amrex::Print() << buildgitname << " git hash: " << buildgithash << "\n";
108  }
109 
110  amrex::Print() << "\n";
111  }
112 
113  ReadParameters();
114  const std::string& pv1 = "plot_vars_1"; setPlotVariables(pv1,plot_var_names_1);
115  const std::string& pv2 = "plot_vars_2"; setPlotVariables(pv2,plot_var_names_2);
116 
117  amrex_probinit(geom[0].ProbLo(),geom[0].ProbHi());
118 
119  // Geometry on all levels has been defined already.
120 
121  // No valid BoxArray and DistributionMapping have been defined.
122  // But the arrays for them have been resized.
123 
124  int nlevs_max = max_level + 1;
125 
126  istep.resize(nlevs_max, 0);
127  nsubsteps.resize(nlevs_max, 1);
128  for (int lev = 1; lev <= max_level; ++lev) {
129  nsubsteps[lev] = MaxRefRatio(lev-1);
130  }
131 
132  grids_to_evolve.resize(nlevs_max);
133 
134  t_new.resize(nlevs_max, 0.0);
135  t_old.resize(nlevs_max, -1.e100);
136  dt.resize(nlevs_max, 1.e100);
137  dt_mri_ratio.resize(nlevs_max, 1);
138 
139  vars_new.resize(nlevs_max);
140  vars_old.resize(nlevs_max);
141 
142  rU_new.resize(nlevs_max);
143  rV_new.resize(nlevs_max);
144  rW_new.resize(nlevs_max);
145 
146  rU_old.resize(nlevs_max);
147  rV_old.resize(nlevs_max);
148  rW_old.resize(nlevs_max);
149 
150  for (int lev = 0; lev < nlevs_max; ++lev) {
151  vars_new[lev].resize(Vars::NumTypes);
152  vars_old[lev].resize(Vars::NumTypes);
153  }
154 
155 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
156  qv.resize(nlevs_max);
157  qc.resize(nlevs_max);
158  qi.resize(nlevs_max);
159  qrain.resize(nlevs_max);
160  qsnow.resize(nlevs_max);
161  qgraup.resize(nlevs_max);
162 #endif
163 
164  mri_integrator_mem.resize(nlevs_max);
165  physbcs.resize(nlevs_max);
166 
167  flux_registers.resize(nlevs_max);
168 
169  // Initialize tagging criteria for mesh refinement
170  refinement_criteria_setup();
171 
172  // We have already read in the ref_Ratio (via amr.ref_ratio =) but we need to enforce
173  // that there is no refinement in the vertical so we test on that here.
174  for (int lev = 0; lev < max_level; ++lev)
175  {
176  amrex::Print() << "Refinement ratio at level " << lev << " set to be " <<
177  ref_ratio[lev][0] << " " << ref_ratio[lev][1] << " " << ref_ratio[lev][2] << std::endl;
178 
179  if (ref_ratio[lev][2] != 1)
180  {
181  amrex::Error("We don't allow refinement in the vertical -- make sure to set ref_ratio = 1 in z");
182  }
183  }
184 }

Member Function Documentation

◆ Advance()

void ERF::Advance ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt_lev,
int  iteration,
int  ncycle 
)
private
78 {
79  BL_PROFILE("ERF::Advance()");
80 
81  // We must swap the pointers so the previous step's "new" is now this step's "old"
82  std::swap(vars_old[lev], vars_new[lev]);
83 
84  MultiFab& S_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::cons];
85  MultiFab& S_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons];
86 
87  MultiFab& U_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::xvel];
88  MultiFab& V_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::yvel];
89  MultiFab& W_old = vars_old[lev][Vars::zvel];
90 
91  MultiFab& U_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel];
92  MultiFab& V_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel];
93  MultiFab& W_new = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel];
94 
95 
96  // configure ABLMost params if used MostWall boundary condition
97  if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::MOST) {
98  if (m_most) {
99  amrex::IntVect ng = S_old.nGrowVect(); ng[2]=0;
100  MultiFab::Copy( *Theta_prim[lev], S_old, Cons::RhoTheta, 0, 1, ng);
101  MultiFab::Divide(*Theta_prim[lev], S_old, Cons::Rho , 0, 1, ng);
102  // NOTE: std::swap above causes the field ptrs to be out of date.
103  // Reassign the field ptrs for MAC avg computation.
104  m_most->update_mac_ptrs(lev, vars_old, Theta_prim);
105  m_most->update_fluxes(lev);
106  }
107  }
108 
109  // We need to set these because otherwise in the first call to erf_advance we may
110  // read uninitialized data on ghost values in setting the bc's on the velocities
111  U_new.setVal(1.e34,U_new.nGrowVect());
112  V_new.setVal(1.e34,V_new.nGrowVect());
113  W_new.setVal(1.e34,W_new.nGrowVect());
114 
115  FillPatch(lev, time, {&vars_old[lev][Vars::cons], &vars_old[lev][Vars::xvel],
116  &vars_old[lev][Vars::yvel], &vars_old[lev][Vars::zvel]});
117 
118  MultiFab* S_crse;
119  MultiFab rU_crse, rV_crse, rW_crse;
120 
121  if (lev > 0)
122  {
123  S_crse = &vars_old[lev-1][Vars::cons];
124 
125  MultiFab& U_crse = vars_old[lev-1][Vars::xvel];
126  MultiFab& V_crse = vars_old[lev-1][Vars::yvel];
127  MultiFab& W_crse = vars_old[lev-1][Vars::zvel];
128 
129  rU_crse.define(U_crse.boxArray(), U_crse.DistributionMap(), 1, U_crse.nGrow());
130  rV_crse.define(V_crse.boxArray(), V_crse.DistributionMap(), 1, V_crse.nGrow());
131  rW_crse.define(W_crse.boxArray(), W_crse.DistributionMap(), 1, W_crse.nGrow());
132 
133  VelocityToMomentum(U_crse, U_crse.nGrowVect(),
134  V_crse, V_crse.nGrowVect(),
135  W_crse, W_crse.nGrowVect(),
136  *S_crse,rU_crse,rV_crse,rW_crse);
137  }
138 
139  // Do an error check
140  if (solverChoice.pbl_type == PBLType::MYNN25 &&
141  phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::MOST) {
142  amrex::Error("Must use MOST BC for MYNN2.5 PBL model");
143  }
144 
145  const auto& local_ref_ratio = (lev > 0) ? ref_ratio[lev-1] : IntVect(1,1,1);
146 
147  InterpFaceRegister ifr;
148  if (lev > 0)
149  {
150  ifr.define(S_old.boxArray(), S_old.DistributionMap(), Geom(lev), local_ref_ratio);
151  }
152 
153  const BoxArray& ba = S_old.boxArray();
154  const DistributionMapping& dm = S_old.DistributionMap();
155 
156  int nvars = S_old.nComp();
157 
158  // Place-holder for source array -- for now just set to 0
159  MultiFab source(ba,dm,nvars,1);
160  source.setVal(0.0);
161 #if defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
162  Real tau_cond = solverChoice.tau_cond;
163  Real c_p = solverChoice.c_p;
164  condensation_source(source, S_new, tau_cond, c_p);
165 #endif
166 
167  // We don't need to call FillPatch on cons_mf because we have fillpatch'ed S_old above
168  MultiFab cons_mf(ba,dm,nvars,S_old.nGrowVect());
169  MultiFab::Copy(cons_mf,S_old,0,0,S_old.nComp(),S_old.nGrowVect());
170 
171  // Define Multifab for buoyancy term -- only added to vertical velocity
172  MultiFab buoyancy(W_old.boxArray(),W_old.DistributionMap(),1,1);
173 
174  // *****************************************************************
175  // Update the cell-centered state and face-based velocity using
176  // a time integrator.
177  // Inputs:
178  // S_old (state on cell centers)
179  // U_old (x-velocity on x-faces)
180  // V_old (y-velocity on y-faces)
181  // W_old (z-velocity on z-faces)
182  // source (source term on cell centers)
183  // Outputs:
184  // S_new (state on cell centers)
185  // U_new (x-velocity on x-faces)
186  // V_new (y-velocity on y-faces)
187  // W_new (z-velocity on z-faces)
188  // *****************************************************************
189 
190  erf_advance(lev,
191  cons_mf, S_new,
192  U_old, V_old, W_old,
193  U_new, V_new, W_new,
194  rU_old[lev], rV_old[lev], rW_old[lev],
195  rU_new[lev], rV_new[lev], rW_new[lev],
196  rU_crse, rV_crse, rW_crse,
197  source, buoyancy,
198 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
199  qv[lev], qc[lev], qi[lev],
200 #endif
201  Geom(lev), dt_lev, time, &ifr);
202 
203 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
204  micro.Init(S_new,
205  qc[lev],
206  qv[lev],
207  qi[lev],
208  Geom(lev),
209  dt_lev);
210  micro.Cloud();
211  micro.Diagnose();
212  micro.IceFall();
213  micro.Precip();
214  micro.MicroPrecipFall();
215  micro.Update(S_new,
216  qv[lev],
217  qc[lev],
218  qi[lev],
219  qrain[lev],
220  qsnow[lev],
221  qgraup[lev]);
222 #endif
223 }
PBLType::MYNN25
@ MYNN25
IC_BC_Type::Real
@ Real
ERF_BC::MOST
@ MOST
VelocityToMomentum
void VelocityToMomentum(const amrex::MultiFab &xvel_in, const amrex::IntVect &xvel_ngrow, const amrex::MultiFab &yvel_in, const amrex::IntVect &yvel_ngrow, const amrex::MultiFab &zvel_in, const amrex::IntVect &zvel_ngrow, const amrex::MultiFab &cons_in, amrex::MultiFab &xmom_out, amrex::MultiFab &ymom_out, amrex::MultiFab &zmom_out)
ERF::m_most

Definition: ERF.H:733

Definition: ERF.H:648

ERF::erf_advance

Definition: TimeIntegration.cpp:14

◆ AverageDownTo()

void ERF::AverageDownTo ( int  crse_lev)
private
1326 {
1327  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx) {
1328  const BoxArray& ba(vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx].boxArray());
1329  if (ba[0].type() == IntVect::TheZeroVector())
1330  amrex::average_down(vars_new[crse_lev+1][var_idx], vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx],
1331  0, vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx].nComp(), refRatio(crse_lev));
1332  else // We assume the arrays are face-centered if not cell-centered
1333  amrex::average_down_faces(vars_new[crse_lev+1][var_idx], vars_new[crse_lev][var_idx],
1334  refRatio(crse_lev),geom[crse_lev]);
1335  }

◆ build_fine_mask()

amrex::MultiFab & ERF::build_fine_mask ( int  lev)
130 {
131  // Mask for zeroing covered cells
132  AMREX_ASSERT(level > 0);
133 
134  const amrex::BoxArray& cba = grids[level-1];
135  const amrex::DistributionMapping& cdm = dmap[level-1];
136 
137  // TODO -- we should make a vector of these a member of ERF class
138  fine_mask.define(cba, cdm, 1, 0, amrex::MFInfo());
139  fine_mask.setVal(1.0);
140 
141  amrex::BoxArray fba = grids[level];
142  amrex::iMultiFab ifine_mask = makeFineMask(cba, cdm, fba, ref_ratio[level-1], 1, 0);
143 
144 #ifdef _OPENMP
145 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
146 #endif
147  for (amrex::MFIter mfi(fine_mask, amrex::TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
148  {
149  auto& fab = fine_mask[mfi];
150  auto& ifab = ifine_mask[mfi];
151  const auto arr = fab.array();
152  const auto iarr = ifab.array();
153  amrex::ParallelFor(
154  fab.box(), [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
155 #ifdef _OPENMP
156 #pragma omp atomic write
157 #endif
158  arr(i, j, k) = iarr(i, j, k);
159  });
160  }
161 
162  return fine_mask;
163 }

◆ ClearLevel()

void ERF::ClearLevel ( int  lev)
overridevirtual
743 {
744  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx) {
745  vars_new[lev][var_idx].clear();
746  vars_old[lev][var_idx].clear();
747  }

750  rU_old[lev].clear();
751  rV_new[lev].clear();
752  rV_old[lev].clear();
753  rW_new[lev].clear();
754  rW_old[lev].clear();
755

757  mri_integrator_mem[lev].reset();
758  physbcs[lev].reset();
759 
760  grids_to_evolve[lev].clear();
761 }

◆ ComputeDt()

void ERF::ComputeDt ( )
private
9 {
10  Vector<Real> dt_tmp(finest_level+1);
11 
12  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
13  {
14  dt_tmp[lev] = estTimeStep(lev, dt_mri_ratio[lev]);
15  }
16 
17  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealMin(&dt_tmp[0], dt_tmp.size());
18 
19  Real dt_0 = dt_tmp[0];
20  int n_factor = 1;
21  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
22  dt_tmp[lev] = amrex::min(dt_tmp[lev], change_max*dt[lev]);
23  n_factor *= nsubsteps[lev];
24  dt_0 = amrex::min(dt_0, n_factor*dt_tmp[lev]);
25  }
26 
27  // Limit dt's by the value of stop_time.
28  const Real eps = 1.e-3*dt_0;
29  if (t_new[0] + dt_0 > stop_time - eps) {
30  dt_0 = stop_time - t_new[0];
31  }
32 
33  dt[0] = dt_0;
34  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
35  dt[lev] = dt[lev-1] / nsubsteps[lev];
36  }
37 }
ERF::stop_time
amrex::Real stop_time
Definition: ERF.H:591
ERF::estTimeStep
amrex::Real estTimeStep(int lev, long &dt_fast_ratio) const
Definition: ERF_ComputeTimestep.cpp:40
ERF::change_max
static amrex::Real change_max
Definition: ERF.H:599

◆ ComputeGhostCells()

AMREX_FORCE_INLINE int ERF::ComputeGhostCells ( const int &  horiz_spatial_order,
const int &  vert_spatial_order 
)
inlineprivate
748  {
749  int nGhostCells;
750 
751  int spatial_order = std::max(horiz_spatial_order, vert_spatial_order);
752 
753  switch (spatial_order) {
754  case 2:
755  nGhostCells = 2; // We need this many to compute the eddy viscosity in the ghost cells
756  break;
757  case 3:
758  nGhostCells = 2;
759  break;
760  case 4:
761  nGhostCells = 2;
762  break;
763  case 5:
764  nGhostCells = 3;
765  break;
766  case 6:
767  nGhostCells = 3;
768  break;
769  default:
770  amrex::Error("Must specify spatial order to be 2,3,4,5 or 6");
771  }
772 
773  return nGhostCells;
774  }

◆ define_grids_to_evolve()

void ERF::define_grids_to_evolve ( int  lev)
private
1340 {
1341  Box domain(geom[lev].Domain());
1342  if (lev == 0 && init_type == "real")
1343  {
1344  Box shrunk_domain(domain);
1345  shrunk_domain.grow(0,-1);
1346  shrunk_domain.grow(1,-1);
1347  grids_to_evolve[lev] = amrex::intersect(grids[lev],shrunk_domain);
1348  } else if (lev == 1) {
1349  Box shrunk_domain(boxes_at_level[lev][0]);
1350  shrunk_domain.grow(0,-1);
1351  shrunk_domain.grow(1,-1);
1352  grids_to_evolve[lev] = amrex::intersect(grids[lev],shrunk_domain);
1353 #if 0
1354  if (num_boxes_at_level[lev] > 1) {
1355  for (int i = 1; i < num_boxes_at_level[lev]; i++) {

1357  shrunk_domain.grow(0,-1);
1358  shrunk_domain.grow(1,-1);

1361  }

1363  } else {
1364  // Just copy grids...
1365  grids_to_evolve[lev] = grids[lev];
1366  }

◆ derive_diag_profiles()

void ERF::derive_diag_profiles ( amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_u,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_v,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_w,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_th,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_uu,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_uv,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_uw,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_vv,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_vw,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_ww,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_uth,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_vth,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_wth,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_thth 
)
101 {
102  // We assume that this is always called at level 0
103  int lev = 0;
104 
105  // This will hold theta, uu, uv, uw, vv, vw, ww, uth, vth, wth, thth
106  MultiFab mf_out(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 11, 0);
107 
108  MultiFab mf_vels(grids[lev], dmap[lev], AMREX_SPACEDIM, 0);
109 
110  MultiFab u_cc(mf_vels, make_alias, 0, 1); // u at cell centers
111  MultiFab v_cc(mf_vels, make_alias, 1, 1); // v at cell centers
112  MultiFab w_cc(mf_vels, make_alias, 2, 1); // w at cell centers
113 
114  average_face_to_cellcenter(mf_vels,0,
115  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
116 
117  int zdir = 2;
118  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
119 
120  // Sum in the horizontal plane
121  h_avg_u = sumToLine(mf_vels ,0,1,domain,zdir);
122  h_avg_v = sumToLine(mf_vels ,1,1,domain,zdir);
123  h_avg_w = sumToLine(mf_vels ,2,1,domain,zdir);
124 
125  // Divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
126  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0)*domain.length(1));
127  for (int k = 0; k < h_avg_u.size(); ++k) {
128  h_avg_u[k] /= area_z; h_avg_v[k] /= area_z; h_avg_w[k] /= area_z;
129  }
130 
131  MultiFab mf_cons(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], make_alias, 0, 2);
132 
133  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_cons,TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
134  {
135  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
136  const Array4<Real>& fab_arr = mf_out.array(mfi);
137  const Array4<Real>& u_cc_arr = u_cc.array(mfi);
138  const Array4<Real>& v_cc_arr = v_cc.array(mfi);
139  const Array4<Real>& w_cc_arr = w_cc.array(mfi);
140  const Array4<Real>& cons_arr = mf_cons.array(mfi);
141 
142  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
143  {
144  Real theta = cons_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp) / cons_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp);
145  fab_arr(i, j, k, 0) = theta;
146  fab_arr(i, j, k, 1) = u_cc_arr(i,j,k) * u_cc_arr(i,j,k); // uu
147  fab_arr(i, j, k, 2) = u_cc_arr(i,j,k) * v_cc_arr(i,j,k); // uv
148  fab_arr(i, j, k, 3) = u_cc_arr(i,j,k) * w_cc_arr(i,j,k); // uw
149  fab_arr(i, j, k, 4) = v_cc_arr(i,j,k) * v_cc_arr(i,j,k); // vv
150  fab_arr(i, j, k, 5) = v_cc_arr(i,j,k) * w_cc_arr(i,j,k); // vw
151  fab_arr(i, j, k, 6) = w_cc_arr(i,j,k) * w_cc_arr(i,j,k); // ww
152  fab_arr(i, j, k, 7) = u_cc_arr(i,j,k) * theta; // uth
153  fab_arr(i, j, k, 8) = v_cc_arr(i,j,k) * theta; // vth
154  fab_arr(i, j, k, 9) = w_cc_arr(i,j,k) * theta; // wth
155  fab_arr(i, j, k,10) = theta*theta; // thth
156  });
157  }
158 
159  h_avg_th = sumToLine(mf_out, 0,1,domain,zdir);
160  h_avg_uu = sumToLine(mf_out, 1,1,domain,zdir);
161  h_avg_uv = sumToLine(mf_out, 2,1,domain,zdir);
162  h_avg_uw = sumToLine(mf_out, 3,1,domain,zdir);
163  h_avg_vv = sumToLine(mf_out, 4,1,domain,zdir);
164  h_avg_vw = sumToLine(mf_out, 5,1,domain,zdir);
165  h_avg_ww = sumToLine(mf_out, 6,1,domain,zdir);
166  h_avg_uth = sumToLine(mf_out, 7,1,domain,zdir);
167  h_avg_vth = sumToLine(mf_out, 8,1,domain,zdir);
168  h_avg_wth = sumToLine(mf_out, 9,1,domain,zdir);
169  h_avg_thth = sumToLine(mf_out,10,1,domain,zdir);
170 
171  // Divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
172  for (int k = 0; k < h_avg_u.size(); ++k) {
173  h_avg_th[k] /= area_z; h_avg_thth[k] /= area_z;
174  h_avg_uu[k] /= area_z; h_avg_uv[k] /= area_z; h_avg_uw[k] /= area_z;
175  h_avg_vv[k] /= area_z; h_avg_vw[k] /= area_z; h_avg_ww[k] /= area_z;
176  h_avg_uth[k] /= area_z; h_avg_vth[k] /= area_z; h_avg_wth[k] /= area_z;
177  }
178 }
AdvectedQuantity::theta
@ theta
Rho_comp
#define Rho_comp
Definition: IndexDefines.H:8
RhoTheta_comp
#define RhoTheta_comp
Definition: IndexDefines.H:9

◆ derive_stress_profiles()

void ERF::derive_stress_profiles ( amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_tau11,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_tau12,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_tau13,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_tau22,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_tau23,
amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &  h_avg_tau33 
)
183 {
184  int lev = 0;
185 
186  // This will hold the stress tensor components
187  MultiFab mf_out(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 6, 0);
188 
189  for ( MFIter mfi(mf_out,TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
190  {
191  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
192  const Array4<Real>& fab_arr = mf_out.array(mfi);
193 
194  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
195  {
196 #if 0
197  fab_arr(i, j, k, 0) = tau11_arr(i,j,k);
198  fab_arr(i, j, k, 1) = tau12_arr(i,j,k);
199  fab_arr(i, j, k, 2) = tau13_arr(i,j,k);
200  fab_arr(i, j, k, 3) = tau22_arr(i,j,k);
201  fab_arr(i, j, k, 4) = tau23_arr(i,j,k);
202  fab_arr(i, j, k, 5) = tau33_arr(i,j,k);
203 #endif
204  });
205  }
206 
207  int zdir = 2;
208  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
209 
210  h_avg_tau11 = sumToLine(mf_out,0,1,domain,zdir);
211  h_avg_tau12 = sumToLine(mf_out,1,1,domain,zdir);
212  h_avg_tau13 = sumToLine(mf_out,2,1,domain,zdir);
213  h_avg_tau22 = sumToLine(mf_out,3,1,domain,zdir);
214  h_avg_tau23 = sumToLine(mf_out,4,1,domain,zdir);
215  h_avg_tau33 = sumToLine(mf_out,5,1,domain,zdir);
216 }

◆ derive_upwp()

void ERF::derive_upwp ( amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > &  h_havg)

◆ erf_advance()

void ERF::erf_advance ( int  level,
amrex::MultiFab &  cons_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  cons_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  xvel_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  yvel_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  zvel_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  xvel_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  yvel_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  zvel_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  xmom_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  ymom_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  zmom_old,
amrex::MultiFab &  xmom_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  ymom_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  zmom_new,
amrex::MultiFab &  xmom_crse,
amrex::MultiFab &  ymom_crse,
amrex::MultiFab &  zmom_crse,
amrex::MultiFab &  source,
amrex::MultiFab &  buoyancy,
const amrex::Geometry  fine_geom,
const amrex::Real  dt,
const amrex::Real  time,
amrex::InterpFaceRegister *  ifr 
)
28 {
29  BL_PROFILE_VAR("erf_advance()",erf_advance);
30  if (verbose) amrex::Print() << "Starting advance at level " << level << std::endl;
31 
32  int nvars = cons_old.nComp();
33 
34  MultiFab r_hse (base_state[level], make_alias, 0, 1); // r_0 is first component
35  MultiFab p_hse (base_state[level], make_alias, 1, 1); // p_0 is second component
36  MultiFab pi_hse(base_state[level], make_alias, 2, 1); // pi_0 is second component
37 
38  MultiFab* r0 = &r_hse;
39  MultiFab* p0 = &p_hse;
40  MultiFab* pi0 = &pi_hse;
41 
42  Real* dptr_rayleigh_tau = solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping ? d_rayleigh_tau[level].data() : nullptr;
43  Real* dptr_rayleigh_ubar = solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping ? d_rayleigh_ubar[level].data() : nullptr;
44  Real* dptr_rayleigh_vbar = solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping ? d_rayleigh_vbar[level].data() : nullptr;
45  Real* dptr_rayleigh_wbar = solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping ? d_rayleigh_wbar[level].data() : nullptr;
46  Real* dptr_rayleigh_thetabar = solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping ? d_rayleigh_thetabar[level].data() : nullptr;
47 
48  bool l_use_terrain = solverChoice.use_terrain;
49  bool l_use_diff = ( (solverChoice.molec_diff_type != MolecDiffType::None) ||
50  (solverChoice.les_type != LESType::None) ||
51  (solverChoice.pbl_type != PBLType::None) );
52  bool l_use_kturb = ( (solverChoice.les_type != LESType::None) ||
53  (solverChoice.pbl_type != PBLType::None) );
54 
55  const BoxArray& ba = cons_old.boxArray();
56  const BoxArray& ba_z = zvel_old.boxArray();
57  const DistributionMapping& dm = cons_old.DistributionMap();
58 
59  MultiFab S_prim (ba , dm, NUM_PRIM, cons_old.nGrowVect());
60  MultiFab pi_stage (ba , dm, 1, cons_old.nGrowVect());
61  MultiFab fast_coeffs(ba_z, dm, 5, 0);
62  MultiFab* eddyDiffs;
63  MultiFab* SmnSmn;
64  if (l_use_kturb) {
65  eddyDiffs = new MultiFab(ba, dm, EddyDiff::NumDiffs, 1);
66  if(solverChoice.les_type == LESType::Deardorff) SmnSmn = new MultiFab(ba, dm, 1, 0);
67  } else {
68  eddyDiffs = nullptr;
69  SmnSmn = nullptr;
70  }
71 
72  // **************************************************************************************
73  // Compute strain for use in slow RHS, Smagorinsky model, and MOST
74  // **************************************************************************************
75  BoxArray ba12 = convert(ba, IntVect(1,1,0));
76  BoxArray ba13 = convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,1));
77  BoxArray ba23 = convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,1));
78  MultiFab* Tau11 = nullptr;
79  MultiFab* Tau22 = nullptr;
80  MultiFab* Tau33 = nullptr;
81  MultiFab* Tau12 = nullptr;
82  MultiFab* Tau13 = nullptr;
83  MultiFab* Tau23 = nullptr;
84  MultiFab* Tau21 = nullptr;
85  MultiFab* Tau31 = nullptr;
86  MultiFab* Tau32 = nullptr;
87  {
88  BL_PROFILE("erf_advance_strain");
89  if (l_use_diff) {
90  Tau11 = new MultiFab(ba , dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
91  Tau22 = new MultiFab(ba , dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
92  Tau33 = new MultiFab(ba , dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
93  Tau12 = new MultiFab(ba12, dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
94  Tau13 = new MultiFab(ba13, dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
95  Tau23 = new MultiFab(ba23, dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
96  if (l_use_terrain) {
97  Tau21 = new MultiFab(ba12, dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
98  Tau31 = new MultiFab(ba13, dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
99  Tau32 = new MultiFab(ba23, dm, 1, IntVect(1,1,0));
100  }
101 
102  const amrex::BCRec* bc_ptr_h = domain_bcs_type.data();
103  const GpuArray<Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM> dxInv = fine_geom.InvCellSizeArray();
104 
105  for ( MFIter mfi(cons_new,TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
106  {
107  Box bx = mfi.tilebox();
108  Box bxcc = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(1,1,0));
109  Box tbxxy = bx; tbxxy.convert(IntVect(1,1,0));
110  Box tbxxz = bx; tbxxz.convert(IntVect(1,0,1));
111  Box tbxyz = bx; tbxyz.convert(IntVect(0,1,1));
112 
113  // Fill strain ghost cells for building K_turb
114  tbxxy.growLo(0,1);tbxxy.growLo(1,1);
115  tbxxz.growLo(0,1);tbxxz.growLo(1,1);
116  tbxyz.growLo(0,1);tbxyz.growLo(1,1);
117  tbxxy.growHi(0,1);tbxxy.growHi(1,1);
118  tbxxz.growHi(0,1);tbxxz.growHi(1,1);
119  tbxyz.growHi(0,1);tbxyz.growHi(1,1);
120 
121  const Array4<const Real> & u = xvel_old.array(mfi);
122  const Array4<const Real> & v = yvel_old.array(mfi);
123  const Array4<const Real> & w = zvel_old.array(mfi);
124 
125  Array4<Real> tau11 = Tau11->array(mfi);
126  Array4<Real> tau22 = Tau22->array(mfi);
127  Array4<Real> tau33 = Tau33->array(mfi);
128  Array4<Real> tau12 = Tau12->array(mfi);
129  Array4<Real> tau13 = Tau13->array(mfi);
130  Array4<Real> tau23 = Tau23->array(mfi);
131 
132  Array4<Real> tau21 = l_use_terrain ? Tau21->array(mfi) : Array4<Real>{};
133  Array4<Real> tau31 = l_use_terrain ? Tau31->array(mfi) : Array4<Real>{};
134  Array4<Real> tau32 = l_use_terrain ? Tau32->array(mfi) : Array4<Real>{};
135  const Array4<const Real>& z_nd = l_use_terrain ? z_phys_nd[level]->const_array(mfi) : Array4<const Real>{};
136 
137  const Array4<const Real> mf_m = mapfac_m[level]->array(mfi);
138  const Array4<const Real> mf_u = mapfac_u[level]->array(mfi);
139  const Array4<const Real> mf_v = mapfac_v[level]->array(mfi);
140 
141  if (l_use_terrain) {
142  ComputeStrain_T(bxcc, tbxxy, tbxxz, tbxyz,
143  u, v, w,
144  tau11, tau22, tau33,
145  tau12, tau13,
146  tau21, tau23,
147  tau31, tau32,
148  z_nd, bc_ptr_h, dxInv,
149  mf_m, mf_u, mf_v);
150  } else {
151  ComputeStrain_N(bxcc, tbxxy, tbxxz, tbxyz,
152  u, v, w,
153  tau11, tau22, tau33,
154  tau12, tau13, tau23,
155  bc_ptr_h, dxInv,
156  mf_m, mf_u, mf_v);
157  }
158  } // mfi
159  } // l_use_diff
160  } // profile
161 
162 
163  MultiFab Omega (zmom_old.boxArray(),dm,1,1);
164 
165 #include "TI_utils.H"
166 
167  amrex::Vector<amrex::MultiFab> state_old;
168  amrex::Vector<amrex::MultiFab> state_new;
169 
170  // **************************************************************************************
171  // Here we define state_old and state_new which are to be advanced
172  // **************************************************************************************
173  {
174  BL_PROFILE("erf_advance_part_1");
175  // Initial solution
176  state_old.push_back(MultiFab(cons_old, amrex::make_alias, 0, nvars)); // cons
177  state_old.push_back(MultiFab(xmom_old, amrex::make_alias, 0, 1)); // xmom
178  state_old.push_back(MultiFab(ymom_old, amrex::make_alias, 0, 1)); // ymom
179  state_old.push_back(MultiFab(zmom_old, amrex::make_alias, 0, 1)); // zmom
180 
181  // Final solution
182  state_new.push_back(MultiFab(cons_new, amrex::make_alias, 0, nvars)); // cons
183  state_new.push_back(MultiFab(xmom_new, amrex::make_alias, 0, 1)); // xmom
184  state_new.push_back(MultiFab(ymom_new, amrex::make_alias, 0, 1)); // ymom
185  state_new.push_back(MultiFab(zmom_new, amrex::make_alias, 0, 1)); // zmom
186  } // profile
187 
188  // *************************************************************************
189  // Calculate cell-centered eddy viscosity & diffusivities
190  //
191  // Notes -- we fill all the data in ghost cells before calling this so
192  // that we can fill the eddy viscosity in the ghost regions and
193  // not have to call a boundary filler on this data itself
194  //
195  // LES - updates both horizontal and vertical eddy viscosity components
196  // PBL - only updates vertical eddy viscosity components so horizontal
197  // components come from the LES model or are left as zero.
198  // *************************************************************************
199  if (l_use_kturb)
200  {
201  ComputeTurbulentViscosity(xvel_old, yvel_old,
202  *Tau11, *Tau22, *Tau33,
203  *Tau12, *Tau13, *Tau23,
204  state_old[IntVar::cons],
205  *eddyDiffs, fine_geom, *mapfac_u[level], *mapfac_v[level],
206  solverChoice, m_most);
207  }
208 
209  // ***********************************************************************************************
210  // Convert old velocity available on faces to old momentum on faces to be used in time integration
211  // ***********************************************************************************************
212  {
213  BL_PROFILE("pre_set_up_mri");
214  VelocityToMomentum(xvel_old, xvel_old.nGrowVect(),
215  yvel_old, yvel_old.nGrowVect(),
216  zvel_old, zvel_old.nGrowVect(),
217  state_old[IntVar::cons],
218  state_old[IntVar::xmom],
219  state_old[IntVar::ymom],
220  state_old[IntVar::zmom]);
221 
222  MultiFab::Copy(xvel_new,xvel_old,0,0,1,xvel_old.nGrowVect());
223  MultiFab::Copy(yvel_new,yvel_old,0,0,1,yvel_old.nGrowVect());
224  MultiFab::Copy(zvel_new,zvel_old,0,0,1,zvel_old.nGrowVect());
225 
226  bool fast_only = false;
227  bool vel_and_mom_synced = true;
228  apply_bcs(state_old, old_time,
229  state_old[IntVar::cons].nGrow(), state_old[IntVar::xmom].nGrow(), fast_only,
230  vel_and_mom_synced);
231  cons_to_prim(state_old[IntVar::cons], state_old[IntVar::cons].nGrow());
232  } // profile
233 
234 #ifdef ERF_USE_MOISTURE
235  PlaneAverage qv_ave(&qvapor, geom[level], solverChoice.ave_plane);
236  PlaneAverage qc_ave(&qcloud, geom[level], solverChoice.ave_plane);
237  PlaneAverage qi_ave(&qice, geom[level], solverChoice.ave_plane);
238 
239  // Compute plane averages
240  qv_ave.compute_averages(ZDir(), qv_ave.field());
241  qc_ave.compute_averages(ZDir(), qc_ave.field());
242  qi_ave.compute_averages(ZDir(), qi_ave.field());
243 
244  // get plane averaged data
245  int ncell = qv_ave.ncell_line();
246 
247  Gpu::HostVector <Real> qv_h(ncell), qi_h(ncell), qc_h(ncell);
248  Gpu::DeviceVector<Real> qv_d(ncell), qc_d(ncell), qi_d(ncell);
249 
250  // Fill the vectors with the line averages computed above
251  qv_ave.line_average(0, qv_h);
252  qi_ave.line_average(0, qi_h);
253  qc_ave.line_average(0, qc_h);
254 
255 
256  // Copy data to device
257  Gpu::copyAsync(Gpu::hostToDevice, qv_h.begin(), qv_h.end(), qv_d.begin());
258  Gpu::copyAsync(Gpu::hostToDevice, qi_h.begin(), qi_h.end(), qi_d.begin());
259  Gpu::copyAsync(Gpu::hostToDevice, qc_h.begin(), qc_h.end(), qc_d.begin());
260  Gpu::streamSynchronize();
261 #endif
262 
263 #include "TI_no_substep_fun.H"
264 #include "TI_slow_rhs_fun.H"
265 #include "TI_fast_rhs_fun.H"
266 
267  // ***************************************************************************************
268  // Setup the integrator and integrate for a single timestep
269  // **************************************************************************************
270  MRISplitIntegrator<Vector<MultiFab> >& mri_integrator = *mri_integrator_mem[level];
271 
272  {
273  BL_PROFILE("set_up_mri_integrator");
274  // Define rhs and 'post update' utility function that is called after calculating
275  // any state data (e.g. at RK stages or at the end of a timestep)
276  mri_integrator.set_slow_rhs_pre(slow_rhs_fun_pre);
277  mri_integrator.set_slow_rhs_post(slow_rhs_fun_post);
278  mri_integrator.set_pre_update (pre_update_fun);
279  mri_integrator.set_post_update(post_update_fun);
280 
281  mri_integrator.set_fast_rhs(fast_rhs_fun);
282  mri_integrator.set_slow_fast_timestep_ratio(fixed_mri_dt_ratio > 0 ? fixed_mri_dt_ratio : dt_mri_ratio[level]);
283  mri_integrator.set_no_substep(no_substep_fun);
284  } // profile
285 
286  mri_integrator.advance(state_old, state_new, old_time, dt_advance);
287 
288  if (l_use_kturb) delete eddyDiffs;
289 
290  if(solverChoice.les_type == LESType::Deardorff) delete SmnSmn;
291 
292  if (l_use_diff) {
293  delete Tau11;
294  delete Tau22;
295  delete Tau33;
296  delete Tau12;
297  delete Tau13;
298  delete Tau23;
299  if (l_use_terrain) {
300  delete Tau21;
301  delete Tau31;
302  delete Tau32;
303  }
304  }
305 
306  if (verbose) Print() << "Done with advance at level " << level << std::endl;
307 }
ComputeStrain_N
void ComputeStrain_N(Box &bxcc, Box &tbxxy, Box &tbxxz, Box &tbxyz, const Array4< const Real > &u, const Array4< const Real > &v, const Array4< const Real > &w, Array4< Real > &tau11, Array4< Real > &tau22, Array4< Real > &tau33, Array4< Real > &tau12, Array4< Real > &tau13, Array4< Real > &tau23, const BCRec *bc_ptr, const GpuArray< Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &dxInv, const Array4< const Real > &mf_m, const Array4< const Real > &mf_u, const Array4< const Real > &mf_v)

Definition: IndexDefines.H:206
SolverChoice::use_terrain
bool use_terrain
Definition: DataStruct.H:366
SolverChoice::use_rayleigh_damping
bool use_rayleigh_damping
Definition: DataStruct.H:378
SolverChoice::les_type
LESType les_type
Definition: DataStruct.H:411
SolverChoice::molec_diff_type
MolecDiffType molec_diff_type
Definition: DataStruct.H:399
SolverChoice::ave_plane
int ave_plane
Definition: DataStruct.H:463
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ erf_enforce_hse()

void ERF::erf_enforce_hse ( int  lev,
amrex::MultiFab &  dens,
amrex::MultiFab &  pres,
amrex::MultiFab &  pi,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  z_cc,
std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > &  z_nd 
)
126 {
127  amrex::Real l_gravity = solverChoice.gravity;
128  bool l_use_terrain = solverChoice.use_terrain;
129 
130  const auto geomdata = geom[lev].data();
131  const Real dz = geomdata.CellSize(2);
132  int nz = geom[lev].Domain().length(2);
133 
134  const Box& domain = geom[lev].Domain();
135 
136  for ( MFIter mfi(dens, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi )
137  {
138  // Create a flat box with same horizontal extent but only one cell in vertical
139  const Box& tbz = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
140  amrex::Box b2d = tbz; // Copy constructor
141  b2d.grow(0,1); b2d.grow(1,1); // Grow by one in the lateral directions
142  b2d.setRange(2,0);
143 
144  // We integrate to the first cell (and below) by using rho in this cell
145  // If gravity == 0 this is constant pressure
146  // If gravity != 0, hence this is a wall, this gives gp0 = dens[0] * gravity
147  // (dens_hse*gravity would also be dens[0]*gravity because we use foextrap for rho at k = -1)
148  // Note ng_pres_hse = 1
149 
150  // We start by assuming pressure on the ground is p_0 (in ERF_Constants.H)
151  // Note that gravity is positive
152 
153  Array4<Real> rho_arr = dens.array(mfi);
154  Array4<Real> pres_arr = pres.array(mfi);
155  Array4<Real> pi_arr = pi.array(mfi);
156  Array4<Real> zcc_arr;
157  Array4<Real> znd_arr;
158  if (l_use_terrain) {
159  zcc_arr = z_cc->array(mfi);
160  znd_arr = z_nd->array(mfi);
161  }
162 
163  const Real rdOcp = solverChoice.rdOcp;
164 
165  ParallelFor(b2d, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int)
166  {
167  int k0 = 0;
168  // Physical height of the terrain at cell center
169  Real hz;
170  if (l_use_terrain) {
171  hz = .125 * ( znd_arr(i,j,0) + znd_arr(i+1,j,0) + znd_arr(i,j+1,0) + znd_arr(i+1,j+1,0)
172  +znd_arr(i,j,1) + znd_arr(i+1,j,1) + znd_arr(i,j+1,1) + znd_arr(i+1,j+1,1) );
173  } else {
174  hz = 0.5*dz;
175  }
176 
177  // Set value at surface from Newton iteration for rho
178  pres_arr(i,j,k0 ) = p_0 - hz * rho_arr(i,j,k0) * l_gravity;
179  pi_arr(i,j,k0 ) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k0 ), rdOcp);
180 
181  // Set ghost cell with dz and rho at boundary
182  pres_arr(i,j,k0-1) = p_0 + hz * rho_arr(i,j,k0) * l_gravity;
183  pi_arr(i,j,k0-1) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k0-1), rdOcp);
184 
185  Real dens_interp;
186  if (l_use_terrain) {
187  for (int k = 1; k <= nz; k++) {
188 #if 0
189  Real dz_loc = (zcc_arr(i,j,k) - zcc_arr(i,j,k-1));
190  dens_interp = 0.5*(rho_arr(i,j,k) + rho_arr(i,j,k-1));
191  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(i,j,k-1) - dz_loc * dens_interp * l_gravity;
192 #else
193  Real z_face_lo = 0.25 * (znd_arr(i,j,k-1) + znd_arr(i+1,j,k-1) + znd_arr(i,j+1,k-1) + znd_arr(i+1,j+1,k-1));
194  Real z_face_md = 0.25 * (znd_arr(i,j,k ) + znd_arr(i+1,j,k ) + znd_arr(i,j+1,k ) + znd_arr(i+1,j+1,k ));
195  Real z_face_hi = 0.25 * (znd_arr(i,j,k+1) + znd_arr(i+1,j,k+1) + znd_arr(i,j+1,k+1) + znd_arr(i+1,j+1,k+1));
196  Real z_cc_hi = 0.5 * (z_face_md + z_face_hi);
197  Real z_cc_lo = 0.5 * (z_face_md + z_face_lo);
198 
199  // Real dz_lo = z_face_md - z_cc_lo;
200  // Real dz_hi = z_cc_hi - z_face_md;
201  Real dz_lo = 0.5 * (z_cc_hi - z_cc_lo);
202  Real dz_hi = 0.5 * (z_cc_hi - z_cc_lo);
203  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(i,j,k-1) - (dz_lo * rho_arr(i,j,k-1)) * l_gravity
204  - (dz_hi * rho_arr(i,j,k )) * l_gravity;
205 #endif
206 
207  pi_arr(i,j,k) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k), rdOcp);
208  }
209  } else {
210  for (int k = 1; k <= nz; k++) {
211  dens_interp = 0.5*(rho_arr(i,j,k) + rho_arr(i,j,k-1));
212  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(i,j,k-1) - dz * dens_interp * l_gravity;
213  pi_arr(i,j,k) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k), rdOcp);
214  }
215  }
216  });
217 
218  int domlo_x = domain.smallEnd(0); int domhi_x = domain.bigEnd(0);
219  int domlo_y = domain.smallEnd(1); int domhi_y = domain.bigEnd(1);
220 
221  if (pres[mfi].box().smallEnd(0) < domlo_x)
222  {
223  Box bx = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
224  bx.setSmall(0,domlo_x-1);
225  bx.setBig(0,domlo_x-1);
226  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
227  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(domlo_x,j,k);
228  pi_arr(i,j,k) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k), rdOcp);
229  });
230  }
231 
232  if (pres[mfi].box().bigEnd(0) > domhi_x)
233  {
234  Box bx = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
235  bx.setSmall(0,domhi_x+1);
236  bx.setBig(0,domhi_x+1);
237  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
238  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(domhi_x,j,k);
239  pi_arr(i,j,k) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k), rdOcp);
240  });
241  }
242 
243  if (pres[mfi].box().smallEnd(1) < domlo_y)
244  {
245  Box bx = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
246  bx.setSmall(1,domlo_y-1);
247  bx.setBig(1,domlo_y-1);
248  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
249  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(i,domlo_y,k);
250  pi_arr(i,j,k) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k), rdOcp);
251  });
252  }
253 
254  if (pres[mfi].box().bigEnd(1) > domhi_y)
255  {
256  Box bx = mfi.nodaltilebox(2);
257  bx.setSmall(1,domhi_y+1);
258  bx.setBig(1,domhi_y+1);
259  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
260  pres_arr(i,j,k) = pres_arr(i,domhi_y,k);
261  pi_arr(i,j,k) = getExnergivenP(pres_arr(i,j,k), rdOcp);
262  });
263  }
264  }
265  dens.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
266  pres.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
267 }
getExnergivenP
AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real getExnergivenP(const amrex::Real P, const amrex::Real rdOcp)
Definition: EOS.H:52
p_0
constexpr amrex::Real p_0
Definition: ERF_Constants.H:17
MicVar::pres
@ pres
Definition: IndexDefines.H:221

amrex::Real rdOcp
Definition: DataStruct.H:388
SolverChoice::gravity
amrex::Real gravity

12  const int tagval = TagBox::SET;

14  {

18  ref_tags[j](tags,mf.get(),clearval,tagval,time,level,geom[level]);

◆ estTimeStep()

Real ERF::estTimeStep ( int  lev,
long &  dt_fast_ratio 
) const
41 {
42  BL_PROFILE("ERF::estTimeStep()");
43 
44  amrex::Real estdt_comp = 1.e20;
45  amrex::Real estdt_lowM = 1.e20;
46 
47  auto const dxinv = geom[level].InvCellSizeArray();
48 
49  MultiFab const& S_new = vars_new[level][Vars::cons];
50 
51  MultiFab ccvel(grids[level],dmap[level],3,0);
52 
53  average_face_to_cellcenter(ccvel,0,
54  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[level][Vars::xvel],
55  &vars_new[level][Vars::yvel],
56  &vars_new[level][Vars::zvel]});
57 
58  Real estdt_comp_inv = amrex::ReduceMax(S_new, ccvel, 0,
59  [=] AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE (Box const& b,
60  Array4<Real const> const& s,
61  Array4<Real const> const& u) -> Real
62  {
63  Real new_comp_dt = -1.e100;
64  amrex::Loop(b, [=,&new_comp_dt] (int i, int j, int k) noexcept
65  {
66  const amrex::Real rho = s(i, j, k, Rho_comp);
67  const amrex::Real rhotheta = s(i, j, k, RhoTheta_comp);
68 
69  // NOTE: even when moisture is present,
70  // we only use the partial pressure of the dry air
71  // to compute the soundspeed
72  amrex::Real pressure = getPgivenRTh(rhotheta);
73  amrex::Real c = std::sqrt(Gamma * pressure / rho);
74 
75  new_comp_dt = amrex::max(((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,0))+c)*dxinv[0]),
76  ((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,1))+c)*dxinv[1]),
77  ((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,2))+c)*dxinv[2]), new_comp_dt);
78  });
79  return new_comp_dt;
80  });
81 
82  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealMax(estdt_comp_inv);
83  estdt_comp = cfl / estdt_comp_inv;;
84 
85  Real estdt_lowM_inv = amrex::ReduceMax(ccvel, 0,
86  [=] AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE (Box const& b,
87  Array4<Real const> const& u) -> Real
88  {
89  Real new_lm_dt = -1.e100;
90  amrex::Loop(b, [=,&new_lm_dt] (int i, int j, int k) noexcept
91  {
92  new_lm_dt = amrex::max(((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,0)))*dxinv[0]),
93  ((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,1)))*dxinv[1]),
94  ((amrex::Math::abs(u(i,j,k,2)))*dxinv[2]), new_lm_dt);
95  });
96  return new_lm_dt;
97  });
98 
99  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealMax(estdt_lowM_inv);
100  if (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0_rt)
101  estdt_lowM = cfl / estdt_lowM_inv;;
102 
103  if (verbose) {
104  if (fixed_dt <= 0.0) {
105  amrex::Print() << "Using cfl = " << cfl << std::endl;
106  amrex::Print() << "Fast dt at level " << level << ": " << estdt_comp << std::endl;
107  if (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0_rt) {
108  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << ": " << estdt_lowM << std::endl;
109  } else {
110  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << ": undefined " << std::endl;
111  }
112  }
113  if (fixed_dt > 0.0) {
114  amrex::Print() << "Based on cfl of 1.0 " << std::endl;
115  amrex::Print() << "Fast dt at level " << level << " would be: " << estdt_comp/cfl << std::endl;
116  if (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0_rt) {
117  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << " would be: " << estdt_lowM/cfl << std::endl;
118  } else {
119  amrex::Print() << "Slow dt at level " << level << " would be undefined " << std::endl;
120  }
121  amrex::Print() << "Fixed dt at level " << level << " is: " << fixed_dt << std::endl;
122  if (fixed_fast_dt > 0.0) {
123  amrex::Print() << "Fixed fast dt at level " << level << " is: " << fixed_fast_dt << std::endl;
124  }
125  }
126  }
127 
128  if (fixed_dt > 0. && fixed_fast_dt > 0.) {
129  dt_fast_ratio = static_cast<long>( fixed_dt / fixed_fast_dt );
130  } else if (fixed_dt > 0.) {
131  dt_fast_ratio = static_cast<long>( std::ceil((fixed_dt/estdt_comp)) );
132  } else {
133  dt_fast_ratio = (estdt_lowM_inv > 0.0) ? static_cast<long>( std::ceil((estdt_lowM/estdt_comp)) ) : 1;
134  }
135 
136  // Force time step ratio to be an even value
137  if ( dt_fast_ratio%2 != 0) dt_fast_ratio += 1;
138 
139  if (verbose)
140  amrex::Print() << "smallest even ratio is: " << dt_fast_ratio << std::endl;
141 
142  if (fixed_dt > 0.0) {
143  return fixed_dt;
144  } else {
145  if (no_substepping) {
146  return estdt_comp;
147  } else {
148  return estdt_lowM;
149  }
150  }
151 }
getPgivenRTh

◆ Evolve()

void ERF::Evolve ( )
193 {
194  Real cur_time = t_new[0];
195 
196  // Take one coarse timestep by calling timeStep -- which recursively calls timeStep
197  // for finer levels (with or without subcycling)
198  for (int step = istep[0]; step < max_step && cur_time < stop_time; ++step)
199  {
200  amrex::Print() << "\nCoarse STEP " << step+1 << " starts ..." << std::endl;
201 
202  ComputeDt();
203 
204  // Make sure we have read enough of the boundary plane data to make it through this timestep
205  if (input_bndry_planes)
206  {
207  m_r2d->read_input_files(cur_time,dt[0],m_bc_extdir_vals);
208  }
209 
210  int lev = 0;
211  int iteration = 1;
212  timeStep(lev, cur_time, iteration);
213 
214  cur_time += dt[0];
215 
216  amrex::Print() << "Coarse STEP " << step+1 << " ends." << " TIME = " << cur_time
217  << " DT = " << dt[0] << std::endl;
218 
219  post_timestep(step, cur_time, dt[0]);
220 
221  if (plot_int_1 > 0 && (step+1) % plot_int_1 == 0) {
222  last_plot_file_step_1 = step+1;
223  WritePlotFile(1,plot_var_names_1);
224  }
225  if (plot_int_2 > 0 && (step+1) % plot_int_2 == 0) {
226  last_plot_file_step_2 = step+1;
227  WritePlotFile(2,plot_var_names_2);
228  }
229 
230  if (check_int > 0 && (step+1) % check_int == 0) {
231  last_check_file_step = step+1;
232 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
233  if (check_type == "netcdf") {
234  WriteNCCheckpointFile();
235  }
236 #endif
237  if (check_type == "native") {
238  WriteCheckpointFile();
239  }
240  }
241 
242 #ifdef AMREX_MEM_PROFILING
243  {
244  std::ostringstream ss;
245  ss << "[STEP " << step+1 << "]";
246  MemProfiler::report(ss.str());
247  }
248 #endif
249 
250  if (cur_time >= stop_time - 1.e-6*dt[0]) break;
251  }
252 
253  if (plot_int_1 > 0 && istep[0] > last_plot_file_step_1) {
254  WritePlotFile(1,plot_var_names_1);
255  }
256  if (plot_int_2 > 0 && istep[0] > last_plot_file_step_2) {
257  WritePlotFile(2,plot_var_names_2);
258  }
259 
260  if (check_int > 0 && istep[0] > last_check_file_step) {
261 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
262  if (check_type == "netcdf") {
263  WriteNCCheckpointFile();
264  }
265 #endif
266  if (check_type == "native") {
267  WriteCheckpointFile();
268  }
269  }
270 
271 }

◆ fill_from_bndryregs()

void ERF::fill_from_bndryregs ( const amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab * > &  mfs,
const amrex::Real  time 
)
15 {
16  //
17  // We now assume that if we read in on one face, we read in on all faces
18  //
19  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(m_r2d);
20 
21  int lev = 0;
22  const Box& domain = geom[lev].Domain();
23 
24  const auto& dom_lo = amrex::lbound(domain);
25  const auto& dom_hi = amrex::ubound(domain);
26 
27  amrex::Vector<std::unique_ptr<PlaneVector>>& bndry_data = m_r2d->interp_in_time(time);
28 
29  // xlo: ori = 0
30  // ylo: ori = 1
31  // zlo: ori = 2
32  // xhi: ori = 3
33  // yhi: ori = 4
34  // zhi: ori = 5
35  const auto& bdatxlo = (*bndry_data[0])[lev].const_array();
36  const auto& bdatylo = (*bndry_data[1])[lev].const_array();
37  const auto& bdatxhi = (*bndry_data[3])[lev].const_array();
38  const auto& bdatyhi = (*bndry_data[4])[lev].const_array();
39 
40  int bccomp;
41 
42  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx)
43  {
44  MultiFab& mf = *mfs[var_idx];
45  const int icomp = 0;
46  const int ncomp = mf.nComp();
47 
48  if (var_idx == Vars::xvel) {
49  bccomp = BCVars::xvel_bc;
50  } else if (var_idx == Vars::yvel) {
51  bccomp = BCVars::yvel_bc;
52  } else if (var_idx == Vars::zvel) {
53  bccomp = BCVars::zvel_bc;
54  } else if (var_idx == Vars::cons) {
55  bccomp = BCVars::cons_bc;
56  }
57 
58 #ifdef AMREX_USE_OMP
59 #pragma omp parallel if (Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
60 #endif
61  for (MFIter mfi(mf); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
62  {
63  const Array4<Real>& dest_arr = mf.array(mfi);
64  Box bx = mfi.validbox();
65 
66  // x-faces
67  {
68  Box bx_xlo(bx);
69  bx_xlo.setSmall(0,dom_lo.x-1); bx_xlo.setBig(0,dom_lo.x-1);
70  bx_xlo.setSmall(1,dom_lo.y); bx_xlo.setBig(1,dom_hi.y);
71  bx_xlo.setSmall(2,dom_lo.z); bx_xlo.setBig(2,dom_hi.z);
72  if (var_idx == Vars::xvel) {
73  bx_xlo.setSmall(0,dom_lo.x); bx_xlo.setBig(0,dom_lo.x);
74  } else {
75  bx_xlo.setSmall(0,dom_lo.x-1); bx_xlo.setBig(0,dom_lo.x-1);
76  }
77 
78  Box bx_xhi(bx);
79  bx_xhi.setSmall(1,dom_lo.y ); bx_xhi.setBig(1,dom_hi.y );
80  bx_xhi.setSmall(2,dom_lo.z ); bx_xhi.setBig(2,dom_hi.z );
81  bx_xhi.setSmall(0,dom_hi.x+1); bx_xhi.setBig(0,dom_hi.x+1);
82 
83  ParallelFor(
84  bx_xlo, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) {
85  int jb = std::min(std::max(j,dom_lo.y),dom_hi.y);
86  int kb = std::min(std::max(k,dom_lo.z),dom_hi.z);
87  dest_arr(i,j,k,icomp+n) = bdatxlo(dom_lo.x-1,jb,kb,bccomp+n);
88  },
89  bx_xhi, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) {
90  int jb = std::min(std::max(j,dom_lo.y),dom_hi.y);
91  int kb = std::min(std::max(k,dom_lo.z),dom_hi.z);
92  dest_arr(i,j,k,icomp+n) = bdatxhi(dom_hi.x+1,jb,kb,bccomp+n);
93  }
94  );
95  } // x-faces
96 
97  // y-faces
98  {
99  Box bx_ylo(bx);
100  bx_ylo.setSmall(0,dom_lo.x); bx_ylo.setBig(0,dom_hi.x);
101  bx_ylo.setSmall(1,dom_lo.y); bx_ylo.setBig(1,dom_lo.y);
102  if (var_idx == Vars::yvel) {
103  bx_ylo.setSmall(1,dom_lo.y); bx_ylo.setBig(1,dom_lo.y);
104  } else {
105  bx_ylo.setSmall(1,dom_lo.y-1); bx_ylo.setBig(1,dom_lo.y-1);
106  }
107 
108  Box bx_yhi(bx);
109  bx_yhi.setSmall(0,dom_lo.x ); bx_yhi.setBig(0,dom_hi.x);
110  bx_yhi.setSmall(2,dom_lo.z ); bx_yhi.setBig(2,dom_hi.z);
111  bx_yhi.setSmall(1,dom_hi.y+1); bx_yhi.setBig(1,dom_hi.y+1);
112 
113  ParallelFor(
114  bx_ylo, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) {
115  int ib = std::min(std::max(i,dom_lo.x),dom_hi.x);
116  int kb = std::min(std::max(k,dom_lo.z),dom_hi.z);
117  dest_arr(i,j,k,icomp+n) = bdatylo(ib,dom_lo.y-1,kb,bccomp+n);
118  },
119  bx_yhi, ncomp, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k, int n) {
120  int ib = std::min(std::max(i,dom_lo.x),dom_hi.x);
121  int kb = std::min(std::max(k,dom_lo.z),dom_hi.z);
122  dest_arr(i,j,k,icomp+n) = bdatyhi(ib,dom_hi.y+1,kb,bccomp+n);
123  }
124  );
125  } // y-faces
126  } // mf
127  } // var_idx
128 }

@ zvel_bc

◆ FillCoarsePatch()

void ERF::FillCoarsePatch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab * > &  mfs 
)
private
195 {
196  BL_PROFILE_VAR("FillCoarsePatch()",FillCoarsePatch);
197  AMREX_ASSERT(lev > 0);
198 
199  int icomp = 0;
200  int bccomp;
201  amrex::Interpolater* mapper;
202 
203  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < mfs.size(); ++var_idx) {
204 
205  if (var_idx == Vars::cons)
206  {
207  bccomp = 0;
208  bccomp = 0;
209  mapper = &cell_cons_interp;
210  }
211  else if (var_idx == Vars::xvel || var_idx == Vars::xmom)
212  {
213  bccomp = NVAR;
214  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
215  }
216  else if (var_idx == Vars::yvel || var_idx == Vars::ymom)
217  {
218  bccomp = NVAR+1;
219  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
220  }
221  else if (var_idx == Vars::zvel || var_idx == Vars::zmom)
222  {
223  bccomp = NVAR+2;
224  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
225  }
226 
227  amrex::InterpFromCoarseLevel(*mfs[var_idx], time, vars_new[lev-1][var_idx],
228  icomp, icomp, mfs[var_idx]->nComp(),
229  geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
230  null_bc, 0, null_bc, 0, refRatio(lev-1),
231  mapper, domain_bcs_type, bccomp);
232  }
233 
234  // ***************************************************************************
235  // Physical bc's at domain boundary
236  // ***************************************************************************
237  IntVect ngvect_cons = mfs[Vars::cons]->nGrowVect();
238  IntVect ngvect_vels = mfs[Vars::xvel]->nGrowVect();
239  bool cons_only = false;
240 
241  (*physbcs[lev])(mfs,0,mfs[Vars::cons]->nComp(),ngvect_cons,ngvect_vels,time,cons_only);
242 
243  // ***************************************************************************
244  // Since lev > 0 here we don't worry about m_r2d or wrfbdy data
245  // ***************************************************************************
246 }
null_bc
PhysBCFunctNoOp null_bc

◆ FillIntermediatePatch()

void ERF::FillIntermediatePatch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab * > &  mfs,
int  ng_cons,
int  ng_vel,
bool  cons_only,
int  scomp_cons,
int  ncomp_cons,
amrex::MultiFab *  eddyDiffs,
bool  allow_most_bcs = true 
)
private
102 {
103  BL_PROFILE_VAR("FillIntermediatePatch()",FillIntermediatePatch);
104  int bccomp;
105  amrex::Interpolater* mapper;
106 
107  // We should always pass cons, xvel, yvel, and zvel (in that order) in the mfs vector
108  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(mfs.size() == Vars::NumTypes);
109 
110  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx)
111  {
112  if (cons_only && var_idx != Vars::cons) continue;
113 
114  MultiFab& mf = *mfs[var_idx];
115 
116  IntVect ngvect;
117  int icomp, ncomp;
118  if (var_idx == Vars::cons)
119  {
120  bccomp = icomp_cons;
121  mapper = &cell_cons_interp;
122  ngvect = IntVect(ng_cons,ng_cons,ng_cons);
123  icomp = icomp_cons;
124  ncomp = ncomp_cons;
125  }
126  else if (var_idx == Vars::xvel)
127  {
128  bccomp = BCVars::xvel_bc;
129  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
130  ngvect = IntVect(ng_vel,ng_vel,ng_vel);
131  icomp = 0;
132  ncomp = 1;
133  }
134  else if (var_idx == Vars::yvel)
135  {
136  bccomp = BCVars::yvel_bc;
137  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
138  ngvect = IntVect(ng_vel,ng_vel,ng_vel);
139  icomp = 0;
140  ncomp = 1;
141  }
142  else if (var_idx == Vars::zvel)
143  {
144  bccomp = BCVars::zvel_bc;
145  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
146  ngvect = IntVect(ng_vel,ng_vel,0);
147  icomp = 0;
148  ncomp = 1;
149  }
150 
151  if (lev == 0)
152  {
153  mf.FillBoundary(icomp,ncomp,ngvect,geom[lev].periodicity());
154  }
155  else
156  {
157  Vector<MultiFab*> fmf = {&mf};
158  Vector<MultiFab*> cmf = {&vars_old[lev-1][var_idx], &vars_new[lev-1][var_idx]};
159  Vector<Real> ctime = {t_old[lev-1], t_new[lev-1]};
160 
161  amrex::FillPatchTwoLevels(mf, time, cmf, ctime, fmf, {time},
162  icomp, icomp, ncomp, geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
163  null_bc, 0, null_bc, 0, refRatio(lev-1),
164  mapper, domain_bcs_type, bccomp);
165  }
166  }
167 
168  // ***************************************************************************
169  // Physical bc's at domain boundary
170  // ***************************************************************************
171  IntVect ngvect_cons = IntVect(ng_cons,ng_cons,ng_cons);
172  IntVect ngvect_vels = IntVect(ng_vel ,ng_vel ,ng_vel);
173 
174  (*physbcs[lev])(mfs,icomp_cons,ncomp_cons,ngvect_cons,ngvect_vels,time,cons_only);
175  // ***************************************************************************
176 
177  if (m_r2d) fill_from_bndryregs(mfs,time);
178 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
179  if (init_type == "real") fill_from_wrfbdy(mfs,time);
180 #endif
181 
182  //
183  // It is important that we apply the MOST bcs after we have imposed all the others
184  // so that we have enough information in the ghost cells to calculate the viscosity
185  //
186  if (!(cons_only && ncomp_cons == 1) && m_most && allow_most_bcs)
187  m_most->impose_most_bcs(lev,mfs,eddyDiffs);
188 }
ERF::fill_from_bndryregs
void fill_from_bndryregs(const amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab * > &mfs, const amrex::Real time)
Definition: BoundaryConditions_bndryreg.cpp:14
ERF::FillIntermediatePatch
void FillIntermediatePatch(int lev, amrex::Real time, const amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab * > &mfs, int ng_cons, int ng_vel, bool cons_only, int scomp_cons, int ncomp_cons, amrex::MultiFab *eddyDiffs, bool allow_most_bcs=true)
Definition: ERF_FillPatch.cpp:96

◆ FillPatch()

void ERF::FillPatch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf 
)
private
17 {
18  BL_PROFILE_VAR("ERF::FillPatch()",ERF_FillPatch);
19  int bccomp;
20  amrex::Interpolater* mapper = nullptr;
21 
22  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx) {
23  MultiFab& mf = *mfs[var_idx];
24  const int icomp = 0;
25  const int ncomp = mf.nComp();
26 
27  if (var_idx == Vars::cons)
28  {
29  bccomp = 0;
30  mapper = &cell_cons_interp;
31  }
32  else if (var_idx == Vars::xvel)
33  {
34  bccomp = BCVars::xvel_bc;
35  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
36  }
37  else if (var_idx == Vars::yvel)
38  {
39  bccomp = BCVars::yvel_bc;
40  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
41  }
42  else if (var_idx == Vars::zvel)
43  {
44  bccomp = BCVars::zvel_bc;
45  mapper = &face_linear_interp;
46  } else {
47  amrex::Abort("Dont recognize this variable type in ERF_Fillpatch");
48  }
49 
50  if (lev == 0)
51  {
52  Vector<MultiFab*> fmf = {&vars_old[lev][var_idx], &vars_new[lev][var_idx]};
53  Vector<Real> ftime = {t_old[lev], t_new[lev]};
54  amrex::FillPatchSingleLevel(mf, time, fmf, ftime, icomp, icomp, ncomp,
55  geom[lev], null_bc, bccomp);
56  }
57  else
58  {
59  Vector<MultiFab*> fmf = {&vars_old[lev][var_idx], &vars_new[lev][var_idx]};
60  Vector<Real> ftime = {t_old[lev], t_new[lev]};
61  Vector<MultiFab*> cmf = {&vars_old[lev-1][var_idx], &vars_new[lev-1][var_idx]};
62  Vector<Real> ctime = {t_old[lev-1], t_new[lev-1]};
63 
64  amrex::FillPatchTwoLevels(mf, time, cmf, ctime, fmf, ftime,
65  0, icomp, ncomp, geom[lev-1], geom[lev],
66  null_bc, bccomp, null_bc, bccomp, refRatio(lev-1),
67  mapper, domain_bcs_type, bccomp);
68  } // lev > 0
69  } // var_idx
70 
71  // ***************************************************************************
72  // Physical bc's at domain boundary
73  // ***************************************************************************
74  bool cons_only = false;
75  int icomp_cons = 0;
76  int ncomp_cons = mfs[Vars::cons]->nComp();
77 
78  IntVect ngvect_cons = mfs[Vars::cons]->nGrowVect();
79  IntVect ngvect_vels = mfs[Vars::xvel]->nGrowVect();
80 
81  (*physbcs[lev])(mfs,icomp_cons,ncomp_cons,ngvect_cons,ngvect_vels,time,cons_only);
82 
83  if (m_r2d) fill_from_bndryregs(mfs,time);
84 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
85  if (init_type == "real") fill_from_wrfbdy(mfs,time);
86 #endif
87 }

AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::FluxRegister& ERF::get_flux_reg ( int  lev)

◆ getCPUTime()

amrex::Real ERF::getCPUTime ( ) const
inlineprivate
802  {
803  int numCores = amrex::ParallelDescriptor::NProcs();
804 #ifdef _OPENMP
805  numCores = numCores * omp_get_max_threads();
806 #endif
807 
808  amrex::Real T =
809  numCores * (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::second() - startCPUTime) +
810  previousCPUTimeUsed;
811 
812  return T;
813  }

◆ init_bcs()

void ERF::init_bcs ( )
private
10 {
11  auto f = [this] (std::string const& bcid, Orientation ori)
12  {
13  // These are simply defaults for Dirichlet faces -- they should be over-written below
14  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = 1.0;
15  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = -1.0; // It is important to set this negative
16  // because the sign is tested on below
17  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
18  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
19  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
20 
21  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = 0.0; // default
22  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
23  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
24 
25  // These are simply defaults for Neumann gradients -- they should be over-written below
26  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
27  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
28  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
29  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
30  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp][ori] = 0.0;
31  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
32  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
33  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = 0.0;
34 
35 
36  ParmParse pp(bcid);
37  std::string bc_type_in = "null";
38  pp.query("type", bc_type_in);
39  //if (pp.query("type", bc_type_in))
40  // amrex::Print() << "INPUT BC TYPE " << bcid << " " << bc_type_in << std::endl;
41  std::string bc_type = amrex::toLower(bc_type_in);
42 
43  if (bc_type == "symmetry")
44  {
45  // amrex::Print() << bcid << " set to symmetry.\n";
46 
47  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::symmetry;
48  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Symmetry";
49  }
50  else if (bc_type == "outflow")
51  {
52  // amrex::Print() << bcid << " set to outflow.\n";
53 
54  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::outflow;
55  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Outflow";
56  }
57  else if (bc_type == "inflow")
58  {
59  // amrex::Print() << bcid << " set to inflow.\n";
60 
61  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::inflow;
62  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Inflow";
63 
64  std::vector<Real> v;
65  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_velocity()) {
66  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = 0.;
67  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = 0.;
68  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = 0.;
69  } else {
70  pp.getarr("velocity", v, 0, AMREX_SPACEDIM);
71  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = v[0];
72  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = v[1];
73  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = v[2];
74  }
75 
76  Real rho_in;
77  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_density()) {
78  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
79  } else {
80  pp.get("density", rho_in);
81  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in;
82  }
83  Real theta_in;
84  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_theta()) {
85  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
86  } else {
87  pp.get("theta", theta_in);
88  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*theta_in;
89  }
90  Real scalar_in = 0.;
91  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_scalar()) {
92  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
93  } else {
94  if (pp.query("scalar", scalar_in))
95  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*scalar_in;
96  }
97 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
98  Real qt_in = 0.;
99  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_qt()) {
100  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQt_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
101  } else {
102  if (pp.query("qt", qt_in))
103  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQt_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*qt_in;
104  }
105  Real qp_in = 0.;
106  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_qp()) {
107  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQp_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
108  } else {
109  if (pp.query("qp", qp_in))
110  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQp_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*qp_in;
111  }
112 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
113  Real qv_in = 0.;
114  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_qv()) {
115  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQv_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
116  } else {
117  if (pp.query("qv", qv_in))
118  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQv_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*qv_in;
119  }
120  Real qc_in = 0.;
121  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_qc()) {
122  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQc_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
123  } else {
124  if (pp.query("qc", qc_in))
125  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQc_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*qc_in;
126  }
127 #endif
128  Real KE_in = 0.;
129  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_KE()) {
130  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
131  } else {
132  if (pp.query("KE", KE_in))
133  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*KE_in;
134  }
135  Real QKE_in = 0.;
136  if (input_bndry_planes && m_r2d->ingested_QKE()) {
137  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp][ori] = 0.;
138  } else {
139  if (pp.query("QKE", QKE_in))
140  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in*QKE_in;
141  }
142 
143  }
144  else if (bc_type == "noslipwall")
145  {
146  // amrex::Print() << bcid <<" set to no-slip wall.\n";
147 
148  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::no_slip_wall;
149  domain_bc_type[ori] = "NoSlipWall";
150 
151  std::vector<Real> v;
152 
153  // The values of m_bc_extdir_vals default to 0.
154  // But if we find "velocity" in the inputs file, use those values instead.
155  if (pp.queryarr("velocity", v, 0, AMREX_SPACEDIM))
156  {
157  v[ori.coordDir()] = 0.0;
158  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::xvel_bc][ori] = v[0];
159  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::yvel_bc][ori] = v[1];
160  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::zvel_bc][ori] = v[2];
161  }
162 
163  Real rho_in;
164  if (pp.query("density", rho_in))
165  {
166  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in;
167  }
168 
169  Real theta_in;
170  if (pp.query("theta", theta_in))
171  {
172  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = theta_in*m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori];
173  }
174 
175  Real theta_grad_in;
176  if (pp.query("theta_grad", theta_grad_in))
177  {
178  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = theta_grad_in;
179  }
180  }
181  else if (bc_type == "slipwall")
182  {
183  // amrex::Print() << bcid <<" set to slip wall.\n";
184 
185  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::slip_wall;
186  domain_bc_type[ori] = "SlipWall";
187 
188  Real rho_in;
189  if (pp.query("density", rho_in))
190  {
191  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = rho_in;
192  }
193 
194  Real theta_in;
195  if (pp.query("theta", theta_in))
196  {
197  m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = theta_in*m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori];
198  }
199 
200  Real rho_grad_in;
201  if (pp.query("density_grad", rho_grad_in))
202  {
203  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori] = rho_grad_in;
204  }
205 
206  Real theta_grad_in;
207  if (pp.query("theta_grad", theta_grad_in))
208  {
209  m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] = theta_grad_in;
210  }
211  }
212  else if (bc_type == "most")
213  {
214  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::MOST;
215  domain_bc_type[ori] = "MOST";
216  }
217  else
218  {
219  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::undefined;
220  }
221 
222  if (geom[0].isPeriodic(ori.coordDir())) {
223  domain_bc_type[ori] = "Periodic";
224  if (phys_bc_type[ori] == ERF_BC::undefined)
225  {
226  phys_bc_type[ori] = ERF_BC::periodic;
227  } else {
228  amrex::Abort("Wrong BC type for periodic boundary");
229  }
230  }
231 
232  if (phys_bc_type[ori] == ERF_BC::undefined)
233  {
234  amrex::Print() << "BC Type specified for face " << bcid << " is " << bc_type_in << std::endl;
235  amrex::Abort("This BC type is unknown");
236  }
237  };
238 
239  f("xlo", Orientation(Direction::x,Orientation::low));
240  f("xhi", Orientation(Direction::x,Orientation::high));
241  f("ylo", Orientation(Direction::y,Orientation::low));
242  f("yhi", Orientation(Direction::y,Orientation::high));
243  f("zlo", Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low));
244  f("zhi", Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::high));
245 
246  // *****************************************************************************
247  //
248  // Here we translate the physical boundary conditions -- one type per face --
249  // into logical boundary conditions for each velocity component
250  //
251  // *****************************************************************************
252  {
253  domain_bcs_type.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM+NVAR);
254  domain_bcs_type_d.resize(AMREX_SPACEDIM+NVAR);
255 
256  for (OrientationIter oit; oit; ++oit) {
257  Orientation ori = oit();
258  int dir = ori.coordDir();
259  Orientation::Side side = ori.faceDir();
260  auto const bct = phys_bc_type[ori];
261  if ( bct == ERF_BC::symmetry )
262  {
263  if (side == Orientation::low) {
264  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
265  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_even);
266  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_odd);
267  } else {
268  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
269  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_even);
270  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_odd);
271  }
272  }
273  else if (bct == ERF_BC::outflow)
274  {
275  if (side == Orientation::low) {
276  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
277  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
278  } else {
279  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
280  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
281  }
282  }
283  else if (bct == ERF_BC::inflow)
284  {
285  if (side == Orientation::low) {
286  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++) {
287  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
288  if (input_bndry_planes && dir < 2 && m_r2d->ingested_velocity()) {
289  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir_ingested);
290  }
291  }
292  } else {
293  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++) {
294  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
295  if (input_bndry_planes && dir < 2 && m_r2d->ingested_velocity()) {
296  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir_ingested);
297  }
298  }
299  }
300  }
301  else if (bct == ERF_BC::no_slip_wall)
302  {
303  if (side == Orientation::low) {
304  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
305  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
306  } else {
307  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
308  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
309  }
310  }
311  else if (bct == ERF_BC::slip_wall)
312  {
313  if (side == Orientation::low) {
314  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
315  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
316  // Only normal direction has ext_dir
317  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
318 
319  } else {
320  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
321  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
322  // Only normal direction has ext_dir
323  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+dir].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
324  }
325  }
326  else if (bct == ERF_BC::periodic)
327  {
328  if (side == Orientation::low) {
329  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
330  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::int_dir);
331  } else {
332  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; i++)
333  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::int_dir);
334  }
335  }
336  else if ( bct == ERF_BC::MOST )
337  {
338  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(dir == 2 && side == Orientation::low);
339  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+0].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_odd);
340  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+1].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_odd);
341  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::xvel_bc+2].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
342  }
343  }
344  }
345 
346  // *****************************************************************************
347  //
348  // Here we translate the physical boundary conditions -- one type per face --
349  // into logical boundary conditions for each cell-centered variable
350  //
351  // *****************************************************************************
352  {
353  for (OrientationIter oit; oit; ++oit) {
354  Orientation ori = oit();
355  int dir = ori.coordDir();
356  Orientation::Side side = ori.faceDir();
357  auto const bct = phys_bc_type[ori];
358  if ( bct == ERF_BC::symmetry )
359  {
360  if (side == Orientation::low) {
361  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
362  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_even);
363  } else {
364  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
365  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::reflect_even);
366  }
367  }
368  else if ( bct == ERF_BC::outflow )
369  {
370  if (side == Orientation::low) {
371  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
372  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
373  } else {
374  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
375  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
376  }
377  }
378  else if ( bct == ERF_BC::no_slip_wall)
379  {
380  if (side == Orientation::low) {
381  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
382  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
383  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
384  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
385  if (std::abs(m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori]) > 0.)
386  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::neumann);
387  } else {
388  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
389  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
390  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
391  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
392  if (std::abs(m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori]) > 0.)
393  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::neumann);
394  }
395  }
396  else if (bct == ERF_BC::slip_wall)
397  {
398  if (side == Orientation::low) {
399  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
400  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
401  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
402  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
403  if (std::abs(m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori]) > 0.)
404  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::neumann);
405  if (std::abs(m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori]) > 0.)
406  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::neumann);
407  } else {
408  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
409  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
410  if (m_bc_extdir_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori] > 0.)
411  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
412  if (std::abs(m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp][ori]) > 0.)
413  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::neumann);
414  if (std::abs(m_bc_neumann_vals[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp][ori]) > 0.)
415  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::Rho_bc_comp].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::neumann);
416  }
417  }
418  else if (bct == ERF_BC::inflow)
419  {
420  if (side == Orientation::low) {
421  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++) {
422  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
423  if (input_bndry_planes && dir < 2 && (
424  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::Rho_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_density()) ||
425  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_theta() ) ||
426  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_KE() ) ||
427  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_QKE() ) ||
428  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_scalar() )
429 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
430  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQt_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qt() )
431  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQp_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qp() )
432 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
433  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQv_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qv() )
434  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQc_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qc() )
435 #endif
436  ) ) {
437  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir_ingested);
438  }
439  }
440  } else {
441  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++) {
442  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir);
443  if (input_bndry_planes && dir < 2 && (
444  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::Rho_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_density()) ||
445  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoTheta_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_theta() ) ||
446  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoKE_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_KE() ) ||
447  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQKE_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_QKE() ) ||
448  ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoScalar_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_scalar() )
449 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
450  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQt_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qt() )
451  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQp_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qp() )
452 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
453  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQv_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qv() )
454  || ( (BCVars::cons_bc+i == BCVars::RhoQc_bc_comp) && m_r2d->ingested_qc() )
455 #endif
456  ) ) {
457  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::ext_dir_ingested);
458  }
459  }
460  }
461  }
462  else if (bct == ERF_BC::periodic)
463  {
464  if (side == Orientation::low) {
465  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
466  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::int_dir);
467  } else {
468  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++)
469  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setHi(dir, ERFBCType::int_dir);
470  }
471  }
472  else if ( bct == ERF_BC::MOST )
473  {
474  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(dir == 2 && side == Orientation::low);
475  for (int i = 0; i < NVAR; i++) {
476  domain_bcs_type[BCVars::cons_bc+i].setLo(dir, ERFBCType::foextrap);
477  }
478  }
479  }
480  }
481 
482 #ifdef AMREX_USE_GPU
483  Gpu::htod_memcpy
484  (domain_bcs_type_d.data(), domain_bcs_type.data(),
485  sizeof(amrex::BCRec)*(NVAR+AMREX_SPACEDIM));
486 #else
487  std::memcpy
488  (domain_bcs_type_d.data(), domain_bcs_type.data(),
489  sizeof(amrex::BCRec)*(NVAR+AMREX_SPACEDIM));
490 #endif
491 }
ERF_BC::slip_wall
@ slip_wall
ERF_BC::symmetry
@ symmetry
ERF_BC::undefined
@ undefined
ERF_BC::outflow
@ outflow
ERF_BC::no_slip_wall
@ no_slip_wall
ERF_BC::inflow

pp
AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real pp(amrex::Real y)
Definition: Microphysics_Utils.H:187
ERF::m_bc_neumann_vals
amrex::Array< amrex::Array< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM *2 >, AMREX_SPACEDIM+NVAR > m_bc_neumann_vals
Definition: ERF.H:575

amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::BCRec > domain_bcs_type_d

amrex::Array< std::string, 2 *AMREX_SPACEDIM > domain_bc_type
