Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ init_bx_scalars_from_input_sounding()

void ERF::init_bx_scalars_from_input_sounding ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  state,
amrex::GeometryData const &  geomdata,
InputSoundingData const &  inputSoundingData 
)
379 {
380  const Real* z_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.z_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
381  const Real* theta_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.theta_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
382 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
383  const Real* qv_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.qv_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
384 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
385  const Real* qv_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.qv_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
386 #endif
387  const int inp_sound_size = inputSoundingData.size();
388 
389  // We want to set the lateral BC values, too
390  Box gbx = bx; // Copy constructor
391  gbx.grow(0,1); gbx.grow(1,1); // Grow by one in the lateral directions
392 
393  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
394  // Geometry
395  const amrex::Real* prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
396  const amrex::Real* dx = geomdata.CellSize();
397  const amrex::Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
398 
399  amrex::Real rho_0 = 1.0;
400 
401  // Set the density
402  state(i, j, k, Rho_comp) = rho_0;
403 
404  // Initial Rho0*Theta0
405  state(i, j, k, RhoTheta_comp) = rho_0 * interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, theta_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
406 
407  // Set scalar = A_0*exp(-10r^2), where r is distance from center of domain
408  state(i, j, k, RhoScalar_comp) = 0;
409 
410  // total nonprecipitating water (Qt) == water vapor (Qv), i.e., there is no cloud water or cloud ice
411 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
412  state(i, j, k, RhoQt_comp) = rho_0 * interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, qv_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
413 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
414  state(i, j, k, RhoQv_comp) = rho_0 * interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, qv_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
415 #endif
416  });
417 }
Coord::z
@ z
interpolate_1d
AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real interpolate_1d(const amrex::Real *alpha, const amrex::Real *beta, const amrex::Real alpha_interp, const int alpha_size)
Definition: ERF_Math.H:6
RhoScalar_comp
#define RhoScalar_comp
Definition: IndexDefines.H:12
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ init_bx_scalars_from_input_sounding_hse()

void ERF::init_bx_scalars_from_input_sounding_hse ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  state,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  r_hse_arr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  p_hse_arr,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  pi_hse_arr,
amrex::GeometryData const &  geomdata,
InputSoundingData const &  inputSoundingData 
)
428 {
429  const Real* z_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.z_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
430  const Real* rho_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.rho_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
431  const Real* theta_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.theta_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
432 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
433  const Real* qv_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.qv_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
434 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
435  const Real* qv_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.qv_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
436 #endif
437  const int inp_sound_size = inputSoundingData.size();
438 
439  amrex::Real l_gravity = solverChoice.gravity;
440 
441  // We want to set the lateral BC values, too
442  Box gbx = bx; // Copy constructor
443  gbx.grow(0,1); gbx.grow(1,1); // Grow by one in the lateral directions
444 
445  const Real rdOcp = solverChoice.rdOcp;
446 
447  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
448  // Geometry
449  const amrex::Real* prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
450  const amrex::Real* dx = geomdata.CellSize();
451  const amrex::Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
452  int ktop = bx.bigEnd(2);
453 
454  Real rho_k, rhoTh_k;
455 
456  // Set the density
457  rho_k = interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, rho_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
458  state(i, j, k, Rho_comp) = rho_k;
459 
460  // Initial Rho0*Theta0
461  rhoTh_k = rho_k * interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, theta_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
462  state(i, j, k, RhoTheta_comp) = rhoTh_k;
463 
464  // Set scalar = A_0*exp(-10r^2), where r is distance from center of domain
465  state(i, j, k, RhoScalar_comp) = 0;
466 
467  // Update hse quantities with values calculated from InputSoundingData.calc_rho_p()
468  r_hse_arr (i, j, k) = rho_k;
469  p_hse_arr (i, j, k) = getPgivenRTh(rhoTh_k); // NOTE WE ONLY USE THE DRY AIR PRESSURE
470  pi_hse_arr(i, j, k) = getExnergivenRTh(rhoTh_k, rdOcp);
471 
472  // Boundary treatment
473  if (k==0)
474  {
475  // set the ghost cell with dz and rho at boundary
476  amrex::Real rho_surf =
477  interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, rho_inp_sound, 0.0, inp_sound_size);
478  p_hse_arr (i, j, k-1) = p_hse_arr(i,j,k) + dx[2] * rho_surf * l_gravity;
479  pi_hse_arr(i, j, k-1) = getExnergivenP(p_hse_arr(i, j, k-1), rdOcp);
480  }
481  else if (k==ktop)
482  {
483  // set the ghost cell with dz and rho at boundary
484  amrex::Real rho_top =
485  interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, rho_inp_sound, z+dx[2]/2, inp_sound_size);
486  p_hse_arr (i, j, k+1) = p_hse_arr(i,j,k) - dx[2] * rho_top * l_gravity;
487  pi_hse_arr(i, j, k+1) = getExnergivenP(p_hse_arr(i, j, k+1), rdOcp);
488  }
489 
490 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
491  // total nonprecipitating water (Qt) == water vapor (Qv), i.e., there
492  // is no cloud water or cloud ice
493  state(i, j, k, RhoQt_comp) = rho_k * interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, qv_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
494 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
495  state(i, j, k, RhoQv_comp) = rho_k * interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, qv_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
496 #endif
497  });
498 }
getExnergivenRTh
AMREX_GPU_HOST_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real getExnergivenRTh(const amrex::Real rhotheta, const amrex::Real rdOcp)
Definition: EOS.H:59
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ init_bx_velocities_from_input_sounding()

void ERF::init_bx_velocities_from_input_sounding ( const amrex::Box &  bx,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  x_vel,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  y_vel,
amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &  z_vel,
amrex::GeometryData const &  geomdata,
InputSoundingData const &  inputSoundingData 
)
508 {
509  const Real* z_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.z_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
510  const Real* U_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.U_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
511  const Real* V_inp_sound = inputSoundingData.V_inp_sound_d.dataPtr();
512  const int inp_sound_size = inputSoundingData.size();
513 
514  // We want to set the lateral BC values, too
515  Box gbx = bx; // Copy constructor
516  gbx.grow(0,1); gbx.grow(1,1); // Grow by one in the lateral directions
517 
518  // Construct a box that is on x-faces
519  const amrex::Box& xbx = amrex::surroundingNodes(gbx,0);
520  // Construct a box that is on y-faces
521  const amrex::Box& ybx = amrex::surroundingNodes(gbx,1);
522  // Construct a box that is on z-faces
523  const amrex::Box& zbx = amrex::surroundingNodes(gbx,2);
524 
525  // Set the x,y,z-velocities
526  amrex::ParallelFor(xbx, ybx, zbx,
527  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
528  // Note that this is called on a box of x-faces
529  const amrex::Real* prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
530  const amrex::Real* dx = geomdata.CellSize();
531  const amrex::Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
532 
533  // Set the x-velocity
534  x_vel(i, j, k) = interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, U_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
535  },
536  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
537  // Note that this is called on a box of y-faces
538  const amrex::Real* prob_lo = geomdata.ProbLo();
539  const amrex::Real* dx = geomdata.CellSize();
540  const amrex::Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
541 
542  // Set the y-velocity
543  y_vel(i, j, k) = interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, V_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
544  },
545  [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
546  // Note that this is called on a box of z-faces
547  // Set the z-velocity
548  z_vel(i, j, k) = 0.0;
549  });
550 }
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ init_custom()

void ERF::init_custom ( int  lev)
private
554 {
555  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
556 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
557  auto& qv_new = qv[lev];
558  auto& qc_new = qc[lev];
559  auto& qi_new = qi[lev];
560 #endif
561  MultiFab r_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 0, 1); // r_0 is first component
562  MultiFab p_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 1, 1); // p_0 is second component
563 
564  MultiFab cons_pert(lev_new[Vars::cons].boxArray(), lev_new[Vars::cons].DistributionMap(),
565  lev_new[Vars::cons].nComp() , lev_new[Vars::cons].nGrow());
566  MultiFab xvel_pert(lev_new[Vars::xvel].boxArray(), lev_new[Vars::xvel].DistributionMap(), 1, lev_new[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
567  MultiFab yvel_pert(lev_new[Vars::yvel].boxArray(), lev_new[Vars::yvel].DistributionMap(), 1, lev_new[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
568  MultiFab zvel_pert(lev_new[Vars::zvel].boxArray(), lev_new[Vars::zvel].DistributionMap(), 1, lev_new[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
569 
570  // Default all perturbations to zero
571  cons_pert.setVal(0.);
572  xvel_pert.setVal(0.);
573  yvel_pert.setVal(0.);
574  zvel_pert.setVal(0.);
575 
576 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
577  MultiFab qv_pert(qv[lev].boxArray(), qv[lev].DistributionMap(), 1, qv[lev].nGrow());
578  MultiFab qc_pert(qc[lev].boxArray(), qc[lev].DistributionMap(), 1, qc[lev].nGrow());
579  MultiFab qi_pert(qi[lev].boxArray(), qi[lev].DistributionMap(), 1, qi[lev].nGrow());
580  qv_pert.setVal(0.);
581  qc_pert.setVal(0.);
582  qi_pert.setVal(0.);
583 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
584  MultiFab qv_pert(cons_pert.boxArray(), cons_pert.DistributionMap(), 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
585  MultiFab qc_pert(cons_pert.boxArray(), cons_pert.DistributionMap(), 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
586  qv_pert.setVal(0.);
587  qc_pert.setVal(0.);
588 #endif
589 
590 #ifdef _OPENMP
591 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
592 #endif
593  for (MFIter mfi(lev_new[Vars::cons], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
594  {
595  const Box &bx = mfi.tilebox();
596 
597  const auto &cons_pert_arr = cons_pert.array(mfi);
598  const auto &xvel_pert_arr = xvel_pert.array(mfi);
599  const auto &yvel_pert_arr = yvel_pert.array(mfi);
600  const auto &zvel_pert_arr = zvel_pert.array(mfi);
601 
602  Array4<Real const> z_nd_arr = (solverChoice.use_terrain) ? z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi) : Array4<Real const>{};
603  Array4<Real const> z_cc_arr = (solverChoice.use_terrain) ? z_phys_cc[lev]->const_array(mfi) : Array4<Real const>{};
604 
605  Array4<Real const> mf_m = mapfac_m[lev]->array(mfi);
606  Array4<Real const> mf_u = mapfac_m[lev]->array(mfi);
607  Array4<Real const> mf_v = mapfac_m[lev]->array(mfi);
608 
609  Array4<Real> r_hse_arr = r_hse.array(mfi);
610  Array4<Real> p_hse_arr = p_hse.array(mfi);
611 
612 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
613  const auto &qv_pert_arr = qv_pert.array(mfi);
614  const auto &qc_pert_arr = qc_pert.array(mfi);
615  const auto &qi_pert_arr = qi_pert.array(mfi);
616 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
617  const auto &qv_pert_arr = qv_pert.array(mfi);
618  const auto &qc_pert_arr = qc_pert.array(mfi);
619 #endif
620  init_custom_prob(bx, cons_pert_arr, xvel_pert_arr, yvel_pert_arr, zvel_pert_arr,
621  r_hse_arr, p_hse_arr, z_nd_arr, z_cc_arr,
622 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
623  qv_pert_arr, qc_pert_arr, qi_pert_arr,
624 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
625  qv_pert_arr, qc_pert_arr,
626 #endif
627  geom[lev].data(), mf_m, mf_u, mf_v,
628  solverChoice);
629  } //mfi
630 
631  // Add problem-specific perturbation to background flow
632  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, Rho_comp, Rho_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
633  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoTheta_comp, RhoTheta_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
634  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoScalar_comp,RhoScalar_comp,1, cons_pert.nGrow());
635  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoQKE_comp, RhoQKE_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
636 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
637  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoQt_comp, RhoQt_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
638  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoQp_comp, RhoQp_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
639  MultiFab::Add( qv_new, qv_pert, 0, 0, 1, qv_pert.nGrow());
640  MultiFab::Add( qc_new, qc_pert, 0, 0, 1, qc_pert.nGrow());
641  MultiFab::Add( qi_new, qi_pert, 0, 0, 1, qi_pert.nGrow());
642 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
643  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoQv_comp, RhoQv_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
644  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::cons], cons_pert, RhoQc_comp, RhoQc_comp, 1, cons_pert.nGrow());
645 #endif
646  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::xvel], xvel_pert, 0, 0, 1, xvel_pert.nGrowVect());
647  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::yvel], yvel_pert, 0, 0, 1, yvel_pert.nGrowVect());
648  MultiFab::Add(lev_new[Vars::zvel], zvel_pert, 0, 0, 1, zvel_pert.nGrowVect());
649 }
RhoQKE_comp
#define RhoQKE_comp

amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > z_phys_cc

init_custom_prob
void init_custom_prob(const amrex::Box &bx, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &state, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &x_vel, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &y_vel, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &z_vel, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &r_hse, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real > const &p_hse, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real const > const &z_nd, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real const > const &z_cc, amrex::GeometryData const &geomdata, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real const > const &mf_m, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real const > const &mf_u, amrex::Array4< amrex::Real const > const &mf_v, const SolverChoice &sc)

◆ init_from_input_sounding()

void ERF::init_from_input_sounding ( int  lev)
325 {
326  // We only want to read the file once -- here we fill one FArrayBox (per variable) that spans the domain
327  if (lev == 0) {
328  if (input_sounding_file.empty())
329  amrex::Error("input_sounding file name must be provided via input");
330  input_sounding_data.read_from_file(input_sounding_file, geom[lev]);
331 
332  if (init_sounding_ideal) input_sounding_data.calc_rho_p();
333  }
334 
335  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
336 
337  // update if init_sounding_ideal == true
338  MultiFab r_hse (base_state[lev], make_alias, 0, 1); // r_0 is first component
339  MultiFab p_hse (base_state[lev], make_alias, 1, 1); // p_0 is second component
340  MultiFab pi_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 2, 1); // pi_0 is third component
341 
342 #ifdef _OPENMP
343 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
344 #endif
345  for (MFIter mfi(lev_new[Vars::cons], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
346  const Box &bx = mfi.tilebox();
347  const auto &cons_arr = lev_new[Vars::cons].array(mfi);
348  const auto &xvel_arr = lev_new[Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
349  const auto &yvel_arr = lev_new[Vars::yvel].array(mfi);
350  const auto &zvel_arr = lev_new[Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
351  Array4<Real> r_hse_arr = r_hse.array(mfi);
352  Array4<Real> p_hse_arr = p_hse.array(mfi);
353  Array4<Real> pi_hse_arr = pi_hse.array(mfi);
354 
355  if (init_sounding_ideal)
356  {
357  init_bx_scalars_from_input_sounding_hse(bx, cons_arr,
358  r_hse_arr, p_hse_arr, pi_hse_arr,
359  geom[lev].data(), input_sounding_data);
360  }
361  else
362  {
363  // HSE arrays will be filled later with call to initHSE()
364  init_bx_scalars_from_input_sounding(bx, cons_arr,
365  geom[lev].data(), input_sounding_data);
366  }
367 
368  init_bx_velocities_from_input_sounding(bx, xvel_arr, yvel_arr, zvel_arr,
369  geom[lev].data(), input_sounding_data);
370  } //mfi
371 }
ERF::init_sounding_ideal

◆ init_only()

void ERF::init_only ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time 
)
954 {
955  t_new[lev] = time;
956  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
957 
958  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
959 
960  // Loop over grids at this level to initialize our grid data
961  lev_new[Vars::cons].setVal(0.0);
962  lev_new[Vars::xvel].setVal(0.0);
963  lev_new[Vars::yvel].setVal(0.0);
964  lev_new[Vars::zvel].setVal(0.0);
965 
966 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
967  qv[lev].setVal(0.0);
968  qc[lev].setVal(0.0);
969  qi[lev].setVal(0.0);
970  qrain[lev].setVal(0.0);
971  qsnow[lev].setVal(0.0);
972  qgraup[lev].setVal(0.0);
973 #endif
974 
975  // Initialize background flow (optional)
976  if (init_type == "input_sounding") {
977  init_from_input_sounding(lev);
978 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
979  } else if (init_type == "ideal" || init_type == "real") {
980  init_from_wrfinput(lev);
981 #endif
982  }
983 
984  // Add problem-specific flow features
985  // If init_type is specified, then this is a perturbation to the background
986  // flow from either input_sounding data or WRF WPS outputs (wrfinput_d0*)
987  init_custom(lev);
988 
989  // Ensure that the face-based data are the same on both sides of a periodic domain.
990  // The data associated with the lower grid ID is considered the correct value.
991  lev_new[Vars::xvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
992  lev_new[Vars::yvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
993  lev_new[Vars::zvel].OverrideSync(geom[lev].periodicity());
994 }
ERF::init_from_input_sounding
void init_from_input_sounding(int lev)
Definition: ERF_init.cpp:324
ERF::init_custom
void init_custom(int lev)
Definition: ERF_init.cpp:553

◆ InitData()

void ERF::InitData ( )
345 {
346  // Initialize the start time for our CPU-time tracker
347  startCPUTime = amrex::ParallelDescriptor::second();
348 
349  // Map the words in the inputs file to BC types, then translate
350  // those types into what they mean for each variable
351  init_bcs();
352 
353  // Verify BCs are compatible sith solver choice
354  if (solverChoice.pbl_type == PBLType::MYNN25 &&
355  phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] != ERF_BC::MOST) {
356  amrex::Abort("MYNN2.5 PBL Model requires MOST at lower boundary");
357  }
358 
359  last_plot_file_step_1 = -1;
360  last_plot_file_step_2 = -1;
361  last_check_file_step = -1;
362 
363  if (restart_chkfile == "") {
364  // start simulation from the beginning
365 
366  const Real time = 0.0;
367  InitFromScratch(time);
368 
369 #ifdef ERF_USE_MULTIBLOCK
370  // Multiblock: hook to set BL & comms once ba/dm are known
371  if(domain_p[0].bigEnd(0) < 500 ) {
372  m_mbc->SetBoxLists();
373  m_mbc->SetBlockCommMetaData();
374  }
375 #endif
376 
377  if (init_type == "ideal" && solverChoice.use_terrain) {
378  amrex::Abort("We do not currently support init_type = ideal with terrain");
379  } else if (init_type == "input_sounding" && solverChoice.use_terrain) {
380  amrex::Abort("We do not currently support init_type = input_sounding with terrain");
381  }
382 
383  if (!solverChoice.use_terrain && solverChoice.terrain_type != 0) {
384  amrex::Abort("We do not allow terrain_type != 0 with use_terrain = false");
385  }
386 
387  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
388  if (init_type != "real") {
389  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
390  {
391  init_custom_terrain(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],time);
392  init_terrain_grid(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev]);
393  make_J(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*detJ_cc[lev]);
394  make_zcc(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev]);
395  }
396  }
397  }
398 
399  // Note that make_J and make_zcc area now called inside init_from_wrfinput
400  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
401  init_only(lev, time);
402 
403  // For now we initialize rho_KE to 0
404  Real RhoKE_0 = 0.0;
405  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
406  pp.query("RhoKE_0", RhoKE_0);
407  int lb = std::max(finest_level-1,0);
408  for (int lev(lb); lev >= 0; --lev)
409  vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].setVal(RhoKE_0,RhoKE_comp,1,0);
410 
411  AverageDown();
412 
413  } else { // Restart from a checkpoint
414 
415  restart();
416 
417  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
418  // This must come after the call to restart because that
419  // is where we read in the mesh data
420  for (int lev = finest_level; lev >= 0; --lev) {
421  make_J (geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*detJ_cc[lev]);
422  make_zcc(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev]);
423  }
424  }
425  }
426 
427  if (input_bndry_planes) {
428  // Create the ReadBndryPlanes object so we can handle reading of boundary plane data
429  amrex::Print() << "Defining r2d for the first time " << std::endl;
430  m_r2d = std::make_unique< ReadBndryPlanes>(geom[0], solverChoice.rdOcp);
431 
432  // Read the "time.dat" file to know what data is available
433  m_r2d->read_time_file();
434 
435  amrex::Real dt_dummy = 1.e200;
436  m_r2d->read_input_files(t_new[0],dt_dummy,m_bc_extdir_vals);
437  }
438 
439  // Initialize flux registers (whether we start from scratch or restart)
440  if (do_reflux) {
441  flux_registers[0] = 0;
442  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
443  {
444  flux_registers[lev] = new FluxRegister(grids[lev], dmap[lev], ref_ratio[lev-1], lev, NVAR);
445  }
446  }
447 
448  // If we are reading initial data from wrfinput, the base state is defined there.
449  // If we are reading initial data from an input_sounding, then the base state is calculated by
450  // InputSoundingData.calc_rho_p().
451  if ((init_type != "real") && (!init_sounding_ideal)) {
452  initHSE();
453  }
454 
455 #ifdef ERF_USE_MOISTURE
456  // Initialize microphysics here
457  micro.define(solverChoice);
458 
459  // Call Init which will call Diagnose to fill qv, qc, qi
460  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
461  {
462  micro.Init(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
463  qc[lev],
464  qv[lev],
465  qi[lev],
466  Geom(lev),
467  0.0 // dummy value, not needed just to diagnose
468  );
469  micro.Update(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],
470  qv[lev],
471  qc[lev],
472  qi[lev],
473  qrain[lev],
474  qsnow[lev],
475  qgraup[lev]);
476 
477 #if 0
478  for (MFIter mfi(qv[lev]); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
479  const Box& box = mfi.growntilebox(IntVect(1,1,0));
480  // const Box& box = mfi.tilebox();
481  auto qv_arr = qv[lev].array(mfi);
482  ParallelFor(box, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
483  amrex::Print() << "QV " << IntVect(i,j,k) << " " << std::endl;
484  amrex::Print() << "QV " << qv_arr(i,j,k) << " " << std::endl;
485  });
486  }
487 #endif
488  }
489 #endif
490 
491  // Configure ABLMost params if used MostWall boundary condition
492  // NOTE: we must set up the MOST routine before calling WritePlotFile because
493  // WritePlotFile calls FillPatch in order to compute gradients
494  if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::MOST)
495  {
496  m_most = std::make_unique<ABLMost>(geom,vars_old,Theta_prim,z_phys_nd);
497 
498  // We now configure ABLMost params here so that we can print the averages at t=0
499  // Note we don't fill ghost cells here because this is just for diagnostics
500  int lev = 0; amrex::IntVect ng = IntVect(0,0,0);
501  MultiFab S(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],make_alias,0,2);
502  MultiFab::Copy( *Theta_prim[lev], S, Cons::RhoTheta, 0, 1, ng);
503  MultiFab::Divide(*Theta_prim[lev], S, Cons::Rho , 0, 1, ng);
504  m_most->update_mac_ptrs(lev, vars_new, Theta_prim);
505  m_most->update_fluxes(lev);
506  }
507 
508  if (restart_chkfile == "" && check_int > 0)
509  {
510 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
511  if (check_type == "netcdf") {
512  WriteNCCheckpointFile();
513  }
514 #endif
515  if (check_type == "native") {
516  WriteCheckpointFile();
517  }
518  last_check_file_step = 0;
519  }
520 
521  if ( (restart_chkfile == "") ||
522  (restart_chkfile != "" && plot_file_on_restart) )
523  {
524  if (plot_int_1 > 0)
525  {
526  WritePlotFile(1,plot_var_names_1);
527  last_plot_file_step_1 = istep[0];
528  }
529  if (plot_int_2 > 0)
530  {
531  WritePlotFile(2,plot_var_names_2);
532  last_plot_file_step_2 = istep[0];
533  }
534  }
535 
536  if (solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping)
537  {
538  initRayleigh();
539  if (init_type == "input_sounding")
540  {
541  // overwrite Ubar, Tbar, and thetabar with input profiles
542  bool restarting = (restart_chkfile != "");
543  setRayleighRefFromSounding(restarting);
544  }
545 
546  }
547 
548  if (is_it_time_for_action(istep[0], t_new[0], dt[0], sum_interval, sum_per)) {
549  sum_integrated_quantities(t_new[0]);
550  write_1D_profiles(t_new[0]);
551  }
552 
553  // We only write the file at level 0 for now
554  if (output_bndry_planes)
555  {
556  // Create the WriteBndryPlanes object so we can handle writing of boundary plane data
557  m_w2d = std::make_unique<WriteBndryPlanes>(grids,geom);
558 
559  amrex::Real time = 0.;
560  if (time >= bndry_output_planes_start_time) {
561  m_w2d->write_planes(0, time, vars_new);
562  }
563  }
564 
565  ComputeDt();
566 
567  // Fill ghost cells/faces
568  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
569  {
570  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
571 
572  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev],
573  {&lev_new[Vars::cons],&lev_new[Vars::xvel],&lev_new[Vars::yvel],&lev_new[Vars::zvel]});
574 
575  // For moving terrain only
576  if (solverChoice.terrain_type > 0) {
577  MultiFab::Copy(base_state_new[lev],base_state[lev],0,0,3,1);
578  base_state_new[lev].FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
579  }
580  }
581 
582 #ifdef ERF_USE_POISSON_SOLVE
583  if (restart_chkfile == "")
584  {
585  // Note -- this projection is only defined for no terrain
586  if (solverChoice.project_initial_velocity) {
587  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(solverChoice.use_terrain == 0);
588  project_initial_velocities();
589  }
590  }
591 #endif
592  // Copy from new into old just in case
593  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
594  {
595  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
596  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
597 
598  int ngs = lev_new[Vars::cons].nGrow();
599  int ngvel = lev_new[Vars::xvel].nGrow();
600 
601  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::cons],0,0,NVAR,ngs);
602  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::xvel],lev_new[Vars::xvel],0,0,1,ngvel);
603  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::yvel],lev_new[Vars::yvel],0,0,1,ngvel);
604  MultiFab::Copy(lev_old[Vars::zvel],lev_new[Vars::zvel],0,0,1,IntVect(ngvel,ngvel,0));
605  }
606 }
RhoKE_comp
#define RhoKE_comp

void ERF::initRayleigh ( )
private

Initialize Rayleigh damping profiles.

9 {
10  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(solverChoice.use_rayleigh_damping);
11 
12  h_rayleigh_tau.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Vector<Real>(0));
13  h_rayleigh_ubar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Vector<Real>(0));
14  h_rayleigh_vbar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Vector<Real>(0));
15  h_rayleigh_wbar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Vector<Real>(0));
16  h_rayleigh_thetabar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Vector<Real>(0));
17  d_rayleigh_tau.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
18  d_rayleigh_ubar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
19  d_rayleigh_vbar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
20  d_rayleigh_wbar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
21  d_rayleigh_thetabar.resize(max_level+1, amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector<Real>(0));
22

24  {
25  const int zlen_rayleigh = geom[lev].Domain().length(2);
26  h_rayleigh_tau[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
27  d_rayleigh_tau[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
28  h_rayleigh_ubar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
29  d_rayleigh_ubar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
30  h_rayleigh_vbar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
31  d_rayleigh_vbar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
32  h_rayleigh_wbar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
33  d_rayleigh_wbar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
34  h_rayleigh_thetabar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
35  d_rayleigh_thetabar[lev].resize(zlen_rayleigh, 0.0_rt);
36

38  h_rayleigh_wbar[lev], h_rayleigh_thetabar[lev], geom[lev]);
39 
40  // Copy from host version to device version
41  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_tau[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_tau[lev].end(),
42  d_rayleigh_tau[lev].begin());
43  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_ubar[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_ubar[lev].end(),
44  d_rayleigh_ubar[lev].begin());
45  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_vbar[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_vbar[lev].end(),
46  d_rayleigh_vbar[lev].begin());

◆ is_it_time_for_action()

bool ERF::is_it_time_for_action ( int  nstep,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt,
int  action_interval,
amrex::Real  action_per 
)
167 {
168  bool int_test = (action_interval > 0 && nstep % action_interval == 0);
169 
170  bool per_test = false;
171  if (action_per > 0.0) {
172  const int num_per_old = static_cast<int>(amrex::Math::floor((time - dtlev) / action_per));
173  const int num_per_new = static_cast<int>(amrex::Math::floor((time) / action_per));
174 
175  if (num_per_old != num_per_new) {
176  per_test = true;
177  }
178  }
179 
180  return int_test || per_test;
181 }

◆ MakeDiagnosticAverage()

void ERF::MakeDiagnosticAverage ( amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > &  h_havg,
amrex::MultiFab &  S,
int  n 
)
1268 {
1269  // Get the number of cells in z at level 0
1270  int dir_z = AMREX_SPACEDIM-1;
1271  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
1272  int size_z = domain.length(dir_z);
1273  int start_z = domain.smallEnd()[dir_z];
1274  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0)*domain.length(1));
1275 
1276  // resize the level 0 horizontal average vectors
1277  h_havg.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
1278 
1279  // Get the cell centered data and construct sums
1280 #ifdef _OPENMP
1281 #pragma omp parallel if (amrex::Gpu::notInLaunchRegion())
1282 #endif
1283  for (MFIter mfi(S); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
1284  const Box& box = mfi.validbox();
1285  const IntVect& se = box.smallEnd();
1286  const IntVect& be = box.bigEnd();
1287 
1288  auto fab_arr = S[mfi].array();
1289 
1290  FArrayBox fab_reduce(box, 1);
1291  Elixir elx_reduce = fab_reduce.elixir();
1292  auto arr_reduce = fab_reduce.array();
1293 
1294  ParallelFor(box, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
1295  arr_reduce(i, j, k, 0) = fab_arr(i,j,k,n);
1296  });
1297 
1298  for (int k=se[dir_z]; k <= be[dir_z]; ++k) {
1299  Box kbox(box); kbox.setSmall(dir_z,k); kbox.setBig(dir_z,k);
1300  h_havg[k-start_z] += fab_reduce.sum<RunOn::Device>(kbox,0);
1301  }
1302  }
1303 
1304  // combine sums from different MPI ranks
1305  ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(h_havg.dataPtr(), h_havg.size());
1306 
1307  // divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
1308  for (int k = 0; k < size_z; ++k) {
1309  h_havg[k] /= area_z;
1310  }
1311 }

◆ MakeHorizontalAverages()

void ERF::MakeHorizontalAverages ( )
1189 {
1190  int lev = 0;
1191 
1192  // First, average down all levels
1193  AverageDown();
1194 
1195  MultiFab mf(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 5, 0);
1196 
1197  for (MFIter mfi(mf); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
1198  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
1199  auto fab_arr = mf.array(mfi);
1200  auto cons_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].array(mfi);
1201 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
1202  auto qv_arr = qv[lev].array(mfi);
1203 #endif
1204  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
1205  Real dens = cons_arr(i, j, k, Cons::Rho);
1206  fab_arr(i, j, k, 0) = dens;
1207  fab_arr(i, j, k, 1) = cons_arr(i, j, k, Cons::RhoTheta) / dens;
1208 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
1209  fab_arr(i, j, k, 2) = getPgivenRTh(cons_arr(i, j, k, Cons::RhoTheta), qv_arr(i,j,k));
1210 #else
1211  fab_arr(i, j, k, 2) = getPgivenRTh(cons_arr(i, j, k, Cons::RhoTheta));
1212 #endif
1213 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
1214  fab_arr(i, j, k, 3) = cons_arr(i, j, k, Cons::RhoQt) / dens;
1215  fab_arr(i, j, k, 4) = cons_arr(i, j, k, Cons::RhoQp) / dens;
1216 #endif
1217  });
1218  }
1219 
1220  int zdir = 2;
1221  auto domain = geom[0].Domain();
1222 
1223  // Sum in the horizontal plane
1224  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_density = sumToLine(mf,0,1,domain,zdir);
1225  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_temperature = sumToLine(mf,1,1,domain,zdir);
1226  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_pressure = sumToLine(mf,2,1,domain,zdir);
1227 #ifdef ERF_USE_MOISTURE
1228  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_qv = sumToLine(mf,3,1,domain,zdir);
1229  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_qc = sumToLine(mf,4,1,domain,zdir);
1230 #endif
1231 
1232  // Divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
1233  int size_z = domain.length(zdir);
1234  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0)*domain.length(1));
1235  for (int k = 0; k < h_avg_density.size(); ++k) {
1236  h_havg_density[k] /= area_z;
1237  h_havg_temperature[k] /= area_z;
1238  h_havg_pressure[k] /= area_z;
1239 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
1240  h_havg_qc[k] /= area_z;
1241  h_havg_qv[k] /= area_z;
1242 #endif
1243  }
1244 
1245  // resize device vectors
1246  d_havg_density.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
1247  d_havg_temperature.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
1248  d_havg_pressure.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
1249 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
1250  d_havg_qv.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
1251  d_havg_qc.resize(size_z, 0.0_rt);
1252 #endif
1253 
1254  // copy host vectors to device vectors
1255  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_density.begin(), h_havg_density.end(), d_havg_density.begin());
1256  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_temperature.begin(), h_havg_temperature.end(), d_havg_temperature.begin());
1257  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_pressure.begin(), h_havg_pressure.end(), d_havg_pressure.begin());
1258 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
1259  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_qv.begin(), h_havg_qv.end(), d_havg_qv.begin());
1260  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_havg_qc.begin(), h_havg_qc.end(), d_havg_qc.begin());
1261 #endif
1262 }
ERF::d_havg_temperature
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > d_havg_temperature
Definition: ERF.H:722
ERF::h_havg_pressure
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > h_havg_pressure

Definition: ERF.H:714

amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > h_havg_temperature
Definition: ERF.H:715
ERF::d_havg_pressure
amrex::Gpu::DeviceVector< amrex::Real > d_havg_pressure

◆ MakeNewLevelFromCoarse()

void ERF::MakeNewLevelFromCoarse ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
overridevirtual
630 {
631  const auto& crse_new = vars_new[lev-1];
632  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
633  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
634 
635  // ********************************************************************************************
636  // These are the persistent containers for the old and new data
637  // ********************************************************************************************
638  lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, crse_new[Vars::cons].nComp(), crse_new[Vars::cons].nGrowVect());
639  lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, crse_new[Vars::cons].nComp(), crse_new[Vars::cons].nGrowVect());
640 
641  lev_new[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
642  lev_old[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
643 
644  lev_new[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
645  lev_old[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
646 
647  lev_new[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
648  lev_old[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
649 
650  // ********************************************************************************************
651  // These are just used for scratch in the time integrator but we might as well define them here
652  // ********************************************************************************************
653  rU_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
654  rU_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::xvel].nGrowVect());
655 
656  rV_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
657  rV_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::yvel].nGrowVect());
658 
659  rW_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
660  rW_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, crse_new[Vars::zvel].nGrowVect());
661 
662  t_new[lev] = time;
663  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
664 
665  define_grids_to_evolve(lev);
666 
667  FillCoarsePatch(lev, time, {&lev_new[Vars::cons],&lev_new[Vars::xvel],
668  &lev_new[Vars::yvel],&lev_new[Vars::zvel]});
669 
670  initialize_integrator(lev, lev_new[Vars::cons], lev_new[Vars::xvel]);
671 }
ERF::initialize_integrator
void initialize_integrator(int lev, amrex::MultiFab &cons_mf, amrex::MultiFab &vel_mf)
Definition: ERF.cpp:926
ERF::define_grids_to_evolve
void define_grids_to_evolve(int lev)
Definition: ERF.cpp:1339

◆ MakeNewLevelFromScratch()

void ERF::MakeNewLevelFromScratch ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
overridevirtual
770 {
771  // Set BoxArray grids and DistributionMapping dmap in AMReX_AmrMesh.H class
772  SetBoxArray(lev, ba);
773  SetDistributionMap(lev, dm);
774 
775  define_grids_to_evolve(lev);
776 
777  // The number of ghost cells for density must be 1 greater than that for velocity
778  // so that we can go back in forth betwen velocity and momentum on all faces
779  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.horiz_spatial_order, solverChoice.vert_spatial_order)+1;
780  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.horiz_spatial_order, solverChoice.vert_spatial_order);
781 
782  auto& lev_new = vars_new[lev];
783  auto& lev_old = vars_old[lev];
784 
785  lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
786  lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
787 
788  lev_new[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
789  lev_old[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
790 
791  lev_new[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
792  lev_old[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
793 
794  lev_new[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
795  lev_old[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
796 
797  // ********************************************************************************************
798  // These are just used for scratch in the time integrator but we might as well define them here
799  // ********************************************************************************************
800  rU_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
801  rU_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
802 
803  rV_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
804  rV_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
805 
806  rW_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
807  rW_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
808 
809  //********************************************************************************************
810  // Microphysics
811  // *******************************************************************************************
812 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
813  qv[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state);
814  qc[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state);
815  qi[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state);
816  qrain[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state);
817  qsnow[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state);
818  qgraup[lev].define(ba, dm, 1, ngrow_state);
819 #endif
820 
821  // ********************************************************************************************
822  // Metric terms
823  // ********************************************************************************************
824  z_phys_nd.resize(lev+1);
825  z_phys_cc.resize(lev+1);
826  detJ_cc.resize(lev+1);
827 
828  z_phys_nd_new.resize(lev+1);
829  detJ_cc_new.resize(lev+1);
830 
831  z_phys_nd_src.resize(lev+1);
832  detJ_cc_src.resize(lev+1);
833 
834  z_t_rk.resize(lev+1);
835 
836  // ********************************************************************************************
837  // Map factors
838  // ********************************************************************************************
839  BoxList bl2d = ba.boxList();
840  for (auto& b : bl2d) {
841  b.setRange(2,0);
842  }
843  BoxArray ba2d(std::move(bl2d));
844 
845  mapfac_m.resize(lev+1);
846  mapfac_u.resize(lev+1);
847  mapfac_v.resize(lev+1);
848  mapfac_m[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba2d,dm,1,3));
849  mapfac_u[lev].reset(new MultiFab(convert(ba2d,IntVect(1,0,0)),dm,1,3));
850  mapfac_v[lev].reset(new MultiFab(convert(ba2d,IntVect(0,1,0)),dm,1,3));
851  if(solverChoice.test_mapfactor) {
852  mapfac_m[lev]->setVal(0.5);
853  mapfac_u[lev]->setVal(0.5);
854  mapfac_v[lev]->setVal(0.5);
855  }
856  else {
857  mapfac_m[lev]->setVal(1.);
858  mapfac_u[lev]->setVal(1.);
859  mapfac_v[lev]->setVal(1.);
860  }
861 
862  // ********************************************************************************************
863  // Base state holds r_0, pres_0, pi_0 (in that order)
864  // ********************************************************************************************
865  base_state.resize(lev+1);
866  base_state[lev].define(ba,dm,3,1);
867  base_state[lev].setVal(0.);
868 
869  if (solverChoice.use_terrain && solverChoice.terrain_type > 0) {
870  base_state_new.resize(lev+1);
871  base_state_new[lev].define(ba,dm,3,1);
872  base_state_new[lev].setVal(0.);
873  }
874 
875  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
876  z_phys_cc[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,1));
877  detJ_cc[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,1));
878 
879  if (solverChoice.terrain_type > 0) {
880  detJ_cc_new[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,1));
881  detJ_cc_src[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,1));
882  z_t_rk[lev].reset(new MultiFab( convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, 1 ));
883  }
884 
885  BoxArray ba_nd(ba);
886  ba_nd.surroundingNodes();
887 
888  // We need this to be one greater than the ghost cells to handle levels > 0
889  int ngrow = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.horiz_spatial_order, solverChoice.vert_spatial_order)+2;
890  z_phys_nd[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,1)));
891  if (solverChoice.terrain_type > 0) {
892  z_phys_nd_new[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,1)));
893  z_phys_nd_src[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba_nd,dm,1,IntVect(ngrow,ngrow,1)));
894  }
895  } else {
896  z_phys_nd[lev] = nullptr;
897  z_phys_cc[lev] = nullptr;
898  detJ_cc[lev] = nullptr;
899 
900  z_phys_nd_new[lev] = nullptr;
901  detJ_cc_new[lev] = nullptr;
902 
903  z_phys_nd_src[lev] = nullptr;
904  detJ_cc_src[lev] = nullptr;
905 
906  z_t_rk[lev] = nullptr;
907  }
908 
909  // ********************************************************************************************
910  // Define Theta_prim storage if using MOST BC
911  // ********************************************************************************************
912  Theta_prim.resize(lev+1);
913  if (phys_bc_type[Orientation(Direction::z,Orientation::low)] == ERF_BC::MOST) {
914  Theta_prim[lev].reset(new MultiFab(ba,dm,1,{ngrow_state,ngrow_state,0}));
915  } else {
916  Theta_prim[lev] = nullptr;
917  }
918 
919  // ********************************************************************************************
920  // Initialize the integrator class
921  // ********************************************************************************************
922  initialize_integrator(lev, lev_new[Vars::cons],lev_new[Vars::xvel]);
923 }
ERF::z_phys_nd_src
amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > z_phys_nd_src
Definition: ERF.H:542
ERF::z_phys_nd_new
amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > z_phys_nd_new
Definition: ERF.H:545
ERF::z_t_rk
amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > z_t_rk
Definition: ERF.H:548
ERF::detJ_cc_src
amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > detJ_cc_src
Definition: ERF.H:543
ERF::ComputeGhostCells
AMREX_FORCE_INLINE int ComputeGhostCells(const int &horiz_spatial_order, const int &vert_spatial_order)
Definition: ERF.H:748
ERF::detJ_cc_new
amrex::Vector< std::unique_ptr< amrex::MultiFab > > detJ_cc_new
Definition: ERF.H:546
SolverChoice::horiz_spatial_order
int horiz_spatial_order

SolverChoice::test_mapfactor

◆ NumDataLogs()

AMREX_FORCE_INLINE int ERF::NumDataLogs ( )
inlineprivatenoexcept

794  return datalog.size();

◆ PlotFileVarNames()

Vector< std::string > ERF::PlotFileVarNames ( amrex::Vector< std::string >  plot_var_names) const
private
75 {
76  Vector<std::string> names;
77 
78  names.insert(names.end(), plot_var_names.begin(), plot_var_names.end());
79

◆ post_timestep()

void ERF::post_timestep ( int  nstep,
amrex::Real  time,
amrex::Real  dt_lev 
)
276 {
277  BL_PROFILE("ERF::post_timestep()");
278 
279  if (do_reflux)
280  {
281  for (int lev = finest_level-1; lev >= 0; lev--)
282  {
283  // This call refluxes from the lev/lev+1 interface onto lev
284  get_flux_reg(lev+1).Reflux(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],1.0, 0, 0, NVAR, geom[lev]);
285 
286  // We need to do this before anything else because refluxing changes the
287  // values of coarse cells underneath fine grids with the assumption they'll
288  // be over-written by averaging down
289  AverageDownTo(lev);
290  }
291  }
292 
293  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep, time, dt_lev0, sum_interval, sum_per)) {
294  sum_integrated_quantities(time);
295  write_1D_profiles(time);
296  }
297 
298  if (output_1d_column) {
299 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
300  if (is_it_time_for_action(nstep, time, dt_lev0, column_interval, column_per))
301  {
302  int lev_column = 0;
303  for (int lev = finest_level; lev >= 0; lev--)
304  {
305  Real dx_lev = geom[lev].CellSize(0);
306  Real dy_lev = geom[lev].CellSize(1);
307  int i_lev = static_cast<int>(std::floor(column_loc_x / dx_lev));
308  int j_lev = static_cast<int>(std::floor(column_loc_y / dy_lev));
309  if (grids[lev].contains(IntVect(i_lev,j_lev,0))) lev_column = lev;
310  }
311  writeToNCColumnFile(lev_column, column_file_name, column_loc_x, column_loc_y, time);
312  }
313 #else
314  amrex::Abort("To output 1D column files ERF must be compiled with NetCDF");
315 #endif
316  }
317 
318  if (output_bndry_planes)
319  {
320  if (is_it_time_for_action(istep[0], time, dt_lev0, bndry_output_planes_interval, bndry_output_planes_per) &&
321  time >= bndry_output_planes_start_time)
322  {
323  m_w2d->write_planes(istep[0], time, vars_new);
324  }
325  }
326 
327  // Moving terrain
328  if ( solverChoice.use_terrain && (solverChoice.terrain_type == 1) )
329  {
330  for (int lev = finest_level; lev >= 0; lev--)
331  {
332  // Copy z_phs_nd and detJ_cc at end of timestep
333  MultiFab::Copy(*z_phys_nd[lev], *z_phys_nd_new[lev], 0, 0, 1, z_phys_nd[lev]->nGrowVect());
334  MultiFab::Copy( *detJ_cc[lev], *detJ_cc_new[lev], 0, 0, 1, detJ_cc[lev]->nGrowVect());
335  MultiFab::Copy(base_state[lev],base_state_new[lev],0,0,3,1);
336 
337  make_zcc(geom[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev]);
338  }
339  }
340 }
ERF::column_loc_y
static amrex::Real column_loc_y
Definition: ERF.H:687
ERF::bndry_output_planes_per
static amrex::Real bndry_output_planes_per
Definition: ERF.H:693

static std::string column_file_name
Definition: ERF.H:688
ERF::column_per
static amrex::Real column_per
Definition: ERF.H:685
ERF::bndry_output_planes_interval
static int bndry_output_planes_interval
Definition: ERF.H:692
ERF::column_loc_x
static amrex::Real column_loc_x
Definition: ERF.H:686
ERF::output_1d_column
static int output_1d_column
Definition: ERF.H:683
ERF::column_interval

AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::FluxRegister & get_flux_reg(int lev)

◆ ReadCheckpointFile()

void ERF::ReadCheckpointFile ( )
private
137 {
138  amrex::Print() << "Restart from checkpoint " << restart_chkfile << "\n";
139 
140  // Header
141  std::string File(restart_chkfile + "/Header");
142 
143  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::GetIOBufferSize());
144 
145  Vector<char> fileCharPtr;
146  ParallelDescriptor::ReadAndBcastFile(File, fileCharPtr);
147  std::string fileCharPtrString(fileCharPtr.dataPtr());
148  std::istringstream is(fileCharPtrString, std::istringstream::in);
149 
150  std::string line, word;
151 
152  int chk_ncomp;
153 
154  // read in title line
155  std::getline(is, line);
156 
157  // read in finest_level
158  is >> finest_level;
159  GotoNextLine(is);
160 
161  // read the number of components
162  // for each variable we store
163 
164  // conservative, cell-centered vars
165  is >> chk_ncomp;
166  GotoNextLine(is);
167  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == Cons::NumVars);
168 
169  // x-velocity on faces
170  is >> chk_ncomp;
171  GotoNextLine(is);
172  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 1);
173 
174  // y-velocity on faces
175  is >> chk_ncomp;
176  GotoNextLine(is);
177  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 1);
178 
179  // z-velocity on faces
180  is >> chk_ncomp;
181  GotoNextLine(is);
182  AMREX_ASSERT(chk_ncomp == 1);
183 
184  // read in array of istep
185  std::getline(is, line);
186  {
187  std::istringstream lis(line);
188  int i = 0;
189  while (lis >> word) {
190  istep[i++] = std::stoi(word);
191  }
192  }
193 
194  // read in array of dt
195  std::getline(is, line);
196  {
197  std::istringstream lis(line);
198  int i = 0;
199  while (lis >> word) {
200  dt[i++] = std::stod(word);
201  }
202  }
203 
204  // read in array of t_new
205  std::getline(is, line);
206  {
207  std::istringstream lis(line);
208  int i = 0;
209  while (lis >> word) {
210  t_new[i++] = std::stod(word);
211  }
212  }
213 
214  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
215 
216  // read in level 'lev' BoxArray from Header
217  BoxArray ba;
218  ba.readFrom(is);
219  GotoNextLine(is);
220 
221  // create a distribution mapping
222  DistributionMapping dm { ba, ParallelDescriptor::NProcs() };
223 
224  MakeNewLevelFromScratch (lev, t_new[lev], ba, dm);
225  }
226 
227  // read in the MultiFab data
228  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
229  {
230  MultiFab cons(grids[lev],dmap[lev],Cons::NumVars,0);
231  VisMF::Read(cons, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "Cell"));
232  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],cons,0,0,Cons::NumVars,0);
233 
234  MultiFab xvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(1,0,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
235  VisMF::Read(xvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "XFace"));
236  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],xvel,0,0,1,0);
237 
238  MultiFab yvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,1,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
239  VisMF::Read(yvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "YFace"));
240  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],yvel,0,0,1,0);
241 
242  MultiFab zvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,0,1)),dmap[lev],1,0);
243  VisMF::Read(zvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "ZFace"));
244  MultiFab::Copy(vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel],zvel,0,0,1,0);
245 
246  MultiFab base(grids[lev],dmap[lev],base_state[lev].nComp(),0);
247  VisMF::Read(base, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "BaseState"));
248  MultiFab::Copy(base_state[lev],base,0,0,base.nComp(),0);
249  base_state[lev].FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
250 
251  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
252  // Note that we read the ghost cells of z_phys_nd (unlike above)
253  IntVect ngvect = z_phys_nd[lev]->nGrowVect();
254  MultiFab z_height(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(1,1,1)),dmap[lev],1,ngvect);
255  VisMF::Read(z_height, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, restart_chkfile, "Level_", "Z_Phys_nd"));
256  MultiFab::Copy(*z_phys_nd[lev],z_height,0,0,1,ngvect);
257  }
258  }
259 }
ERF::GotoNextLine
static void GotoNextLine(std::istream &is)
Definition: Checkpoint.cpp:8
ERF::MakeNewLevelFromScratch
virtual void MakeNewLevelFromScratch(int lev, amrex::Real time, const amrex::BoxArray &ba, const amrex::DistributionMapping &dm) override
Definition: ERF.cpp:768

◆ ReadParameters()

void ERF::ReadParameters ( )
private
999 {
1000  {
1001  ParmParse pp; // Traditionally, max_step and stop_time do not have prefix.
1002  pp.query("max_step", max_step);
1003  pp.query("stop_time", stop_time);
1004  }
1005 
1006  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
1007  ParmParse pp_amr("amr");
1008  {
1009  // The type of the file we restart from
1010  pp.query("restart_type", restart_type);
1011 
1012  pp.query("regrid_int", regrid_int);
1013  pp.query("check_file", check_file);
1014  pp.query("check_type", check_type);
1015 
1016  // The regression tests use "amr.restart" and "amr.check_int" so we allow
1017  // for those or "erf.restart" / "erf.check_int" with the former taking
1018  // precedenceif both are specified
1019  pp.query("check_int", check_int);
1020  pp_amr.query("check_int", check_int);
1021 
1022  pp.query("restart", restart_chkfile);
1023  pp_amr.query("restart", restart_chkfile);
1024 
1025  if (pp.contains("data_log"))
1026  {
1027  int num_datalogs = pp.countval("data_log");
1028  datalog.resize(num_datalogs);
1029  datalogname.resize(num_datalogs);
1030  pp.queryarr("data_log",datalogname,0,num_datalogs);
1031  for (int i = 0; i < num_datalogs; i++)
1032  setRecordDataInfo(i,datalogname[i]);
1033  }
1034 
1035  // Verbosity
1036  pp.query("v", verbose);
1037 
1038  // Use the native ERF MRI integrator
1039  pp.query("use_native_mri", use_native_mri);
1040  pp.query("no_substepping", no_substepping);
1041 
1042  // Frequency of diagnostic output
1043  pp.query("sum_interval", sum_interval);
1044  pp.query("sum_period" , sum_per);
1045 
1046  // Time step controls
1047  pp.query("cfl", cfl);
1048  pp.query("init_shrink", init_shrink);
1049  pp.query("change_max", change_max);
1050 
1051  pp.query("fixed_dt", fixed_dt);
1052  pp.query("fixed_fast_dt", fixed_fast_dt);
1053  pp.query("fixed_mri_dt_ratio", fixed_mri_dt_ratio);
1054 
1055  // If this is set, it must be even
1056  if (fixed_mri_dt_ratio > 0 && (fixed_mri_dt_ratio%2 != 0) )
1057  {
1058  amrex::Abort("If you specify fixed_mri_dt_ratio, it must be even");
1059  }
1060 
1061  // If both fixed_dt and fast_dt are specified, their ratio must be an even integer
1062  if (fixed_dt > 0. && fixed_fast_dt > 0. && fixed_mri_dt_ratio <= 0)
1063  {
1064  Real eps = 1.e-12;
1065  int ratio = ( (1.0+eps) * fixed_dt ) / fixed_fast_dt;
1066  if (fixed_dt / fixed_fast_dt != ratio)
1067  {
1068  amrex::Abort("Ratio of fixed_dt to fixed_fast_dt must be an even integer");
1069  }
1070  }
1071 
1072  // If all three are specified, they must be consistent
1073  if (fixed_dt > 0. && fixed_fast_dt > 0. && fixed_mri_dt_ratio > 0)
1074  {
1075  if (fixed_dt / fixed_fast_dt != fixed_mri_dt_ratio)
1076  {
1077  amrex::Abort("Dt is over-specfied");
1078  }
1079  }
1080 
1081  AMREX_ASSERT(cfl > 0. || fixed_dt > 0.);
1082 
1083  // Mesh refinement
1084  pp.query("coupling_type",coupling_type);
1085  if (coupling_type == "OneWay")
1086  {
1087  do_reflux = 0;
1088  do_avg_down = 0;
1089  }
1090  else if (coupling_type == "TwoWay")
1091  {
1092  do_reflux = 1;
1093  do_avg_down = 1;
1094  } else {
1095  amrex::Error("Unknown coupling type");
1096  }
1097 
1098  // How to initialize
1099  pp.query("init_type",init_type);
1100  if (init_type != "" &&
1101  init_type != "ideal" &&
1102  init_type != "real" &&
1103  init_type != "input_sounding")
1104  {
1105  amrex::Error("if specified, init_type must be ideal, real, or input_sounding");
1106  }
1107 
1108  // We use this to keep track of how many boxes we read in from WRF initialization
1109  num_files_at_level.resize(max_level+1,0);
1110 
1111  // We use this to keep track of how many boxes are specified thru the refinement indicators
1112  num_boxes_at_level.resize(max_level+1,0);
1113  boxes_at_level.resize(max_level+1);
1114 
1115  // We always have exactly one file at level 0
1116  num_boxes_at_level[0] = 1;
1117 
1118 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
1119  nc_init_file.resize(max_level+1);
1120 
1121  // NetCDF wrfinput initialization files -- possibly multiple files at each of multiple levels
1122  // but we always have exactly one file at level 0
1123  for (int lev = 0; lev <= max_level; lev++)
1124  {
1125  const std::string nc_file_names = amrex::Concatenate("nc_init_file_",lev,1);
1126  if (pp.contains(nc_file_names.c_str()))
1127  {
1128  int num_files = pp.countval(nc_file_names.c_str());
1129  num_files_at_level[lev] = num_files;
1130  nc_init_file[lev].resize(num_files);
1131  pp.queryarr(nc_file_names.c_str(), nc_init_file[lev],0,num_files);
1132  for (int j = 0; j < num_files; j++)
1133  amrex::Print() << "Reading NC init file names at level " << lev << " and index " << j << " : " << nc_init_file[lev][j] << std::endl;
1134  }
1135  }
1136 
1137  // NetCDF wrfbdy lateral boundary file
1138  pp.query("nc_bdy_file", nc_bdy_file);
1139 #endif
1140 
1141  // Text input_sounding file
1142  pp.query("input_sounding_file", input_sounding_file);
1143 
1144  // Flag to trigger initialization from input_sounding like WRF's ideal.exe
1145  pp.query("init_sounding_ideal", init_sounding_ideal);
1146 
1147  // Output format
1148  pp.query("plotfile_type", plotfile_type);
1149  if (plotfile_type != "amrex" &&
1150  plotfile_type != "netcdf" && plotfile_type != "NetCDF" &&
1151  plotfile_type != "hdf5" && plotfile_type != "HDF5" )
1152  {
1153  amrex::Print() << "User selected plotfile_type = " << plotfile_type << std::endl;
1154  amrex::Abort("Dont know this plotfile_type");
1155  }
1156  pp.query("plot_file_1", plot_file_1);
1157  pp.query("plot_file_2", plot_file_2);
1158  pp.query("plot_int_1", plot_int_1);
1159  pp.query("plot_int_2", plot_int_2);
1160 
1161  pp.query("output_1d_column", output_1d_column);
1162  pp.query("column_per", column_per);
1163  pp.query("column_interval", column_interval);
1164  pp.query("column_loc_x", column_loc_x);
1165  pp.query("column_loc_y", column_loc_y);
1166  pp.query("column_file_name", column_file_name);
1167 
1168  // Specify information about outputting planes of data
1169  pp.query("output_bndry_planes", output_bndry_planes);
1170  pp.query("bndry_output_planes_interval", bndry_output_planes_interval);
1171  pp.query("bndry_output_planes_per", bndry_output_planes_per);
1172  pp.query("bndry_output_start_time", bndry_output_planes_start_time);
1173 
1174  // Specify whether ingest boundary planes of data
1175  pp.query("input_bndry_planes", input_bndry_planes);
1176  }
1177 
1178 #ifdef ERF_USE_MULTIBLOCK
1179  solverChoice.pp_prefix = pp_prefix;
1180 #endif
1181 
1182  solverChoice.init_params();
1183 }
ERF::plot_file_2
std::string plot_file_2
Definition: ERF.H:612
ERF::setRecordDataInfo
void setRecordDataInfo(int i, const std::string &filename)
Definition: ERF.H:815

Definition: ERF.H:651
ERF::num_files_at_level
amrex::Vector< int > num_files_at_level
Definition: ERF.H:492
ERF::do_avg_down
static int do_avg_down
Definition: ERF.H:657

Definition: ERF.H:673

◆ refinement_criteria_setup()

void ERF::refinement_criteria_setup ( )
private
24 {
25  if (max_level > 0)
26  {
27  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
28  Vector<std::string> refinement_indicators;
29  pp.queryarr("refinement_indicators",refinement_indicators,0,pp.countval("refinement_indicators"));
30 
31  for (int i=0; i<refinement_indicators.size(); ++i)
32  {
33  std::string ref_prefix = pp_prefix + "." + refinement_indicators[i];
34 
35  ParmParse ppr(ref_prefix);
36  RealBox realbox;
37  int lev_for_box;
38  if (ppr.countval("in_box_lo")) {
39  std::vector<Real> box_lo(3), box_hi(3);
40  ppr.get("max_level",lev_for_box);
41  if (lev_for_box <= max_level)
42  {
43  ppr.getarr("in_box_lo",box_lo,0,2);
44  ppr.getarr("in_box_hi",box_hi,0,2);
45  box_lo[2] = geom[0].ProbLo(2);
46  box_hi[2] = geom[0].ProbHi(2);
47  realbox = RealBox(&(box_lo[0]),&(box_hi[0]));
48 
49  amrex::Print() << "Reading " << realbox << " at level " << lev_for_box << std::endl;
50  num_boxes_at_level[lev_for_box] += 1;
51 
52  auto dx = geom[lev_for_box].CellSize();
53  int ilo = static_cast<int>(box_lo[0]/dx[0]);
54  int jlo = static_cast<int>(box_lo[1]/dx[1]);
55  int klo = static_cast<int>(box_lo[2]/dx[2]);
56  int ihi = static_cast<int>(box_hi[0]/dx[0]-1);
57  int jhi = static_cast<int>(box_hi[1]/dx[1]-1);
58  int khi = static_cast<int>(box_hi[2]/dx[2]-1);
59  Box bx(IntVect(ilo,jlo,klo),IntVect(ihi,jhi,khi));
60  if ( (ilo%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][0] != 0) || ((ihi+1)%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][0] != 0) ||
61  (jlo%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][1] != 0) || ((jhi+1)%ref_ratio[lev_for_box-1][1] != 0) )
62  amrex::Error("Fine box is not legit with this ref_ratio");
63  boxes_at_level[lev_for_box].push_back(bx);
64  amrex::Print() << "Saving in 'boxes at level' as " << bx << std::endl;
65  } // lev
66  if (init_type == "real") {
67  if (num_boxes_at_level[lev_for_box] != num_files_at_level[lev_for_box]) {
68  amrex::Error("Numbef of boxes doesnt match number of wrfinput files");
69 
70  }
71  }
72  }
73 
74  AMRErrorTagInfo info;
75 
76  if (realbox.ok()) {
77  info.SetRealBox(realbox);
78  }
79  if (ppr.countval("start_time") > 0) {
80  Real ref_min_time; ppr.get("start_time",ref_min_time);
81  info.SetMinTime(ref_min_time);
82  }
83  if (ppr.countval("end_time") > 0) {
84  Real ref_max_time; ppr.get("end_time",ref_max_time);
85  info.SetMaxTime(ref_max_time);
86  }
87  if (ppr.countval("max_level") > 0) {
88  int ref_max_level; ppr.get("max_level",ref_max_level);
89  info.SetMaxLevel(ref_max_level);
90  }
91 
92  if (ppr.countval("value_greater")) {
93  int num_val = ppr.countval("value_greater");
94  Vector<Real> value(num_val);
95  ppr.getarr("value_greater",value,0,num_val);
96  std::string field; ppr.get("field_name",field);
97  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(value,AMRErrorTag::GREATER,field,info));
98  }
99  else if (ppr.countval("value_less")) {
100  int num_val = ppr.countval("value_less");
101  Vector<Real> value(num_val);
102  ppr.getarr("value_less",value,0,num_val);
103  std::string field; ppr.get("field_name",field);
104  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(value,AMRErrorTag::LESS,field,info));
105  }
106  else if (ppr.countval("adjacent_difference_greater")) {
107  int num_val = ppr.countval("adjacent_difference_greater");
108  Vector<Real> value(num_val);
109  ppr.getarr("adjacent_difference_greater",value,0,num_val);
110  std::string field; ppr.get("field_name",field);
111  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(value,AMRErrorTag::GRAD,field,info));
112  }
113  else if (realbox.ok())
114  {
115  ref_tags.push_back(AMRErrorTag(info));
116  } else {
117  Abort(std::string("Unrecognized refinement indicator for " + refinement_indicators[i]).c_str());
118  }
119  } // loop over criteria
120  } // if max_level > 0
121 }
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ RemakeLevel()

void ERF::RemakeLevel ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::BoxArray &  ba,
const amrex::DistributionMapping &  dm 
)
overridevirtual
678 {
679  define_grids_to_evolve(lev);
680 
681  Vector<MultiFab> temp_lev_new(Vars::NumTypes);
682  Vector<MultiFab> temp_lev_old(Vars::NumTypes);
683 
684  int ngrow_state = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.horiz_spatial_order, solverChoice.vert_spatial_order)+1;
685  int ngrow_vels = ComputeGhostCells(solverChoice.horiz_spatial_order, solverChoice.vert_spatial_order);
686 
687  temp_lev_new[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
688  temp_lev_old[Vars::cons].define(ba, dm, Cons::NumVars, ngrow_state);
689 
690  temp_lev_new[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
691  temp_lev_old[Vars::xvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
692 
693  temp_lev_new[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
694  temp_lev_old[Vars::yvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
695 
696  temp_lev_new[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
697  temp_lev_old[Vars::zvel].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
698 
699  // ********************************************************************************************
700  // These are just used for scratch in the time integrator but we might as well define them here
701  // ********************************************************************************************
702  rU_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
703  rU_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(1,0,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
704 
705  rV_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
706  rV_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,1,0)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
707 
708  rW_old[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
709  rW_new[lev].define(convert(ba, IntVect(0,0,1)), dm, 1, ngrow_vels);
710 
711  // ********************************************************************************************
712  // This will fill the temporary MultiFabs with data from vars_new
713  // ********************************************************************************************
714  FillPatch(lev, time, {&temp_lev_new[Vars::cons],&temp_lev_new[Vars::xvel],
715  &temp_lev_new[Vars::yvel],&temp_lev_new[Vars::zvel]});
716 
717  // ********************************************************************************************
718  // Copy from new into old just in case
719  // ********************************************************************************************
720  MultiFab::Copy(temp_lev_old[Vars::cons],temp_lev_new[Vars::cons],0,0,NVAR,ngrow_state);
721  MultiFab::Copy(temp_lev_old[Vars::xvel],temp_lev_new[Vars::xvel],0,0, 1,ngrow_vels);
722  MultiFab::Copy(temp_lev_old[Vars::yvel],temp_lev_new[Vars::yvel],0,0, 1,ngrow_vels);
723  MultiFab::Copy(temp_lev_old[Vars::zvel],temp_lev_new[Vars::zvel],0,0, 1,IntVect(ngrow_vels,ngrow_vels,0));
724 
725  // ********************************************************************************************
726  // Now swap the pointers
727  // ********************************************************************************************
728  for (int var_idx = 0; var_idx < Vars::NumTypes; ++var_idx) {
729  std::swap(temp_lev_new[var_idx], vars_new[lev][var_idx]);
730  std::swap(temp_lev_old[var_idx], vars_old[lev][var_idx]);
731  }
732 
733  t_new[lev] = time;
734  t_old[lev] = time - 1.e200;
735 
736  initialize_integrator(lev, temp_lev_new[Vars::cons],temp_lev_new[Vars::xvel]);
737 }

◆ restart()

void ERF::restart ( )
610 {
611 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
612  if (restart_type == "netcdf") {
613  ReadNCCheckpointFile();
614  }
615 #endif
616  if (restart_type == "native") {
617  ReadCheckpointFile();
618  }
619 
620  // We set this here so that we don't over-write the checkpoint file we just started from
621  last_check_file_step = istep[0];
622 }
ERF::ReadCheckpointFile
void ReadCheckpointFile()
Definition: Checkpoint.cpp:136

◆ setPlotVariables()

void ERF::setPlotVariables ( const std::string &  pp_plot_var_names,
amrex::Vector< std::string > &  plot_var_names 
)
private
12 {
13  ParmParse pp(pp_prefix);
14 
15  if (pp.contains(pp_plot_var_names.c_str()))
16  {
17  std::string nm;
18 
19  int nPltVars = pp.countval(pp_plot_var_names.c_str());
20 
21  for (int i = 0; i < nPltVars; i++)
22  {
23  pp.get(pp_plot_var_names.c_str(), nm, i);
24 
25  // Add the named variable to our list of plot variables
26  // if it is not already in the list
27  if (!containerHasElement(plot_var_names, nm)) {
28  plot_var_names.push_back(nm);
29  }
30  }
31  } else {
32  //
33  // The default is to add none of the variables to the list
34  //
35  plot_var_names.clear();
36  }
37 
38  // Get state variables in the same order as we define them,
39  // since they may be in any order in the input list
40  Vector<std::string> tmp_plot_names;
41  for (int i = 0; i < Cons::NumVars; ++i) {
42  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, cons_names[i]) ) {
43  tmp_plot_names.push_back(cons_names[i]);
44  }
45  }
46  // check for velocity since it's not in cons_names
47  // if we are asked for any velocity component, we will need them all
48  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "x_velocity") ||
49  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "y_velocity") ||
50  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_velocity")) {
51  tmp_plot_names.push_back("x_velocity");
52  tmp_plot_names.push_back("y_velocity");
53  tmp_plot_names.push_back("z_velocity");
54  }
55  for (int i = 0; i < derived_names.size(); ++i) {
56  if ( containerHasElement(plot_var_names, derived_names[i]) ) {
57  if (solverChoice.use_terrain || (derived_names[i] != "z_phys" && derived_names[i] != "detJ") ) {
58  tmp_plot_names.push_back(derived_names[i]);
59  }
60  }
61  }
62 
63  // Check to see if we found all the requested variables
64  for (auto plot_name : plot_var_names) {
65  if (!containerHasElement(tmp_plot_names, plot_name)) {
66  Warning("\nWARNING: Requested to plot variable '" + plot_name + "' but it is not available");
67  }
68  }
69  plot_var_names = tmp_plot_names;
70 }
containerHasElement
bool containerHasElement(const V &iterable, const T &query)
Definition: ERF.H:71
ERF::derived_names
const amrex::Vector< std::string > derived_names
Definition: ERF.H:634
ERF::cons_names
const amrex::Vector< std::string > cons_names
Definition: ERF.H:625
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ setRayleighRefFromSounding()

void ERF::setRayleighRefFromSounding ( bool  restarting)
private

Set Rayleigh mean profiles from input sounding.

56 {
57  // If we are restarting then we haven't read the input_sounding file yet
58  // so we need to read it here
59  // TODO: should we store this information in the checkpoint file instead?
60  if (restarting) {
61  input_sounding_data.read_from_file(input_sounding_file, geom[0]);
62  }
63 
64  const Real* z_inp_sound = input_sounding_data.z_inp_sound.dataPtr();
65  const Real* U_inp_sound = input_sounding_data.U_inp_sound.dataPtr();
66  const Real* V_inp_sound = input_sounding_data.V_inp_sound.dataPtr();
67  const Real* theta_inp_sound = input_sounding_data.theta_inp_sound.dataPtr();
68  const int inp_sound_size = input_sounding_data.size();
69 
70  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++)
71  {
72  const int khi = geom[lev].Domain().bigEnd()[2];
73  const auto prob_lo = geom[lev].ProbLo();
74  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSize();
75 
76  for (int k = 0; k <= khi; k++)
77  {
78  const Real z = prob_lo[2] + (k + 0.5) * dx[2];
79  h_rayleigh_ubar[lev][k] = interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, U_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
80  h_rayleigh_vbar[lev][k] = interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, V_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
81  h_rayleigh_wbar[lev][k] = 0.0;
82  h_rayleigh_thetabar[lev][k] = interpolate_1d(z_inp_sound, theta_inp_sound, z, inp_sound_size);
83  if (h_rayleigh_tau[lev][k] > 0) {
84  amrex::Print() << z << ":" << " tau=" << h_rayleigh_tau[lev][k];
85  if (solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_U) amrex::Print() << " ubar=" << h_rayleigh_ubar[lev][k];
86  if (solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_V) amrex::Print() << " vbar=" << h_rayleigh_vbar[lev][k];
87  if (solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_W) amrex::Print() << " wbar=" << h_rayleigh_wbar[lev][k];
88  if (solverChoice.rayleigh_damp_T) amrex::Print() << " thetabar=" << h_rayleigh_thetabar[lev][k];
89  amrex::Print() << std::endl;
90  }
91  }
92 
93  // Copy from host version to device version
94  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_ubar[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_ubar[lev].end(),
95  d_rayleigh_ubar[lev].begin());
96  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_vbar[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_vbar[lev].end(),
97  d_rayleigh_vbar[lev].begin());
98  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_wbar[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_wbar[lev].end(),
99  d_rayleigh_wbar[lev].begin());
100  amrex::Gpu::copy(amrex::Gpu::hostToDevice, h_rayleigh_thetabar[lev].begin(), h_rayleigh_thetabar[lev].end(),
101  d_rayleigh_thetabar[lev].begin());
102  }
103 }
InputSoundingData::z_inp_sound
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > z_inp_sound
Definition: DataStruct.H:706
InputSoundingData::U_inp_sound
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > U_inp_sound
Definition: DataStruct.H:706
InputSoundingData::V_inp_sound
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > V_inp_sound
Definition: DataStruct.H:706
InputSoundingData::theta_inp_sound
amrex::Vector< amrex::Real > theta_inp_sound
Definition: DataStruct.H:706
InputSoundingData::size
int size() const
Definition: DataStruct.H:694
SolverChoice::rayleigh_damp_T
bool rayleigh_damp_T
Definition: DataStruct.H:383
SolverChoice::rayleigh_damp_V
bool rayleigh_damp_V
Definition: DataStruct.H:381
SolverChoice::rayleigh_damp_U
bool rayleigh_damp_U
Definition: DataStruct.H:380

◆ sum_integrated_quantities()

void ERF::sum_integrated_quantities ( amrex::Real  time)
9 {
10  BL_PROFILE("ERF::sum_integrated_quantities()");
11 
12  if (verbose <= 0)
13  return;
14 
15  int datwidth = 14;
16  int datprecision = 6;
17 
18  amrex::Real scalar = 0.0;
19  amrex::Real mass = 0.0;
20 
21  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; lev++) {
22  mass += volWgtSumMF(lev,vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],Rho_comp,true,true);
23  scalar += volWgtSumMF(lev,vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],RhoScalar_comp,true,true);
24  }
25 
26  if (verbose > 0) {
27 
28  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_ustar; h_avg_ustar.resize(1);
29  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_tstar; h_avg_tstar.resize(1);
30  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_olen; h_avg_olen.resize(1);
31  if (m_most != nullptr) {
32  Box domain = geom[0].Domain();
33  int zdir = 2;
34  h_avg_ustar = sumToLine(*m_most->get_u_star(0),0,1,domain,zdir);
35  h_avg_tstar = sumToLine(*m_most->get_t_star(0),0,1,domain,zdir);
36  h_avg_olen = sumToLine(*m_most->get_olen(0),0,1,domain,zdir);
37 
38  // Divide by the total number of cells we are averaging over
39  Real area_z = static_cast<Real>(domain.length(0)*domain.length(1));
40  h_avg_ustar[0] /= area_z;
41  h_avg_tstar[0] /= area_z;
42  h_avg_olen[0] /= area_z;
43 
44  } else {
45  h_avg_ustar[0] = 0.;
46  h_avg_tstar[0] = 0.;
47  h_avg_olen[0] = 0.;
48  }
49 
50  const int nfoo = 2;
51  amrex::Real foo[nfoo] = {mass,scalar};
52 #ifdef AMREX_LAZY
53  Lazy::QueueReduction([=]() mutable {
54 #endif
55  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(
56  foo, nfoo, amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessorNumber());
57 
58  if (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
59  int i = 0;
60  mass = foo[i++];
61  scalar = foo[i++];
62 
63  amrex::Print() << '\n';
64  amrex::Print() << "TIME= " << time << " MASS = " << mass << '\n';
65  amrex::Print() << "TIME= " << time << " SCALAR = " << scalar << '\n';
66 
67  // The first data log only holds scalars
68  if (NumDataLogs() > 0)
69  {
70  int nd = 0;
71  std::ostream& data_log1 = DataLog(nd);
72  if (data_log1.good()) {
73  if (time == 0.0) {
74  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " time";
75  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " u_star";
76  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " t_star";
77  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << " olen";
78  data_log1 << std::endl;
79  } // time = 0
80 
81  // Write the quantities at this time
82  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << time;
83  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision)
84  << h_avg_ustar[0];
85  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision)
86  << h_avg_tstar[0];
87  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision)
88  << h_avg_olen[0];
89  data_log1 << std::endl;
90  } // if good
91  } // loop over i
92  } // if IOProcessor
93 #ifdef AMREX_LAZY
94  });
95 #endif
96  } // if verbose
97 }

ERF::volWgtSumMF
amrex::Real volWgtSumMF(int lev, const amrex::MultiFab &mf, int comp, bool local, bool finemask)
