◆ timeStep()

void ERF::timeStep ( int  lev,
amrex::Real  time,
int  iteration 
)
private
10 {
11  if (regrid_int > 0) // We may need to regrid
12  {
13  // help keep track of whether a level was already regridded
14  // from a coarser level call to regrid
15  static Vector<int> last_regrid_step(max_level+1, 0);
16 
17  // regrid changes level "lev+1" so we don't regrid on max_level
18  // also make sure we don't regrid fine levels again if
19  // it was taken care of during a coarser regrid
20  if (lev < max_level && istep[lev] > last_regrid_step[lev])
21  {
22  if (istep[lev] % regrid_int == 0)
23  {
24  // regrid could add newly refine levels (if finest_level < max_level)
25  // so we save the previous finest level index
26  int old_finest = finest_level;
27  regrid(lev, time);
28 
29  // mark that we have regridded this level already
30  for (int k = lev; k <= finest_level; ++k) {
31  last_regrid_step[k] = istep[k];
32  }
33 
34  // if there are newly created levels, set the time step
35  for (int k = old_finest+1; k <= finest_level; ++k) {
36  dt[k] = dt[k-1] / MaxRefRatio(k-1);
37  }
38  }
39  }
40  }
41 
42  // Update what we call "old" and "new" time
43  t_old[lev] = t_new[lev];
44  t_new[lev] += dt[lev];
45 
46  if (Verbose()) {
47  amrex::Print() << "[Level " << lev << " step " << istep[lev]+1 << "] ";
48  amrex::Print() << "ADVANCE from time = " << t_old[lev] << " to " << t_new[lev]
49  << " with dt = " << dt[lev] << std::endl;
50  }
51 
52  // Advance a single level for a single time step
53  Advance(lev, time, dt[lev], iteration, nsubsteps[lev]);
54 
55  ++istep[lev];
56 
57  if (Verbose())
58  {
59  amrex::Print() << "[Level " << lev << " step " << istep[lev] << "] ";
60  amrex::Print() << "Advanced " << CountCells(lev) << " cells" << std::endl;
61  }
62 
63  if (lev < finest_level)
64  {
65  // recursive call for next-finer level
66  for (int i = 1; i <= nsubsteps[lev+1]; ++i)
67  {
68  timeStep(lev+1, time+(i-1)*dt[lev+1], i);
69  }
70 
71  AverageDownTo(lev); // average lev+1 down to lev
72  }
73 }
ERF::Advance
void Advance(int lev, amrex::Real time, amrex::Real dt_lev, int iteration, int ncycle)
Definition: ERF_TimeStepping.cpp:77

◆ volWgtSumMF()

amrex::Real ERF::volWgtSumMF ( int  lev,
const amrex::MultiFab &  mf,
int  comp,
bool  local,
bool  finemask 
)
102 {
103  BL_PROFILE("ERF::volWgtSumMF()");
104 
105  amrex::Real sum = 0.0;
106  amrex::MultiFab tmp(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 1, 0);
107  amrex::MultiFab::Copy(tmp, mf, comp, 0, 1, 0);
108 
109  if (lev < finest_level && finemask) {
110  const amrex::MultiFab& mask = build_fine_mask(lev+1);
111  amrex::MultiFab::Multiply(tmp, mask, 0, 0, 1, 0);
112  }
113 
114  amrex::MultiFab volume(grids[lev], dmap[lev], 1, 0);
115  auto const& dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
116  Real cell_vol = dx[0]*dx[1]*dx[2];
117  volume.setVal(cell_vol);
118  if (solverChoice.use_terrain)
119  amrex::MultiFab::Multiply(volume, *detJ_cc[lev], 0, 0, 1, 0);
120  sum = amrex::MultiFab::Dot(tmp, 0, volume, 0, 1, 0, local);
121 
122  if (!local)
123  amrex::ParallelDescriptor::ReduceRealSum(sum);
124 
125  return sum;
126 }
ERF::build_fine_mask
amrex::MultiFab & build_fine_mask(int lev)
Definition: ERF_WriteScalarProfiles.cpp:129

◆ write_1D_profiles()

void ERF::write_1D_profiles ( amrex::Real  time)
9 {
10  BL_PROFILE("ERF::write_1D_profiles()");
11 
12  if (verbose <= 0)
13  return;
14 
15  int datwidth = 14;
16  int datprecision = 6;
17 
18  if (verbose > 0 && NumDataLogs() > 1)
19  {
20  // Define the 1d arrays we will need
21  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_u, h_avg_v, h_avg_w, h_avg_th;
22  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_uth, h_avg_vth, h_avg_wth, h_avg_thth;
23  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_uu, h_avg_uv, h_avg_uw, h_avg_vv, h_avg_vw, h_avg_ww;
24  Gpu::HostVector<Real> h_avg_tau11, h_avg_tau12, h_avg_tau13, h_avg_tau22, h_avg_tau23, h_avg_tau33;
25 
26  if (NumDataLogs() > 1) {
27  derive_diag_profiles(h_avg_u, h_avg_v, h_avg_w, h_avg_th,
28  h_avg_uu, h_avg_uv, h_avg_uw, h_avg_vv, h_avg_vw, h_avg_ww,
29  h_avg_uth, h_avg_vth, h_avg_wth, h_avg_thth);
30  }
31 
32  if (NumDataLogs() > 3) {
33  derive_stress_profiles(h_avg_tau11, h_avg_tau12, h_avg_tau13,
34  h_avg_tau22, h_avg_tau23, h_avg_tau33);
35  }
36 
37  auto const& dx = geom[0].CellSizeArray();
38  if (amrex::ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
39  if (NumDataLogs() > 1) {
40  std::ostream& data_log1 = DataLog(1);
41  if (data_log1.good()) {
42  // Write the quantities at this time
43  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << time << "\n";
44  for (int k = 0; k < h_avg_u.size(); k++) {
45  Real z = (k + 0.5)* dx[2];
46  data_log1 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision) << z << " "
47  << h_avg_u[k] << " " << h_avg_v[k] << " " << h_avg_w[k] << " " << h_avg_th[k] << std::endl;
48  } // loop over z
49  data_log1 << std::endl;
50  } // if good
51  } // NumDataLogs
52 
53  if (NumDataLogs() > 2) {
54  std::ostream& data_log2 = DataLog(2);
55  if (data_log2.good()) {
56  // Write the perturbational quantities at this time
57  data_log2 << std::setw(datwidth) << time << "\n";
58  for (int k = 0; k < h_avg_u.size(); k++) {
59  Real z = (k + 0.5)* dx[2];
60  data_log2 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision) << z << " "
61  << h_avg_uu[k] - h_avg_u[k]*h_avg_u[k] << " " <<
62  h_avg_uv[k] - h_avg_u[k]*h_avg_v[k] << " " <<
63  h_avg_uw[k] - h_avg_u[k]*h_avg_w[k] << " " <<
64  h_avg_vv[k] - h_avg_v[k]*h_avg_v[k] << " " <<
65  h_avg_vw[k] - h_avg_v[k]*h_avg_w[k] << " " <<
66  h_avg_ww[k] - h_avg_w[k]*h_avg_w[k] << " " <<
67  h_avg_uth[k] - h_avg_u[k]*h_avg_th[k] << " " <<
68  h_avg_vth[k] - h_avg_v[k]*h_avg_th[k] << " " <<
69  h_avg_wth[k] - h_avg_w[k]*h_avg_th[k] << " " <<
70  h_avg_thth[k]-h_avg_th[k]*h_avg_th[k] << std::endl;
71  } // loop over z
72  data_log2 << std::endl;
73  } // if good
74  } // NumDataLogs
75 
76  if (NumDataLogs() > 3) {
77  std::ostream& data_log3 = DataLog(3);
78  if (data_log3.good()) {
79  // Write the average stresses
80  data_log3 << std::setw(datwidth) << time << "\n";
81  for (int k = 0; k < h_avg_u.size(); k++) {
82  Real z = (k + 0.5)* dx[2];
83  data_log3 << std::setw(datwidth) << std::setprecision(datprecision) << z << " "
84  << h_avg_tau11[k] << " " << h_avg_tau12[k] << " " << h_avg_tau13[k] << " "
85  << h_avg_tau22[k] << " " << h_avg_tau23[k] << " " << h_avg_tau33[k] << std::endl;
86  } // loop over z
87  data_log3 << std::endl;
88  } // if good
89  } // NumDataLogs
90  } // if IOProcessor
91  } // if verbose
92 }
ERF::derive_diag_profiles
void derive_diag_profiles(amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_u, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_v, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_w, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_th, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_uu, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_uv, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_uw, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_vv, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_vw, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_ww, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_uth, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_vth, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_wth, amrex::Gpu::HostVector< amrex::Real > &h_avg_thth)

◆ WriteCheckpointFile()

void ERF::WriteCheckpointFile ( ) const
private
16 {
17  // chk00010 write a checkpoint file with this root directory
18  // chk00010/Header this contains information you need to save (e.g., finest_level, t_new, etc.) and also
19  // the BoxArrays at each level
20  // chk00010/Level_0/
21  // chk00010/Level_1/
22  // etc. these subdirectories will hold the MultiFab data at each level of refinement
23 
24  // checkpoint file name, e.g., chk00010
25  const std::string& checkpointname = amrex::Concatenate(check_file,istep[0],5);
26 
27  amrex::Print() << "Writing checkpoint " << checkpointname << "\n";
28 
29  const int nlevels = finest_level+1;
30 
31  // ---- prebuild a hierarchy of directories
32  // ---- dirName is built first. if dirName exists, it is renamed. then build
33  // ---- dirName/subDirPrefix_0 .. dirName/subDirPrefix_nlevels-1
34  // ---- if callBarrier is true, call ParallelDescriptor::Barrier()
35  // ---- after all directories are built
36  // ---- ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor() creates the directories
37  amrex::PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(checkpointname, "Level_", nlevels, true);
38 
39  // write Header file
40  if (ParallelDescriptor::IOProcessor()) {
41 
42  std::string HeaderFileName(checkpointname + "/Header");
43  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::IO_Buffer_Size);
44  std::ofstream HeaderFile;
45  HeaderFile.rdbuf()->pubsetbuf(io_buffer.dataPtr(), io_buffer.size());
46  HeaderFile.open(HeaderFileName.c_str(), std::ofstream::out |
47  std::ofstream::trunc |
48  std::ofstream::binary);
49  if( ! HeaderFile.good()) {
50  amrex::FileOpenFailed(HeaderFileName);
51  }
52 
53  HeaderFile.precision(17);
54 
55  // write out title line
56  HeaderFile << "Checkpoint file for ERF\n";
57 
58  // write out finest_level
59  HeaderFile << finest_level << "\n";
60 
61  // write the number of components
62  // for each variable we store
63 
64  // conservative, cell-centered vars
65  HeaderFile << Cons::NumVars << "\n";
66 
67  // x-velocity on faces
68  HeaderFile << 1 << "\n";
69 
70  // y-velocity on faces
71  HeaderFile << 1 << "\n";
72 
73  // z-velocity on faces
74  HeaderFile << 1 << "\n";
75 
76  // write out array of istep
77  for (int i = 0; i < istep.size(); ++i) {
78  HeaderFile << istep[i] << " ";
79  }
80  HeaderFile << "\n";
81 
82  // write out array of dt
83  for (int i = 0; i < dt.size(); ++i) {
84  HeaderFile << dt[i] << " ";
85  }
86  HeaderFile << "\n";
87 
88  // write out array of t_new
89  for (int i = 0; i < t_new.size(); ++i) {
90  HeaderFile << t_new[i] << " ";
91  }
92  HeaderFile << "\n";
93 
94  // write the BoxArray at each level
95  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
96  boxArray(lev).writeOn(HeaderFile);
97  HeaderFile << '\n';
98  }
99  }
100 
101  // write the MultiFab data to, e.g., chk00010/Level_0/
102  // Here we make copies of the MultiFab with no ghost cells
103  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev)
104  {
105  MultiFab cons(grids[lev],dmap[lev],Cons::NumVars,0);
106  MultiFab::Copy(cons,vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],0,0,NVAR,0);
107  VisMF::Write(cons, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "Cell"));
108 
109  MultiFab xvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(1,0,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
110  MultiFab::Copy(xvel,vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],0,0,1,0);
111  VisMF::Write(xvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "XFace"));
112 
113  MultiFab yvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,1,0)),dmap[lev],1,0);
114  MultiFab::Copy(yvel,vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],0,0,1,0);
115  VisMF::Write(yvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "YFace"));
116 
117  MultiFab zvel(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(0,0,1)),dmap[lev],1,0);
118  MultiFab::Copy(zvel,vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel],0,0,1,0);
119  VisMF::Write(zvel, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "ZFace"));
120 
121  MultiFab base(grids[lev],dmap[lev],base_state[lev].nComp(),0);
122  MultiFab::Copy(base,base_state[lev],0,0,base.nComp(),0);
123  VisMF::Write(base, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "BaseState"));
124 
125  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
126  // Note that we write the ghost cells of z_phys_nd (unlike above)
127  IntVect ngvect = z_phys_nd[lev]->nGrowVect();
128  MultiFab z_height(convert(grids[lev],IntVect(1,1,1)),dmap[lev],1,ngvect);
129  MultiFab::Copy(z_height,*z_phys_nd[lev],0,0,1,ngvect);
130  VisMF::Write(z_height, amrex::MultiFabFileFullPrefix(lev, checkpointname, "Level_", "Z_Phys_nd"));
131  }
132  }
133 }

◆ WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain()

void ERF::WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain ( std::ostream &  HeaderFile,
int  nlevels,
const amrex::Vector< amrex::BoxArray > &  bArray,
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  varnames,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< int > &  level_steps,
const std::string &  versionName,
const std::string &  levelPrefix,
const std::string &  mfPrefix 
) const
935 {
936  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= bArray.size());
937  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= ref_ratio.size()+1);
938  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= level_steps.size());
939 
940  HeaderFile.precision(17);
941 
942  // ---- this is the generic plot file type name
943  HeaderFile << versionName << '\n';
944 
945  HeaderFile << varnames.size() << '\n';
946 
947  for (int ivar = 0; ivar < varnames.size(); ++ivar) {
948  HeaderFile << varnames[ivar] << "\n";
949  }
950  HeaderFile << AMREX_SPACEDIM << '\n';
951  HeaderFile << time << '\n';
952  HeaderFile << finest_level << '\n';
953  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++i) {
954  HeaderFile << geom[0].ProbLo(i) << ' ';
955  }
956  HeaderFile << '\n';
957  for (int i = 0; i < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++i) {
958  HeaderFile << geom[0].ProbHi(i) << ' ';
959  }
960  HeaderFile << '\n';
961  for (int i = 0; i < finest_level; ++i) {
962  HeaderFile << ref_ratio[i][0] << ' ';
963  }
964  HeaderFile << '\n';
965  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; ++i) {
966  HeaderFile << geom[i].Domain() << ' ';
967  }
968  HeaderFile << '\n';
969  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; ++i) {
970  HeaderFile << level_steps[i] << ' ';
971  }
972  HeaderFile << '\n';
973  for (int i = 0; i <= finest_level; ++i) {
974  for (int k = 0; k < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++k) {
975  HeaderFile << geom[i].CellSize()[k] << ' ';
976  }
977  HeaderFile << '\n';
978  }
979  HeaderFile << (int) geom[0].Coord() << '\n';
980  HeaderFile << "0\n";
981 
982  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level) {
983  HeaderFile << level << ' ' << bArray[level].size() << ' ' << time << '\n';
984  HeaderFile << level_steps[level] << '\n';
985 
986  const IntVect& domain_lo = geom[level].Domain().smallEnd();
987  for (int i = 0; i < bArray[level].size(); ++i)
988  {
989  // Need to shift because the RealBox ctor we call takes the
990  // physical location of index (0,0,0). This does not affect
991  // the usual cases where the domain index starts with 0.
992  const Box& b = shift(bArray[level][i], -domain_lo);
993  RealBox loc = RealBox(b, geom[level].CellSize(), geom[level].ProbLo());
994  for (int n = 0; n < AMREX_SPACEDIM; ++n) {
995  HeaderFile << loc.lo(n) << ' ' << loc.hi(n) << '\n';
996  }
997  }
998 
999  HeaderFile << MultiFabHeaderPath(level, levelPrefix, mfPrefix) << '\n';
1000  }
1001  HeaderFile << "1" << "\n";
1002  HeaderFile << "3" << "\n";
1003  HeaderFile << "amrexvec_nu_x" << "\n";
1004  HeaderFile << "amrexvec_nu_y" << "\n";
1005  HeaderFile << "amrexvec_nu_z" << "\n";
1006  std::string mf_nodal_prefix = "Nu_nd";
1007  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level) {
1008  HeaderFile << MultiFabHeaderPath(level, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix) << '\n';
1009  }
1010 }
Coord
Coord
Definition: DataStruct.H:19

◆ writeJobInfo()

void ERF::writeJobInfo ( const std::string &  dir) const
8 {
9  // job_info file with details about the run
10  std::ofstream jobInfoFile;
11  std::string FullPathJobInfoFile = dir;
12  FullPathJobInfoFile += "/job_info";
13  jobInfoFile.open(FullPathJobInfoFile.c_str(), std::ios::out);
14 
15  std::string PrettyLine = "==================================================="
16  "============================\n";
17  std::string OtherLine = "----------------------------------------------------"
18  "----------------------------\n";
19  std::string SkipSpace = " ";
20 
21  // job information
22  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
23  jobInfoFile << " ERF Job Information\n";
24  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
25 
26  jobInfoFile << "inputs file: " << inputs_name << "\n\n";
27 
28  jobInfoFile << "number of MPI processes: "
29  << amrex::ParallelDescriptor::NProcs() << "\n";
30 #ifdef _OPENMP
31  jobInfoFile << "number of threads: " << omp_get_max_threads() << "\n";
32 #endif
33 
34  jobInfoFile << "\n";
35  jobInfoFile << "CPU time used since start of simulation (CPU-hours): "
36  << getCPUTime() / 3600.0;
37 
38  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";
39 
40  // plotfile information
41  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
42  jobInfoFile << " Plotfile Information\n";
43  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
44 
45  time_t now = time(0);
46 
47  // Convert now to tm struct for local timezone
48  tm* localtm = localtime(&now);
49  jobInfoFile << "output data / time: " << asctime(localtm);
50 
51  std::string currentDir = amrex::FileSystem::CurrentPath();
52  jobInfoFile << "output dir: " << currentDir << "\n";
53 
54  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";
55 
56  // build information
57  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
58  jobInfoFile << " Build Information\n";
59  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
60 
61  jobInfoFile << "build date: " << amrex::buildInfoGetBuildDate() << "\n";
62  jobInfoFile << "build machine: " << amrex::buildInfoGetBuildMachine() << "\n";
63  jobInfoFile << "build dir: " << amrex::buildInfoGetBuildDir() << "\n";
64  jobInfoFile << "AMReX dir: " << amrex::buildInfoGetAMReXDir() << "\n";
65 
66  jobInfoFile << "\n";
67 
68  jobInfoFile << "COMP: " << amrex::buildInfoGetComp() << "\n";
69  jobInfoFile << "COMP version: " << amrex::buildInfoGetCompVersion() << "\n";
70 
71  jobInfoFile << "\n";
72 
73  for (int n = 1; n <= amrex::buildInfoGetNumModules(); n++) {
74  jobInfoFile << amrex::buildInfoGetModuleName(n) << ": "
75  << amrex::buildInfoGetModuleVal(n) << "\n";
76  }
77 
78  jobInfoFile << "\n";
79 
80  const char* githash1 = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(1);
81  const char* githash2 = amrex::buildInfoGetGitHash(2);
82  if (strlen(githash1) > 0) {
83  jobInfoFile << "ERF git hash: " << githash1 << "\n";
84  }
85  if (strlen(githash2) > 0) {
86  jobInfoFile << "AMReX git hash: " << githash2 << "\n";
87  }
88 
89  const char* buildgithash = amrex::buildInfoGetBuildGitHash();
90  const char* buildgitname = amrex::buildInfoGetBuildGitName();
91  if (strlen(buildgithash) > 0) {
92  jobInfoFile << buildgitname << " git hash: " << buildgithash << "\n";
93  }
94 
95  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";
96 
97  // grid information
98  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
99  jobInfoFile << " Grid Information\n";
100  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
101 
102  int f_lev = finest_level;
103 
104  for (int i = 0; i <= f_lev; i++) {
105  jobInfoFile << " level: " << i << "\n";
106  jobInfoFile << " number of boxes = " << grids[i].size() << "\n";
107  jobInfoFile << " maximum zones = ";
108  for (int n = 0; n < AMREX_SPACEDIM; n++) {
109  jobInfoFile << geom[i].Domain().length(n) << " ";
110  }
111  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";
112  }
113 
114  jobInfoFile << " Boundary conditions\n";
115 
116  jobInfoFile << " -x: " << domain_bc_type[0] << "\n";
117  jobInfoFile << " +x: " << domain_bc_type[3] << "\n";
118  jobInfoFile << " -y: " << domain_bc_type[1] << "\n";
119  jobInfoFile << " +y: " << domain_bc_type[4] << "\n";
120  jobInfoFile << " -z: " << domain_bc_type[2] << "\n";
121  jobInfoFile << " +z: " << domain_bc_type[5] << "\n";
122 
123  jobInfoFile << "\n\n";
124 
125  // runtime parameters
126  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
127  jobInfoFile << " Inputs File Parameters\n";
128  jobInfoFile << PrettyLine;
129 
130  amrex::ParmParse::dumpTable(jobInfoFile, true);
131  jobInfoFile.close();
132 }

◆ WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain()

void ERF::WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain ( const std::string &  plotfilename,
int  nlevels,
const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf,
const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &  mf_nd,
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  varnames,
amrex::Real  time,
const amrex::Vector< int > &  level_steps,
const std::string &  versionName = "HyperCLaw-V1.1",
const std::string &  levelPrefix = "Level_",
const std::string &  mfPrefix = "Cell",
const amrex::Vector< std::string > &  extra_dirs = amrex::Vector<std::string>() 
) const
851 {
852  BL_PROFILE("WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain()");
853 
854  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= mf.size());
855  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= ref_ratio.size()+1);
856  BL_ASSERT(nlevels <= level_steps.size());
857  BL_ASSERT(mf[0]->nComp() == varnames.size());
858 
859  bool callBarrier(false);
860  PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(plotfilename, levelPrefix, nlevels, callBarrier);
861  if (!extra_dirs.empty()) {
862  for (const auto& d : extra_dirs) {
863  const std::string ed = plotfilename+"/"+d;
864  PreBuildDirectorHierarchy(ed, levelPrefix, nlevels, callBarrier);
865  }
866  }
867  ParallelDescriptor::Barrier();
868 
869  if (ParallelDescriptor::MyProc() == ParallelDescriptor::NProcs()-1) {
870  Vector<BoxArray> boxArrays(nlevels);
871  for(int level(0); level < boxArrays.size(); ++level) {
872  boxArrays[level] = mf[level]->boxArray();
873  }
874 
875  auto f = [=]() {
876  VisMF::IO_Buffer io_buffer(VisMF::IO_Buffer_Size);
877  std::string HeaderFileName(plotfilename + "/Header");
878  std::ofstream HeaderFile;
879  HeaderFile.rdbuf()->pubsetbuf(io_buffer.dataPtr(), io_buffer.size());
880  HeaderFile.open(HeaderFileName.c_str(), std::ofstream::out |
881  std::ofstream::trunc |
882  std::ofstream::binary);
883  if( ! HeaderFile.good()) FileOpenFailed(HeaderFileName);
884  WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain(HeaderFile, nlevels, boxArrays, varnames,
885  time, level_steps, versionName,
886  levelPrefix, mfPrefix);
887  };
888 
889  if (AsyncOut::UseAsyncOut()) {
890  AsyncOut::Submit(std::move(f));
891  } else {
892  f();
893  }
894  }
895 
896  std::string mf_nodal_prefix = "Nu_nd";
897  for (int level = 0; level <= finest_level; ++level)
898  {
899  if (AsyncOut::UseAsyncOut()) {
900  VisMF::AsyncWrite(*mf[level],
901  MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mfPrefix),
902  true);
903  VisMF::AsyncWrite(*mf_nd[level],
904  MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix),
905  true);
906  } else {
907  const MultiFab* data;
908  std::unique_ptr<MultiFab> mf_tmp;
909  if (mf[level]->nGrowVect() != 0) {
910  mf_tmp = std::make_unique<MultiFab>(mf[level]->boxArray(),
911  mf[level]->DistributionMap(),
912  mf[level]->nComp(), 0, MFInfo(),
913  mf[level]->Factory());
914  MultiFab::Copy(*mf_tmp, *mf[level], 0, 0, mf[level]->nComp(), 0);
915  data = mf_tmp.get();
916  } else {
917  data = mf[level];
918  }
919  VisMF::Write(*data , MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mfPrefix));
920  VisMF::Write(*mf_nd[level], MultiFabFileFullPrefix(level, plotfilename, levelPrefix, mf_nodal_prefix));
921  }
922  }
923 }
ERF::WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain
void WriteGenericPlotfileHeaderWithTerrain(std::ostream &HeaderFile, int nlevels, const amrex::Vector< amrex::BoxArray > &bArray, const amrex::Vector< std::string > &varnames, amrex::Real time, const amrex::Vector< int > &level_steps, const std::string &versionName, const std::string &levelPrefix, const std::string &mfPrefix) const
Definition: Plotfile.cpp:926

◆ WritePlotFile()

void ERF::WritePlotFile ( int  which,
amrex::Vector< std::string >  plot_var_names 
)
87 {
88  const Vector<std::string> varnames = PlotFileVarNames(plot_var_names);
89  const int ncomp_mf = varnames.size();
90 
91  // We fillpatch here because some of the derived quantities require derivatives
92  // which require ghost cells to be filled
93  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
94  FillPatch(lev, t_new[lev], {&vars_new[lev][Vars::cons], &vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],
95  &vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel], &vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
96  }
97 
98  if (ncomp_mf == 0)
99  return;
100 
101  Vector<MultiFab> mf(finest_level+1);
102  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
103  mf[lev].define(grids[lev], dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 0);
104  }
105 
106  Vector<MultiFab> mf_nd(finest_level+1);
107  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
108  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
109  BoxArray nodal_grids(grids[lev]); nodal_grids.surroundingNodes();
110  mf_nd[lev].define(nodal_grids, dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 0);
111  mf_nd[lev].setVal(0.);
112  }
113  }
114 
115  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
116  int mf_comp = 0;
117 
118  // First, copy any of the conserved state variables into the output plotfile
119  AMREX_ALWAYS_ASSERT(cons_names.size() == Cons::NumVars);
120  for (int i = 0; i < Cons::NumVars; ++i) {
121  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, cons_names[i])) {
122  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],vars_new[lev][Vars::cons],i,mf_comp,1,0);
123  mf_comp++;
124  }
125  }
126 
127  // Next, check for velocities and if desired, output them -- note we output none or all, not just some
128  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "x_velocity") ||
129  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "y_velocity") ||
130  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_velocity")) {
131 
132  average_face_to_cellcenter(mf[lev],mf_comp,
133  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
134  mf_comp += AMREX_SPACEDIM;
135  }
136 
137  // Finally, check for any derived quantities and compute them, inserting
138  // them into our output multifab
139  auto calculate_derived = [&](std::string der_name,
140  decltype(derived::erf_dernull)& der_function)
141  {
142  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, der_name)) {
143  MultiFab dmf(mf[lev], make_alias, mf_comp, 1);
144 
145  for (MFIter mfi(dmf, TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
146  {
147  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
148  auto& dfab = dmf[mfi];
149  auto& sfab = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons][mfi];
150  der_function(bx, dfab, 0, 1, sfab, Geom(lev), t_new[0], nullptr, lev);
151  }
152 
153  mf_comp++;
154  }
155  };
156 
157  // Note: All derived variables must be computed in order of "derived_names" defined in ERF.H
158  calculate_derived("pressure", derived::erf_derpres);
159  calculate_derived("soundspeed", derived::erf_dersoundspeed);
160  calculate_derived("temp", derived::erf_dertemp);
161  calculate_derived("theta", derived::erf_dertheta);
162  calculate_derived("KE", derived::erf_derKE);
163  calculate_derived("QKE", derived::erf_derQKE);
164  calculate_derived("scalar", derived::erf_derscalar);
165 
166  MultiFab r_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 0, 1); // r_0 is first component
167  MultiFab p_hse(base_state[lev], make_alias, 1, 1); // p_0 is second component
168  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse"))
169  {
170  // p_0 is second component of base_state
171  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],p_hse,0,mf_comp,1,0);
172  mf_comp += 1;
173  }
174  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dens_hse"))
175  {
176  // r_0 is first component of base_state
177  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],r_hse,0,mf_comp,1,0);
178  mf_comp += 1;
179  }
180  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pert_pres"))
181  {
182  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
183  {
184  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
185  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
186  const Array4<Real const>& p0_arr = p_hse.const_array(mfi);
187  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
188 
189  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
190 
191  const Real rhotheta = S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp);
192  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = getPgivenRTh(rhotheta) - p0_arr(i,j,k);
193  });
194  }
195  mf_comp += 1;
196  }
197  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pert_dens"))
198  {
199  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
200  {
201  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
202  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
203  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
204  const Array4<Real const>& r0_arr = r_hse.const_array(mfi);
205  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
206  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = S_arr(i,j,k,Rho_comp) - r0_arr(i,j,k);
207  });
208  }
209  mf_comp ++;
210  }
211 
212  int klo = geom[lev].Domain().smallEnd(2);
213  int khi = geom[lev].Domain().bigEnd(2);
214 
215  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdx"))
216  {
217  auto dxInv = geom[lev].InvCellSizeArray();
218  MultiFab pres(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].boxArray(), vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].DistributionMap(), 1, 1);
219  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
220  {
221  // First define pressure on grown box
222  const Box& gbx = mfi.growntilebox(1);
223  const Array4<Real> & p_arr = pres.array(mfi);
224  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
225  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
226  p_arr(i,j,k) = getPgivenRTh(S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp));
227  });
228  }
229  pres.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
230 
231  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
232  {
233  // Now compute pressure gradient on valid box
234  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
235  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
236  const Array4<Real> & p_arr = pres.array(mfi);
237 
238  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
239  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
240 
241  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
242 
243  // Pgrad at lower I face
244  Real met_h_xi_lo = Compute_h_xi_AtIface (i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
245  Real met_h_zeta_lo = Compute_h_zeta_AtIface(i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
246  Real gp_xi_lo = dxInv[0] * (p_arr(i,j,k) - p_arr(i-1,j,k));
247  Real gp_zeta_on_iface_lo;
248  if(k == klo) {
249  gp_zeta_on_iface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
250  p_arr(i-1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
251  - p_arr(i-1,j,k ) - p_arr(i,j,k ) );
252  } else if (k == khi) {
253  gp_zeta_on_iface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
254  p_arr(i-1,j,k ) + p_arr(i,j,k )
255  - p_arr(i-1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
256  } else {
257  gp_zeta_on_iface_lo = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
258  p_arr(i-1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
259  - p_arr(i-1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
260  }
261  amrex::Real gpx_lo = gp_xi_lo - (met_h_xi_lo/ met_h_zeta_lo) * gp_zeta_on_iface_lo;
262 
263  // Pgrad at higher I face
264  Real met_h_xi_hi = Compute_h_xi_AtIface (i+1, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
265  Real met_h_zeta_hi = Compute_h_zeta_AtIface(i+1, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
266  Real gp_xi_hi = dxInv[0] * (p_arr(i+1,j,k) - p_arr(i,j,k));
267  Real gp_zeta_on_iface_hi;
268  if(k == klo) {
269  gp_zeta_on_iface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
270  p_arr(i+1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
271  - p_arr(i+1,j,k ) - p_arr(i,j,k ) );
272  } else if (k == khi) {
273  gp_zeta_on_iface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
274  p_arr(i+1,j,k ) + p_arr(i,j,k )
275  - p_arr(i+1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
276  } else {
277  gp_zeta_on_iface_hi = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
278  p_arr(i+1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
279  - p_arr(i+1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
280  }
281  amrex::Real gpx_hi = gp_xi_hi - (met_h_xi_hi/ met_h_zeta_hi) * gp_zeta_on_iface_hi;
282 
283  // Average P grad to CC
284  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpx_lo + gpx_hi);
285  });
286  } else {
287  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
288  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (p_arr(i+1,j,k) - p_arr(i-1,j,k)) * dxInv[0];
289  });
290  }
291  } // mfi
292  mf_comp ++;
293  } // dpdx
294 
295  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "dpdy"))
296  {
297  auto dxInv = geom[lev].InvCellSizeArray();
298 
299  MultiFab pres(vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].boxArray(), vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].DistributionMap(), 1, 1);
300  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
301  {
302  // First define pressure on grown box
303  const Box& gbx = mfi.growntilebox(1);
304  const Array4<Real> & p_arr = pres.array(mfi);
305  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
306  amrex::ParallelFor(gbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
307  p_arr(i,j,k) = getPgivenRTh(S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp));
308  });
309  }
310  pres.FillBoundary(geom[lev].periodicity());
311 
312  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
313  {
314  // Now compute pressure gradient on valid box
315  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
316  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
317  const Array4<Real> & p_arr = pres.array(mfi);
318 
319  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
320  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
321 
322  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
323 
324  Real met_h_eta_lo = Compute_h_eta_AtJface (i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
325  Real met_h_zeta_lo = Compute_h_zeta_AtJface(i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
326  Real gp_eta_lo = dxInv[1] * (p_arr(i,j,k) - p_arr(i,j-1,k));
327  Real gp_zeta_on_jface_lo;
328  if (k == klo) {
329  gp_zeta_on_jface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
330  p_arr(i,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j-1,k+1)
331  - p_arr(i,j,k ) - p_arr(i,j-1,k ) );
332  } else if (k == khi) {
333  gp_zeta_on_jface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
334  p_arr(i,j,k ) + p_arr(i,j-1,k )
335  - p_arr(i,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j-1,k-1) );
336  } else {
337  gp_zeta_on_jface_lo = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
338  p_arr(i,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j-1,k+1)
339  - p_arr(i,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j-1,k-1) );
340  }
341  amrex::Real gpy_lo = gp_eta_lo - (met_h_eta_lo / met_h_zeta_lo) * gp_zeta_on_jface_lo;
342 
343  Real met_h_eta_hi = Compute_h_eta_AtJface (i, j+1, k, dxInv, z_nd);
344  Real met_h_zeta_hi = Compute_h_zeta_AtJface(i, j+1, k, dxInv, z_nd);
345  Real gp_eta_hi = dxInv[1] * (p_arr(i,j+1,k) - p_arr(i,j,k));
346  Real gp_zeta_on_jface_hi;
347  if (k == klo) {
348  gp_zeta_on_jface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
349  p_arr(i,j+1,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
350  - p_arr(i,j+1,k ) - p_arr(i,j,k ) );
351  } else if (k == khi) {
352  gp_zeta_on_jface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
353  p_arr(i,j+1,k ) + p_arr(i,j,k )
354  - p_arr(i,j+1,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
355  } else {
356  gp_zeta_on_jface_hi = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
357  p_arr(i,j+1,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
358  - p_arr(i,j+1,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
359  }
360  amrex::Real gpy_hi = gp_eta_hi - (met_h_eta_hi / met_h_zeta_hi) * gp_zeta_on_jface_hi;
361 
362  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpy_lo + gpy_hi);
363  });
364  } else {
365  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
366  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (p_arr(i,j+1,k) - p_arr(i,j-1,k)) * dxInv[1];
367  });
368  }
369  } // mf
370  mf_comp ++;
371  } // dpdy
372 
373  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_x"))
374  {
375  auto dxInv = geom[lev].InvCellSizeArray();
376  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
377  {
378  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
379  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
380  const Array4<Real const>& p_arr = p_hse.const_array(mfi);
381 
382  //USE_TERRAIN POSSIBLE ISSUE HERE
383  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
384 
385  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
386  Real met_h_xi_lo = Compute_h_xi_AtIface (i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
387  Real met_h_zeta_lo = Compute_h_zeta_AtIface(i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
388  Real gp_xi_lo = dxInv[0] * (p_arr(i,j,k) - p_arr(i-1,j,k));
389  Real gp_zeta_on_iface_lo;
390  if (k == klo) {
391  gp_zeta_on_iface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
392  p_arr(i-1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
393  - p_arr(i-1,j,k ) - p_arr(i,j,k ) );
394  } else if (k == khi) {
395  gp_zeta_on_iface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
396  p_arr(i-1,j,k ) + p_arr(i,j,k )
397  - p_arr(i-1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
398  } else {
399  gp_zeta_on_iface_lo = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
400  p_arr(i-1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
401  - p_arr(i-1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
402  }
403  amrex::Real gpx_lo = gp_xi_lo - (met_h_xi_lo/ met_h_zeta_lo) * gp_zeta_on_iface_lo;
404 
405  Real met_h_xi_hi = Compute_h_xi_AtIface (i+1, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
406  Real met_h_zeta_hi = Compute_h_zeta_AtIface(i+1, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
407  Real gp_xi_hi = dxInv[0] * (p_arr(i+1,j,k) - p_arr(i,j,k));
408  Real gp_zeta_on_iface_hi;
409  if (k == klo) {
410  gp_zeta_on_iface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
411  p_arr(i+1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
412  - p_arr(i+1,j,k ) - p_arr(i,j,k ) );
413  } else if (k == khi) {
414  gp_zeta_on_iface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
415  p_arr(i+1,j,k ) + p_arr(i,j,k )
416  - p_arr(i+1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
417  } else {
418  gp_zeta_on_iface_hi = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
419  p_arr(i+1,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
420  - p_arr(i+1,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
421  }
422  amrex::Real gpx_hi = gp_xi_hi - (met_h_xi_hi/ met_h_zeta_hi) * gp_zeta_on_iface_hi;
423 
424  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpx_lo + gpx_hi);
425  });
426  }
427  mf_comp += 1;
428  } // pres_hse_x
429 
430  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pres_hse_y"))
431  {
432  auto dxInv = geom[lev].InvCellSizeArray();
433  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
434  {
435  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
436  const Array4<Real >& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
437  const Array4<Real const>& p_arr = p_hse.const_array(mfi);
438  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
439  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
440  Real met_h_eta_lo = Compute_h_eta_AtJface (i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
441  Real met_h_zeta_lo = Compute_h_zeta_AtJface(i, j, k, dxInv, z_nd);
442  Real gp_eta_lo = dxInv[1] * (p_arr(i,j,k) - p_arr(i,j-1,k));
443  Real gp_zeta_on_jface_lo;
444  if (k == klo) {
445  gp_zeta_on_jface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
446  p_arr(i,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j-1,k+1)
447  - p_arr(i,j,k ) - p_arr(i,j-1,k ) );
448  } else if (k == khi) {
449  gp_zeta_on_jface_lo = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
450  p_arr(i,j,k ) + p_arr(i,j-1,k )
451  - p_arr(i,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j-1,k-1) );
452  } else {
453  gp_zeta_on_jface_lo = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
454  p_arr(i,j,k+1) + p_arr(i,j-1,k+1)
455  - p_arr(i,j,k-1) - p_arr(i,j-1,k-1) );
456  }
457  amrex::Real gpy_lo = gp_eta_lo - (met_h_eta_lo / met_h_zeta_lo) * gp_zeta_on_jface_lo;
458 
459  Real met_h_eta_hi = Compute_h_eta_AtJface (i, j+1, k, dxInv, z_nd);
460  Real met_h_zeta_hi = Compute_h_zeta_AtJface(i, j+1, k, dxInv, z_nd);
461  Real gp_eta_hi = dxInv[1] * (p_arr(i,j+1,k) - p_arr(i,j,k));
462  Real gp_zeta_on_jface_hi;
463  if (k == klo) {
464  gp_zeta_on_jface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
465  p_arr(i,j+1,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
466  - p_arr(i,j+1,k ) - p_arr(i,j,k ) );
467  } else if (k == khi) {
468  gp_zeta_on_jface_hi = 0.5 * dxInv[2] * (
469  p_arr(i,j+1,k ) + p_arr(i,j,k )
470  - p_arr(i,j+1,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
471  } else {
472  gp_zeta_on_jface_hi = 0.25 * dxInv[2] * (
473  p_arr(i,j+1,k+1) + p_arr(i,j,k+1)
474  - p_arr(i,j+1,k-1) - p_arr(i,j,k-1) );
475  }
476  amrex::Real gpy_hi = gp_eta_hi - (met_h_eta_hi / met_h_zeta_hi) * gp_zeta_on_jface_hi;
477 
478  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = 0.5 * (gpy_lo + gpy_hi);
479  });
480  }
481  mf_comp += 1;
482  } // pres_hse_y
483 
484  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
485  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "z_phys"))
486  {
487  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*z_phys_cc[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
488  mf_comp ++;
489  }
490 
491  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "detJ"))
492  {
493  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],*detJ_cc[lev],0,mf_comp,1,0);
494  mf_comp ++;
495  }
496  } // use_terrain
497 
498  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "mapfac")) {
499  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
500  {
501  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
502  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
503  const Array4<Real>& mf_m = mapfac_m[lev]->array(mfi);
504  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept {
505  derdat(i ,j ,k, mf_comp) = mf_m(i,j,0);
506  });
507  }
508  mf_comp ++;
509  }
510 
511 #if defined(ERF_USE_MOISTURE)
512  calculate_derived("qt", derived::erf_derQt);
513  calculate_derived("qp", derived::erf_derQp);
514 
515  MultiFab qv_fab(qv[lev], make_alias, 0, 1);
516  MultiFab qc_fab(qc[lev], make_alias, 0, 1);
517  MultiFab qi_fab(qi[lev], make_alias, 0, 1);
518  MultiFab qrain_fab(qrain[lev], make_alias, 0, 1);
519  MultiFab qsnow_fab(qsnow[lev], make_alias, 0, 1);
520  MultiFab qgraup_fab(qgraup[lev], make_alias, 0, 1);
521 
522  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qv"))
523  {
524  // r_0 is first component of base_state
525  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],qv_fab,0,mf_comp,1,0);
526  mf_comp += 1;
527  }
528 
529  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qc"))
530  {
531  // r_0 is first component of base_state
532  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],qc_fab,0,mf_comp,1,0);
533  mf_comp += 1;
534  }
535 
536  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qi"))
537  {
538  // r_0 is first component of base_state
539  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],qi_fab,0,mf_comp,1,0);
540  mf_comp += 1;
541  }
542 
543  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qrain"))
544  {
545  // r_0 is first component of base_state
546  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],qrain_fab,0,mf_comp,1,0);
547  mf_comp += 1;
548  }
549 
550  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qsnow"))
551  {
552  // r_0 is first component of base_state
553  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],qsnow_fab,0,mf_comp,1,0);
554  mf_comp += 1;
555  }
556 
557  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "qgraup"))
558  {
559  // r_0 is first component of base_state
560  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],qgraup_fab,0,mf_comp,1,0);
561  mf_comp += 1;
562  }
563 #elif defined(ERF_USE_WARM_NO_PRECIP)
564  calculate_derived("qv", derived::erf_derQv);
565  calculate_derived("qc", derived::erf_derQc);
566 #endif
567 
568 #ifdef ERF_COMPUTE_ERROR
569  // Next, check for error in velocities and if desired, output them -- note we output none or all, not just some
570  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "xvel_err") ||
571  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "yvel_err") ||
572  containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "zvel_err"))
573  {
574  //
575  // Moving terrain ANALYTICAL
576  //
577  Real H = geom[lev].ProbHi()[2];
578  Real Ampl = 0.16;
579  Real wavelength = 100.;
580  Real kp = 2. * PI / wavelength;
581  Real g = CONST_GRAV;
582  Real omega = std::sqrt(g * kp);
583  Real omega_t = omega * t_new[lev];
584 
585  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
586 
587  for (MFIter mfi(mf[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
588  {
589  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
590  Box xbx(bx); xbx.surroundingNodes(0);
591  const Array4<Real> xvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
592  const Array4<Real> zvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
593 
594  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
595 
596  ParallelFor(xbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
597  {
598  Real x = i * dx[0];
599  Real z = 0.25 * (z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i,j,k+1) + z_nd(i,j+1,k+1));
600 
601  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
602  z -= z_base;
603 
604  Real fac = std::cosh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
605 
606  xvel_arr(i,j,k) -= -Ampl * omega * fac * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
607  });
608 
609  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
610  {
611  Real x = (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
612  Real z = 0.25 * ( z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i+1,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k));
613 
614  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
615  z -= z_base;
616 
617  Real fac = std::sinh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
618 
619  zvel_arr(i,j,k) -= Ampl * omega * fac * std::cos(kp * x - omega_t);
620  });
621  }
622 
623  MultiFab temp_mf(mf[lev].boxArray(), mf[lev].DistributionMap(), AMREX_SPACEDIM, 0);
624  average_face_to_cellcenter(temp_mf,0,
625  Array<const MultiFab*,3>{&vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::yvel],&vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel]});
626 
627  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "xvel_err")) {
628  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],temp_mf,0,mf_comp,1,0);
629  mf_comp += 1;
630  }
631  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "yvel_err")) {
632  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],temp_mf,1,mf_comp,1,0);
633  mf_comp += 1;
634  }
635  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "zvel_err")) {
636  MultiFab::Copy(mf[lev],temp_mf,2,mf_comp,1,0);
637  mf_comp += 1;
638  }
639 
640  // Now restore the velocities to what they were
641  for (MFIter mfi(mf[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
642  {
643  const Box& bx = mfi.validbox();
644  Box xbx(bx); xbx.surroundingNodes(0);
645 
646  const Array4<Real> xvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::xvel].array(mfi);
647  const Array4<Real> zvel_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::zvel].array(mfi);
648 
649  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
650 
651  ParallelFor(xbx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
652  {
653  Real x = i * dx[0];
654  Real z = 0.25 * (z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i,j,k+1) + z_nd(i,j+1,k+1));
655  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
656 
657  z -= z_base;
658 
659  Real fac = std::cosh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
660  xvel_arr(i,j,k) += -Ampl * omega * fac * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
661  });
662  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k)
663  {
664  Real x = (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
665  Real z = 0.25 * ( z_nd(i,j,k) + z_nd(i+1,j,k) + z_nd(i,j+1,k) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k));
666  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
667 
668  z -= z_base;
669  Real fac = std::sinh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
670 
671  zvel_arr(i,j,k) += Ampl * omega * fac * std::cos(kp * x - omega_t);
672  });
673  }
674  } // end xvel_err, yvel_err, zvel_err
675 
676  if (containerHasElement(plot_var_names, "pp_err"))
677  {
678  // Moving terrain ANALYTICAL
679  for ( MFIter mfi(mf[lev],TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi)
680  {
681  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
682  const Array4<Real>& derdat = mf[lev].array(mfi);
683  const Array4<Real const>& p0_arr = p_hse.const_array(mfi);
684  const Array4<Real const>& S_arr = vars_new[lev][Vars::cons].const_array(mfi);
685 
686  const auto dx = geom[lev].CellSizeArray();
687  const Array4<Real const>& z_nd = z_phys_nd[lev]->const_array(mfi);
688  const Array4<Real const>& r0_arr = r_hse.const_array(mfi);
689 
690  Real H = geom[lev].ProbHi()[2];
691  Real Ampl = 0.16;
692  Real wavelength = 100.;
693  Real kp = 2. * PI / wavelength;
694  Real g = CONST_GRAV;
695  Real omega = std::sqrt(g * kp);
696  Real omega_t = omega * t_new[lev];
697 
698  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE(int i, int j, int k) noexcept
699  {
700  const Real rhotheta = S_arr(i,j,k,RhoTheta_comp);
701  derdat(i, j, k, mf_comp) = getPgivenRTh(rhotheta) - p0_arr(i,j,k);
702 
703  Real rho_hse = r0_arr(i,j,k);
704 
705  Real x = (i + 0.5) * dx[0];
706  Real z = 0.125 * ( z_nd(i,j,k ) + z_nd(i+1,j,k ) + z_nd(i,j+1,k ) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k )
707  +z_nd(i,j,k+1) + z_nd(i+1,j,k+1) + z_nd(i,j+1,k+1) + z_nd(i+1,j+1,k+1) );
708  Real z_base = Ampl * std::sin(kp * x - omega_t);
709 
710  z -= z_base;
711  Real fac = std::cosh( kp * (z - H) ) / std::sinh(kp * H);
712  Real pprime_exact = -(Ampl * omega * omega / kp) * fac *
713  std::sin(kp * x - omega_t) * r0_arr(i,j,k);
714 
715  derdat(i,j,k,mf_comp) -= pprime_exact;
716  });
717  }
718  mf_comp += 1;
719  }
720 #endif
721  }
722 
723 
724  std::string plotfilename;
725  if (which == 1)
726  plotfilename = Concatenate(plot_file_1, istep[0], 5);
727  else if (which == 2)
728  plotfilename = Concatenate(plot_file_2, istep[0], 5);
729 
730  if (finest_level == 0)
731  {
732  if (plotfile_type == "amrex") {
733  amrex::Print() << "Writing plotfile " << plotfilename << "\n";
734  if (solverChoice.use_terrain) {
735  // We started with mf_nd holding 0 in every component; here we fill only the offset in z
736  int lev = 0;
737  MultiFab::Copy(mf_nd[lev],*z_phys_nd[lev],0,2,1,0);
738  Real dz = Geom()[lev].CellSizeArray()[2];
739  for (MFIter mfi(mf_nd[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
740  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
741  Array4< Real> mf_arr = mf_nd[lev].array(mfi);
742  ParallelFor(bx, [=] AMREX_GPU_DEVICE (int i, int j, int k) {
743  mf_arr(i,j,k,2) -= k * dz;
744  });
745  }
746  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
747  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
748  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf_nd),
749  varnames,
750  t_new[0], istep);
751  } else {
752  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
753  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
754  varnames,
755  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
756  }
757  writeJobInfo(plotfilename);
758 #ifdef ERF_USE_HDF5
759  } else if (plotfile_type == "hdf5" || plotfile_type == "HDF5") {
760  amrex::Print() << "Writing plotfile " << plotfilename+"d01.h5" << "\n";
761  WriteMultiLevelPlotfileHDF5(plotfilename, finest_level+1,
762  GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf),
763  varnames,
764  Geom(), t_new[0], istep, refRatio());
765 #endif
766 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
767  } else if (plotfile_type == "netcdf" || plotfile_type == "NetCDF") {
768  int lev = 0;
769  int l_which = 0;
770  writeNCPlotFile(lev, l_which, plotfilename, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames, istep, t_new[0]);
771 #endif
772  } else {
773  amrex::Print() << "User specified plot_filetype = " << plotfile_type << std::endl;
774  amrex::Abort("Dont know this plot_filetype");
775  }
776 
777  } else { // multilevel
778 
779  Vector<IntVect> r2(finest_level);
780  Vector<Geometry> g2(finest_level+1);
781  Vector<MultiFab> mf2(finest_level+1);
782 
783  mf2[0].define(grids[0], dmap[0], ncomp_mf, 0);
784 
785  // Copy level 0 as is
786  MultiFab::Copy(mf2[0],mf[0],0,0,mf[0].nComp(),0);
787 
788  // Define a new multi-level array of Geometry's so that we pass the new "domain" at lev > 0
789  Array<int,AMREX_SPACEDIM> periodicity =
790  {Geom()[0].isPeriodic(0),Geom()[0].isPeriodic(1),Geom()[0].isPeriodic(2)};
791  g2[0].define(Geom()[0].Domain(),&(Geom()[0].ProbDomain()),0,periodicity.data());
792 
793  if (plotfile_type == "amrex") {
794  r2[0] = IntVect(1,1,ref_ratio[0][0]);
795  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
796  if (lev > 1) {
797  r2[lev-1][0] = 1;
798  r2[lev-1][1] = 1;
799  r2[lev-1][2] = r2[lev-2][2] * ref_ratio[lev-1][0];
800  }
801 
802  mf2[lev].define(refine(grids[lev],r2[lev-1]), dmap[lev], ncomp_mf, 0);
803 
804  // Set the new problem domain
805  Box d2(Geom()[lev].Domain());
806  d2.refine(r2[lev-1]);
807 
808  g2[lev].define(d2,&(Geom()[lev].ProbDomain()),0,periodicity.data());
809  }
810 
811  // Do piecewise interpolation of mf into mf2
812  for (int lev = 1; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
813  for (MFIter mfi(mf2[lev], TilingIfNotGPU()); mfi.isValid(); ++mfi) {
814  const Box& bx = mfi.tilebox();
815  pcinterp_interp(bx,mf2[lev].array(mfi), 0, mf[lev].nComp(), mf[lev].const_array(mfi),0,r2[lev-1]);
816  }
817  }
818 
819  // Define an effective ref_ratio which is isotropic to be passed into WriteMultiLevelPlotfile
820  Vector<IntVect> rr(finest_level);
821  for (int lev = 0; lev < finest_level; ++lev) {
822  rr[lev] = IntVect(ref_ratio[lev][0],ref_ratio[lev][1],ref_ratio[lev][0]);
823  }
824 
825  WriteMultiLevelPlotfile(plotfilename, finest_level+1, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf2), varnames,
826  g2, t_new[0], istep, rr);
827  writeJobInfo(plotfilename);
828 #ifdef ERF_USE_NETCDF
829  } else if (plotfile_type == "netcdf" || plotfile_type == "NetCDF") {
830  for (int lev = 0; lev <= finest_level; ++lev) {
831  for (int which_box = 0; which_box < num_boxes_at_level[lev]; which_box++) {
832  writeNCPlotFile(lev, which_box, plotfilename, GetVecOfConstPtrs(mf), varnames, istep, t_new[0]);
833  }
834  }
835 #endif
836  }
837  } // end multi-level
838 }
Coord::x
@ x
PI
constexpr amrex::Real PI
Definition: ERF_Constants.H:6
CONST_GRAV
constexpr amrex::Real CONST_GRAV
Definition: ERF_Constants.H:20

AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real Compute_h_xi_AtIface(const int &i, const int &j, const int &k, const amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &cellSizeInv, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &z_nd)
Definition: TerrainMetrics.H:81

AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real Compute_h_zeta_AtIface(const int &i, const int &j, const int &k, const amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &cellSizeInv, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &z_nd)
Definition: TerrainMetrics.H:67

AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real Compute_h_zeta_AtJface(const int &i, const int &j, const int &k, const amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &cellSizeInv, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &z_nd)
Definition: TerrainMetrics.H:110
Compute_h_eta_AtJface
AMREX_GPU_DEVICE AMREX_FORCE_INLINE amrex::Real Compute_h_eta_AtJface(const int &i, const int &j, const int &k, const amrex::GpuArray< amrex::Real, AMREX_SPACEDIM > &cellSizeInv, const amrex::Array4< const amrex::Real > &z_nd)
Definition: TerrainMetrics.H:138
ERF::WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain
void WriteMultiLevelPlotfileWithTerrain(const std::string &plotfilename, int nlevels, const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &mf, const amrex::Vector< const amrex::MultiFab * > &mf_nd, const amrex::Vector< std::string > &varnames, amrex::Real time, const amrex::Vector< int > &level_steps, const std::string &versionName="HyperCLaw-V1.1", const std::string &levelPrefix="Level_", const std::string &mfPrefix="Cell", const amrex::Vector< std::string > &extra_dirs=amrex::Vector< std::string >()) const
Definition: Plotfile.cpp:841
